Original Sentence: Àwọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé ile ìgbìmò Welsh n ṣaniyan nipa ‘wÍwò bii òmὺgò’
Modified Sentence: Awon ϙmϙ egbe ile igbimo Welsh n saniyan nipa ‘wIwo bii omυgo’

Original Sentence: Ibẹru-bojo wa laarin awọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé kan nitori àbá kan eyiti o fẹ ki won yi àpèjẹ wọn pada si MWPs (Ọmọ Ile Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh)
Modified Sentence: Iberu-bojo wa laarin awon ϙmϙ egbe kan nitori aba kan eyiti o fe ki won yi apeje won pada si MWPs (Omo Ile Asoju-sofin ti Welsh)

Original Sentence: Àbá yíì jeyọ sita nitori awọn àgbàkalẹ ètò láti yí orúkọ ìpéjọpọ náà padà sí Ile Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh.
Modified Sentence: Aba yii jeyo sita nitori awon agbakale eto lati yi oruko ipejopo naa pada si Ile Asoju-sofin ti Welsh.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ϙmϙ ẹgbé kaakiri gbogbo ọwọja òșèlú nṣaniyan wipe leè pe ìtìjú wọlé.
Modified Sentence: Awon ϙmϙ egbe kaakiri gbogbo owoja oselu nsaniyan wipe lee pe itiju wole.

Original Sentence: Ọkón lára awon ọmọ ẹgbẹ Labour sọpé Èyí ti o kan ẹgbẹ t’ohun nipe “ó fi ara pè Twp àti Pwp.”
Modified Sentence: Okon lara awon omo egbe Labour sope Eyi ti o kan egbe t’ohun nipe “o fi ara pe Twp ati Pwp.”

Original Sentence: Fun awọn onkawe lẹyin odi Wales. Ní èdè Welsh twp tumọ sí omugọ tí pwp sì tumọ sí ìgbẹẹ eniyan.
Modified Sentence: Fun awon onkawe leyin odi Wales. Ni ede Welsh twp tumo si omugo ti pwp si tumo si igbee eniyan.

Original Sentence: ọmọ ẹgbẹ Plaid kan sọpe inú ẹgbẹ náà l’ápapò "kò dùn" tí ó sì dá àbá àwọn àfirọ́pò miran.
Modified Sentence: omo egbe Plaid kan sope inu egbe naa l’apapo "ko dun" ti o si da aba awon afiropo miran.

Original Sentence: Ọmọ ẹgbẹ Conservative ti Welsh kan sọpe ẹgbẹ òun “kò pa ọkàn rẹ rárá” nipa yiyipada orúkọ náà, ṣugbọn o ṣakiyesi wipe ó jẹ ọrọ ẹnu kúkúrú ti ó fò kúrò láti MVP sí Omugọ.
Modified Sentence: Omo egbe Conservative ti Welsh kan sope egbe oun “ko pa okan re rara” nipa yiyipada oruko naa, sugbon o sakiyesi wipe o je oro enu kukuru ti o fo kuro lati MVP si Omugo.

Original Sentence: Nínú àsọyé èdé yìí pípèé lẹta w ninu èdè Welsh ni o farajọ ìpè lẹta u ti èdè Geesi ti àwọn Yorkshire.
Modified Sentence: Ninu asoye ede yii pipee leta w ninu ede Welsh ni o farajo ipe leta u ti ede Geesi ti awon Yorkshire.

Original Sentence: Igbimọ Amuṣẹṣe Ipejọpọ náà, èyítí ó ńṣatopọ ofin lati mu awọn ayipada orukọ naa wọle, sọpe: “Ipinnu eyi ti yòó gbẹyin lori ìṣapejuwe ohun tí a pe àwon Ọmọ Ẹgbẹ Ipejọpọ Aṣoju-ṣofin náà ni yóò jẹ ọrọ fun awọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ lati yanjú funrarawọn.”
Modified Sentence: Igbimo Amusese Ipejopo naa, eyiti o nsatopo ofin lati mu awon ayipada oruko naa wole, sope: “Ipinnu eyi ti yoo gbeyin lori isapejuwe ohun ti a pe awon Omo Egbe Ipejopo Asoju-sofin naa ni yoo je oro fun awon omo egbe lati yanju funrarawon.”

Original Sentence: Òfin ọdún 2017 ti Ìjọba Wales fún Ipejọpọ Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh ni ágbára láti yi orúkọ rẹ padà.
Modified Sentence: Ofin odun 2017 ti Ijoba Wales fun Ipejopo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh ni agbara lati yi oruko re pada.

Original Sentence: Nínú oṣù Òkúdu, Igbimọ Amuṣẹṣe náà ṣatẹjade awọn èsì ifọrọlọ lórí awọn àbá èyí ti ó rí atilẹyin tó gbòòrò fún pípe ipejọpọ náà ní Igbimọ Aṣoju-ṣofin ti Welsh.
Modified Sentence: Ninu osu Okudu, Igbimo Amusese naa satejade awon esi iforolo lori awon aba eyi ti o ri atileyin to gbooro fun pipe ipejopo naa ni Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh.

Original Sentence: Lórí ọrọ nipa àpèjẹ́ àwọn AM, Ìgbìmọ Amúṣẹ́ṣe fojú rere wo àwọn Ọmọ Ilé Ìgbímọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin ti Welsh àbí WMP, ṣùgbọ́n pipe ẹgbẹ na ní MWP gba àtìlẹ́yìn tí ó pọ́ jùlọ nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀lọ àwọn ará ìlú.
Modified Sentence: Lori oro nipa apeje awon AM, Igbimo Amusese foju rere wo awon Omo Ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Welsh abi WMP, sugbon pipe egbe na ni MWP gba atileyin ti o po julo ninu iforolo awon ara ilu.

Original Sentence: Ó fi hàn pe àwọn AM ńdá àbá̀ miran, ṣugbọn ìlàkàkà láti ìfẹnukò leè jẹ́ ẹ̀fọ́rí fún ádari ìgbìmọ́, Elin Jones, ẹnití wọn ńretí láti fún wọn ní àtòpọ̀ àbádòfin lórí à̀wọn ìyípadà náà láarin ọ̀sẹ̀ pérétè.
Modified Sentence: O fi han pe awon AM nda aba miran, sugbon ilakaka lati ifenuko lee je efori fun adari igbimo, Elin Jones, eniti won nreti lati fun won ni atopo abadofin lori awon iyipada naa laarin ose perete.

Original Sentence: Òfin nípa àwọn àtúnṣe náà yóò ní àwọn ìyípadà miran nípa ọna ti ipejọpọ na ńgbà fi ṣiṣẹ, pẹlu àwọn ìlànà lórí sísọ awọn AM di àpẹẹrẹ ati agbekalẹ ọna ìmúṣẹṣe ti igbimọ naa.
Modified Sentence: Ofin nipa awon atunse naa yoo ni awon iyipada miran nipa ona ti ipejopo na ngba fi sise, pelu awon ilana lori siso awon AM di apeere ati agbekale ona imusese ti igbimo naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn AM yóò gba ìbò tó gbẹyin  lóri ìbéèrè nípa ohun tí a níláti máa pè wọn nígbàtí wọn bá ńṣe àríyànjiyàn lórí òfin náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon AM yoo gba ibo to gbeyin  lori ibeere nipa ohun ti a nilati maa pe won nigbati won ba nse ariyanjiyan lori ofin naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà yóò lọ di ìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹẹni-bẹẹkọ lóri yíyí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà padà.
Modified Sentence: Awon omo orile-ede Masidonia yoo lo di ibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko lori yiyi oruko orile-ede naa pada.

Original Sentence: Àwọn olùdìbò yóò dìbò lọjọ Àìkú lórí bóyá kí wọn yí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà padà sí “Ilẹ Olómìnira ti Àríwá Masidóníà.
Modified Sentence: Awon oludibo yoo dibo lojo Aiku lori boya ki won yi oruko orile-ede naa pada si “Ile Olominira ti Ariwa Masidonia.

Original Sentence: Ìbò èyítí ó gbajumọ yíì ni a ṣagbekalẹ rẹ nitori èrèdí láti yanjú èdè-àìyedè atọdunmọdun kan pẹlu aláàmúlégbè orilẹ-ede Gíríkì, eyiti ó ni ẹkùn ara rẹ kan tí a ńpè ní Masidóníà.
Modified Sentence: Ibo eyiti o gbajumo yii ni a sagbekale re nitori eredi lati yanju ede-aiyede atodunmodun kan pelu alaamulegbe orile-ede Giriki, eyiti o ni ekun ara re kan ti a npe ni Masidonia.

Original Sentence: Ìlú Atẹẹni ni ótí ́tẹnumọọ fún ìgbà pipẹ wípé orúkọ aláàmúlégbè ní ìhà àríwá òun dúró fun ṣíṣe bi olúwa lóri ilẹ òun tí ó sì ńṣe àtakò léra-léra sí àwọn ìgbìyànjú rẹ láti di ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ àjọ EU àti NATO.
Modified Sentence: Ilu Ateeni ni oti tenumoo fun igba pipe wipe oruko alaamulegbe ni iha ariwa oun duro fun sise bi oluwa lori ile oun ti o si nse atako lera-lera si awon igbiyanju re lati di omo egbe ajo EU ati NATO.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà Gjorge Ivanov, alátakò kan sí ìbò lóri ìyípadà orúkọ náà, ti sọpé òun kì yóò ka ìbò náà sí.
Modified Sentence: Aare orile-ede Masidonia Gjorge Ivanov, alatako kan si ibo lori iyipada oruko naa, ti sope oun ki yoo ka ibo naa si.

Original Sentence: Bótiwùkórí, àwọn alatilẹyin ìbò onibẹẹni-bẹẹkọ náà, pẹlu Adarí Igbimọ naa Zoran Zaev, jiyàn wípé ìyípadà orúkọ jẹ ihun kékeré láti ṣe lati le darapọ mọ àjọ EU àti NATO.
Modified Sentence: Botiwukori, awon alatileyin ibo onibeeni-beeko naa, pelu Adari Igbimo naa Zoran Zaev, jiyan wipe iyipada oruko je ihun kekere lati se lati le darapo mo ajo EU ati NATO.

Original Sentence: Àwọn Agogo St. Martin dákẹ́rọrọ bí awọn Ijò Harlem ̣ṣe n ̀làkàka.
Modified Sentence: Awon Agogo St. Martin dakeroro bi awon Ijo Harlem se n lakaka.

Original Sentence: ''Nínu ìtàn, àwọn àgbà tí mo ti bá sọ̀rọ̀ sọwípé́ ilé ọtí àti ilé ìjọsìn ma nwà ní káàkiri gbogbo igun,'' Ògbẹ́ni Adam ni o so bèẹ́.
Modified Sentence: ''Ninu itan, awon agba ti mo ti ba soro sowipe ile oti ati ile ijosin ma nwa ni kaakiri gbogbo igun,'' Ogbeni Adam ni o so bee.

Original Sentence: ''Lóòní, kòsí ọkàn nínú wọn mọ́.''
Modified Sentence: ''Looni, kosi okan ninu won mo.''

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé ìpòórá àwọn ilé ọtí̀ yéni.
Modified Sentence: O sope ipoora awon ile oti yeni.

Original Sentence: ó wípé ''Awọn eniyan lesee àṣepọ̀ ní oríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà'', lóde òní.
Modified Sentence: o wipe ''Awon eniyan lesee asepo ni orisirisi ona'', lode oni.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ọtí kìí ṣe iyàrá ìgbàlejò tí àwọn èniyàn máa ńlọ lóòrè-kóòrè mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile oti kii se iyara igbalejo ti awon eniyan maa nlo loore-koore mo.

Original Sentence: Àmọò fún àwọn ilé ìjọsìn, ó ńṣàníyàn wípé owó tí yóò ti ara títa àwọn dúkìá jáde kòní pẹ́ lọ títí bí àwọn adarí ti ńretí́, ''àtipé bópe bóyạ́́ wọn yóò padà sí'bi tí wọ́n ti bẹ̀rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Amoo fun awon ile ijosin, o nsaniyan wipe owo ti yoo ti ara tita awon dukia jade koni pe lo titi bi awon adari ti nreti, ''atipe bope boya won yoo pada si'bi ti won ti bere.

Original Sentence: ó tun fikún pè a lè rọpò àwọn ilé ìjọsìn pẹlu àwọn ile tí a pín sí ojúlé̀ tí ósì kún fọ́fọ́ pẹ̀lú irufẹ àwọn eniyan tí kòní ran àwọn ibi mimọ ìyókù tówà láàdúgbò lọwọ.
Modified Sentence: o tun fikun pe a le ropo awon ile ijosin pelu awon ile ti a pin si ojule ti osi kun fofo pelu irufe awon eniyan ti koni ran awon ibi mimo iyoku towa laadugbo lowo.

Original Sentence: "Ọpọ ninu awọn eniyan ti o nra ojule ninu awọn ile onibugbe wọnyi yoo jẹ alawọ funfun," ni o wi, "atipe nitorinaa wọn yoo mu awọn ọjọ ti awọn sọọsi wọnyi yoo kogba wọle ya kiakia nitoripe koni ṣee ṣe wipe pupọ ninu awọn eniyan ti yoo ko sinu awọn ojule wọnyi di ọmo ijọ ninu awọn sọọsi wọnyi."
Modified Sentence: "Opo ninu awon eniyan ti o nra ojule ninu awon ile onibugbe wonyi yoo je alawo funfun," ni o wi, "atipe nitorinaa won yoo mu awon ojo ti awon soosi wonyi yoo kogba wole ya kiakia nitoripe koni see se wipe pupo ninu awon eniyan ti yoo ko sinu awon ojule wonyi di omo ijo ninu awon soosi wonyi."

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ìjọsìn méjeejì yìí ni àwọn ìjọ alawọ funfun kọ kí Harlem tó di ìlú tó kún fọfọ fún àwọn eniyan dúdú - Àwùjọ Ọlọpọ Eniyan lọdun 1870, St. Martin, lẹyin ọdún mẹwaa.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile ijosin mejeeji yii ni awon ijo alawo funfun ko ki Harlem to di ilu to kun fofo fun awon eniyan dudu - Awujo Olopo Eniyan lodun 1870, St. Martin, leyin odun mewaa.

Original Sentence: Ìjọ Elétò ti àwọn aláwọ̀ funfun tójẹ́ aláàkọ́kọ́ kó jáde làárín àwọn ọdún 1930.
Modified Sentence: Ijo Eleto ti awon alawo funfun toje alaakoko ko jade laarin awon odun 1930.

Original Sentence: Ìjọ àwọn eniyan aláwọ dúdú tí o ti ńjọsin nítòsí gba ìwé-ẹrí èmi-ni-mo-ni  fún ilé náà.
Modified Sentence: Ijo awon eniyan alawo dudu ti o ti njosin nitosi gba iwe-eri emi-ni-mo-ni  fun ile naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìjọ eniyan aláwo dúdú gbà ìsàkóso St. Martin ni ábẹ ìdárí Àlùfáà John Howard Johnson, ẹnití ó darí ìdẹyẹsí àwọn olùtajà ọja ẹlẹyọ ní Òpópónà 125, òpópónà pàtàkì kan fun ọjà rírà ní Harlem, tí wọn kọ lati gba àwọn eniyan dúdú si iṣẹ́ tàbí lati fún wọn ní ìgbéga.
Modified Sentence: Awon ijo eniyan alawo dudu gba isakoso St. Martin ni abe idari Alufaa John Howard Johnson, eniti o dari ideyesi awon olutaja oja eleyo ni Opopona 125, opopona pataki kan fun oja rira ni Harlem, ti won ko lati gba awon eniyan dudu si ise tabi lati fun won ni igbega.

Original Sentence: Ìjàm̀bá iná kan lọ́dún 1939 ba ilé na ̀jẹ́ gidigan, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ ìjọ Baba Johnson ṣe àwọn ètò láti tún un kọ́, wọ́n sì ṣí àwọn aago nạ́.
Modified Sentence: Ijamba ina kan lodun 1939 ba ile na je gidigan, sugbon awon omo ijo Baba Johnson se awon eto lati tun un ko, won si si awon aago na.

Original Sentence: Àlùfáà David Johnson, ọmọ Baba Johnson àti ẹni tí ó gba ìsàkósọ́ lọ́wọ́ baba rẹ̀ ní St. Martin, pe àwọn aago náà, pẹ̀lú ìyangàn, ní ''àwọn aago òtòsi eniyan”.
Modified Sentence: Alufaa David Johnson, omo Baba Johnson ati eni ti o gba isakoso lowo baba re ni St. Martin, pe awon aago naa, pelu iyangan, ni ''awon aago otosi eniyan”.

Original Sentence: Akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ kan tí ó lu aago náà nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàwà pè é ní nǹkan miran: ''Ìṣúra àṣà'' àti ''irin-isẹ́ ìbáláyé tí kò ṣeé pààrọ̀.''
Modified Sentence: Akosemose kan ti o lu aago naa ninu osu Owawa pe e ni nnkan miran: ''Isura asa'' ati ''irin-ise ibalaye ti ko see paaro.''

Original Sentence: Akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣé kaǹ, Tiffany Ng ti ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ Yunifasiti ti Miṣigaani, bakanaa so wipé ó jẹ́ agogo àkọ́kọ́ ní àgbáyé tí akorin aláwò dudù, Dionisio A. Lind lu, ẹnití o kúrò̀ lọ̀ s'ọ́dọ̀ àwọn agogo ńlá ní ilé ìjọsìn ti Riverside ní odún méjìdínlógún sẹ́yìn.
Modified Sentence: Akosemose kan, Tiffany Ng ti ile-eko Yunifasiti ti Misigaani, bakanaa so wipe o je agogo akoko ni agbaye ti akorin alawo dudu, Dionisio A. Lind lu, eniti o kuro lo s'odo awon agogo nla ni ile ijosin ti Riverside ni odun mejidinlogun seyin.

Original Sentence: Ọgbéni Merriweather sọ wípé St. Martin kò pààrọ rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ogbeni Merriweather so wipe St. Martin ko paaro re.

Original Sentence: Ohun tí o ti ṣẹlẹ́ ni St. Martin láàrin àwọn oṣù díẹ̀ sẹ́yìn ti jẹ́ ìtàn àwọn ayàwòrán ilé àti àwọn agbaṣẹ́ṣé eyiti ó lójú pọ kan, àwọn kan tí àwọn adari tí kìí ṣe akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àlùfáà mú wọlé, àwọn miran nípaṣẹ̀ àwọn ile ijo tí àwọn Bíṣọọbu ńdarí.
Modified Sentence: Ohun ti o ti sele ni St. Martin laarin awon osu die seyin ti je itan awon ayaworan ile ati awon agbasese eyiti o loju po kan, awon kan ti awon adari ti kii se akosemose alufaa mu wole, awon miran nipase awon ile ijo ti awon Bisoobu ndari.

Original Sentence: Ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ naa - àwọn aláàmójútó ti ẹ̀ka ìjọ náà, tí àwọn adarí tí kìí ṣe akọ́ṣémọṣẹ́ àlùfáà ti jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ - kọ lẹ́tà nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàwà pẹ̀lú ìkáyàsókè wípé ẹkùn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu náà ''yóò wá ọ̀nà láti darí gbogbo ìnáwó náà'' s'ọdọ ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ náà, àni botilẹjepe ìgbìmọ̀ aláṣẹ náà kò tíì kó ipa rí nínú gbígba àwọn ayaworan ilé àti àwọn agbaṣẹ́ṣe eyiti ẹkùn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu fi ranṣẹ sí iṣẹ́ kankan rí.
Modified Sentence: Igbimo alase naa - awon alaamojuto ti eka ijo naa, ti awon adari ti kii se akosemose alufaa ti je omo egbe - ko leta ninu osu Owawa pelu ikayasoke wipe ekun isakoso bisoobu naa ''yoo wa ona lati dari gbogbo inawo naa'' s'odo igbimo alase naa, ani botilejepe igbimo alase naa ko tii ko ipa ri ninu gbigba awon ayaworan ile ati awon agbasese eyiti ekun isakoso bisoobu fi ranse si ise kankan ri.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ìjọ kan fi ẹ̀sùn kàn àwọn ìṣàkóso bisọọbu náa nípa pe kòsí ìkó-àkóyawọ lórí ipa tiwon
Modified Sentence: Awon omo ijo kan fi esun kan awon isakoso bisoobu naa nipa pe kosi iko-akoyawo lori ipa tiwon

Original Sentence: Ẹja ńlá ṣè ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàla kan léṣe nípaṣẹ̀ ìbẹ̵̵́lumi fún kíkó àwọn ako edé ní ìlú Kalifóníà
Modified Sentence: Eja nla se omo odun metala kan lese nipase ibelumi fun kiko awon ako ede ni ilu Kalifonia

Original Sentence: Ẹja ńlá kan ṣe ìkọlu tí ó sì pa ọmọkùnrin ọdún mẹtala kan lára lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nigbati ó n ́bẹ́lumi láti mú ako edé ní ìlú Kalifónía lọjọ tí wọ́n ńsíde ayẹyẹ kiko ako edé, gẹgẹ bíi àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ se sọ.
Modified Sentence: Eja nla kan se ikolu ti o si pa omokunrin odun metala kan lara lojo Abameta nigbati o n belumi lati mu ako ede ni ilu Kalifonia lojo ti won nside ayeye kiko ako ede, gege bii awon osise se so.

Original Sentence: Ìkọlù náà wáyé kí aago méje òwúrọ̀ tó lù nítòsí Etíkun Beacon ní Encinitas.
Modified Sentence: Ikolu naa waye ki aago meje owuro to lu nitosi Etikun Beacon ni Encinitas.

Original Sentence: Chad Hammel sọ fún KSWB-TV ní ìlú San Diego pé ọmọdé kὺnrin náà́ ti ńbẹ́lumi pẹ̀lú àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ fún bíi ϙgbòn ìṣẹjú ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nígbàtí òun gbọ́ tí ọmọkùnrin náà ńpariwo fún ìrànlọ́wọ́ àtipé lẹ́yìn náà ni òun tukọ̀ s’órí omi pẹ̀lú àwọn ̣́miran láti fà á jade kúrô nínú omi náà.
Modified Sentence: Chad Hammel so fun KSWB-TV ni ilu San Diego pe omode kυnrin naa ti nbelumi pelu awon ore re fun bii ϙgbon iseju ni owuro ojo Abameta nigbati oun gbo ti omokunrin naa npariwo fun iranlowo atipe leyin naa ni oun tuko s’ori omi pelu awon miran lati fa a jade kuro ninu omi naa.

Original Sentence: Hammel sowịpé ní àkọ́kọ́ òun rò wípé ìdùnnú rírí ako edé mú lásán ni, ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́yìn náà òun ''wá ṣàkìyèsìị́ ̀pé ó ńkígbe, 'nkań ti bù mí jẹ!
Modified Sentence: Hammel sowipe ni akoko oun ro wipe idunnu riri ako ede mu lasan ni, sugbon leyin naa oun ''wa sakiyesii pe o nkigbe, 'nkan ti bu mi je!

Original Sentence: nkan ti bù mí jẹ!'
Modified Sentence: nkan ti bu mi je!'

Original Sentence: Gbogbo egungun èjìká rẹ̀ ló hàn síta nítorí ẹran ara tó ti fàya,'' Hammel sọpé òun ṣàkíyèsí rẹ̀ ní kété tí òun gbà ọmọkùnrin náà mú.
Modified Sentence: Gbogbo egungun ejika re lo han sita nitori eran ara to ti faya,'' Hammel sope oun sakiyesi re ni kete ti oun gba omokunrin naa mu.

Original Sentence: ''Mo pariwo sí gbogbo eniyan láti jáde kúrò nínú omi náà: 'Ẹja ńlá sáàki wà nínú omi!'' Hammel fi kún un.
Modified Sentence: ''Mo pariwo si gbogbo eniyan lati jade kuro ninu omi naa: 'Eja nla saaki wa ninu omi!'' Hammel fi kun un.

Original Sentence: Ọmọkùnrin náà ni a fi ọkọ òfurufú gbé lọ sí Ilé-ìwòsàn Àwọn Ọmọdé ní ìlú San Diego níbití tí a ti ṣe àtòkọ rẹ̀ wípé ó wà ní ipò tó léwu.
Modified Sentence: Omokunrin naa ni a fi oko ofurufu gbe lo si Ile-iwosan Awon Omode ni ilu San Diego nibiti ti a ti se atoko re wipe o wa ni ipo to lewu.

Original Sentence: Irú ẹ̀yà ẹja ńlá tí ó ṣe ìkọluni náà ni a kò mọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Iru eya eja nla ti o se ikoluni naa ni a ko mo.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀gágun Lifeguard LarrycGiles sọ níbi ìfitónilétí kan pẹ̀lú àwọn oníròyìn wípé ẹja ńlá sáàkì náà ni wọ́n ti rí ní agbègbè náà ní àwọn ọ̀sẹ̀ díẹ̀ saájú ìṣẹ̀lẹ́ náà, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n ti pinnu wípé kìí ṣe irufẹ́ ẹ̀yà sáàkì tó léwu.
Modified Sentence: Ogagun Lifeguard LarrycGiles so nibi ifitonileti kan pelu awon oniroyin wipe eja nla saaki naa ni won ti ri ni agbegbe naa ni awon ose die saaju isele naa, sugbon won ti pinnu wipe kii se irufe eya saaki to lewu.

Original Sentence: Giles fi kún un wípé ọmọdé̀ náà gba àwọn ìpalára síbi agbègbè apá òké àgọ́ ara rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Giles fi kun un wipe omode naa gba awon ipalara sibi agbegbe apa oke ago ara re.

Original Sentence: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ti ibi àtiwọlé sí etíkun náà pa láti Etíkun Ponto ní Casablad sí Swami ní Ecinitas fún wákàtí méjìdínláàdọ́ta fún èrèdí ìwáàdí àti ààbó.
Modified Sentence: Awon osise ti ibi atiwole si etikun naa pa lati Etikun Ponto ni Casablad si Swami ni Ecinitas fun wakati mejidinlaadota fun eredi iwaadi ati aabo.

Original Sentence: Giles ṣàkíyèsí pé àwọn irúfẹ́ ẹ̀yà sáàkì tó máàrùndínlógójì ni o wà ní agbègbè náà, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ ninu wọn ni àwọn kò kà sí eyiti ó léwu.
Modified Sentence: Giles sakiyesi pe awon irufe eya saaki to maarundinlogoji ni o wa ni agbegbe naa, sugbon opo ninu won ni awon ko ka si eyiti o lewu.

Original Sentence: Sainsbury's ńṣàgbékalẹ̀ ètò láti wọlé sínú ọjà àwọn nǹkan afúnnilẹ́wà ti orilẹ-ede UK
Modified Sentence: Sainsbury's nsagbekale eto lati wole sinu oja awon nnkan afunnilewa ti orile-ede UK

Original Sentence: Sainsbury's ńta kàǹgbọ̀n pẹ̀lú Boots, Superdrug àti Debenhams pẹ̀lú ilé ìtajà ẹlẹ́ka-eyiti ó ní àwọn ọ̀nà láàrin ibití a to ọjà afúnnilẹ́wà sí pẹ̀lú ìrànlọwọ lati àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Sainsbury's nta kangbon pelu Boots, Superdrug ati Debenhams pelu ile itaja eleka-eyiti o ni awon ona laarin ibiti a to oja afunnilewa si pelu iranlowo lati awon osise akosemose.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí ara ti àtiwọlé sínú ọjà nǹkan afúnnilẹ́wà tí owó rẹ̀ tó biliọọnu pọ́ùn 2.8 ti orilẹ-ede UK, eyiti ó sì ńtẹ̀síwájù láti máa dàgbà nigbati ọjà asọ̀ ati ohun èlò ilé nfà sẹ́yìn, àwọn ibití a tò àwọn érójà afúnnilẹ́wà sí ni a ó dánwò ninu awọn ilé ìtajà mọ́kànlá kaakiri orilẹ-ede náà tí a ó sì gbé e lọsí́ àwọn ilé ìtajà díẹ̀ síi lọ́dun tó ḿbọ̀ bí ó bá fihàn pé o jẹ́ àṣeyọrí.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi ara ti atiwole sinu oja nnkan afunnilewa ti owo re to bilioonu poun 2.8 ti orile-ede UK, eyiti o si ntesiwaju lati maa dagba nigbati oja aso ati ohun elo ile nfa seyin, awon ibiti a to awon eroja afunnilewa si ni a o danwo ninu awon ile itaja mokanla kaakiri orile-ede naa ti a o si gbe e losi awon ile itaja die sii lodun to mbo bi o ba fihan pe o je aseyori.

Original Sentence: Ìdókòòwò sínú érójà afúnnilẹ́wà náà ńwáyé bí àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá ṣe ńdọdẹ fún àwọn ọ̀nà láti lo àwọn àayè tí wọn ńlò tẹ́lẹ̀ fún títo àwọn ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán àti ohun èlò ilé sí.
Modified Sentence: Idokoowo sinu eroja afunnilewa naa nwaye bi awon ile itaja nla se ndode fun awon ona lati lo awon aaye ti won nlo tele fun tito awon ero amohunmaworan ati ohun elo ile si.

Original Sentence: Sainsbury's sọpé òun yóò máa sọ ìwọn ọrẹ érójà afúnnilẹ́wà di ìlọ́poméjì tí yóò sì pèsè ọjà to ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́ta, pẹ̀lú àwọn ọjà olórúkọ bíi Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman àti Dr. PawPaw fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́.
Modified Sentence: Sainsbury's sope oun yoo maa so iwon ore eroja afunnilewa di ilopomeji ti yoo si pese oja to egberun meta, pelu awon oja oloruko bii Revlon, Essie, Tweezerman ati Dr. PawPaw fun igba akoko.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọjà tótiwà tẹ́lẹ̀ láti ọwọ́ L'Oreal, Maybelline àti Burt's Bees yóò gba àayè díẹ̀ síi pẹ̀lú àwọn agbègbè tí o lórúkọ tó farajọ àwọn eyiti a ńrí ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà bíi Boots.
Modified Sentence: Awon oja totiwa tele lati owo L'Oreal, Maybelline ati Burt's Bees yoo gba aaye die sii pelu awon agbegbe ti o loruko to farajo awon eyiti a nri ninu awon ile itaja bii Boots.

Original Sentence: Ilé ìtajà náà tún ńṣe àtúnfilọ́lẹ̀ àwọn ọjà ìṣojúlóge rẹ̀ kí ọ̀pọ̀ ninu àwọn ọjà rẹ̀ leè jẹ eyiti àwọn tí kìí jẹ ẹran ńfẹ́ - nǹkan ti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ tó ńrajà ńbèèré fún jùlọ.
Modified Sentence: Ile itaja naa tun nse atunfilole awon oja isojuloge re ki opo ninu awon oja re lee je eyiti awon ti kii je eran nfe - nnkan ti awon odo to nraja nbeere fun julo.

Original Sentence: Ni àfikún, ilé ìtajà-ẹlẹ́yọ ti nǹkan olóòórùn-dídun ti Fragrance Shop náà yóò máa dán àwọn ibití a yọ̀ǹda fún wọn wò ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà Sainsbury's méjì, àkọ́kọ́ tí a sí ní Croydon, ní gúúsù ìlú Lọndọn, lọsẹ tó kọjá nigbati ikeji yo di sísí ní Selly Oak, Birmingham, láàrin ọ́dún yìí.
Modified Sentence: Ni afikun, ile itaja-eleyo ti nnkan olooorun-didun ti Fragrance Shop naa yoo maa dan awon ibiti a yonda fun won wo ninu awon ile itaja Sainsbury's meji, akoko ti a si ni Croydon, ni guusu ilu London, lose to koja nigbati ikeji yo di sisi ni Selly Oak, Birmingham, laarin odun yii.

Original Sentence: Ọjà rírà lórí ìtàkùn ayélujára àti sísún sí rirá àwọn oúnjẹ díẹ̀ lojoojumọ ní àwọn ilé ìtajà ìrọ̀rùn tówà lágbègbè túmọ sípé àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá ti ńní iṣẹ́ díẹ̀ síi láti ṣe lórí pípa àrọwà fún àwọn eniyan láti ṣàbẹ̀wo sí ọdọọ wọǹ.
Modified Sentence: Oja rira lori itakun ayelujara ati sisun si rira awon ounje die lojoojumo ni awon ile itaja irorun towa lagbegbe tumo sipe awon ile itaja nla ti nni ise die sii lati se lori pipa arowa fun awon eniyan lati sabewo si odoo won.

Original Sentence: Mike Coupe, olùdarí àgbà ni Sainsbury's, ti sọpé ìrísí àwọn ibi ìtajà náà lọna tó ńpọ̀ síi yóò jọ ti àwọn ilé ìtajà ẹlẹ́ka bí ilé ìtajà ńlá alátagbà náà ti ngbiyanju láti kọjú ìjà̀ sí àwọn adínnilówó Aldi àti Lidl pẹ̀lú àwọn iṣẹ́ díẹ̀ síi àti ohun tí kìí ṣe oúnjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Mike Coupe, oludari agba ni Sainsbury's, ti sope irisi awon ibi itaja naa lona to npo sii yoo jo ti awon ile itaja eleka bi ile itaja nla alatagba naa ti ngbiyanju lati koju ija si awon adinnilowo Aldi ati Lidl pelu awon ise die sii ati ohun ti kii se ounje.

Original Sentence: Ilè ìtàjà Sainsbury ti ńfi àwọn ibi ìtajà Argos sínú àwọn ilé ìtajà bii ọgọ́ọ̀rún tí o sì ti ṣe ìfinimọlé fún iye Habitats lẹ́yìn tí o ra àwọn  alátagbà méjèèjì lọ́dún méjì sẹ́yìn, eyiti ó sọpé ó ti mú ki ọjà àwọn oúnjẹ̀ tà síi tí ó sì jẹ́kí àwọn alátagbà jẹ érè díẹ̀ síi.
Modified Sentence: Ile itaja Sainsbury ti nfi awon ibi itaja Argos sinu awon ile itaja bii ogoorun ti o si ti se ifinimole fun iye Habitats leyin ti o ra awon  alatagba mejeeji lodun meji seyin, eyiti o sope o ti mu ki oja awon ounje ta sii ti o si jeki awon alatagba je ere die sii.

Original Sentence: Ìgbìyànjú ti ilé ìtajà ńlà yíì ṣe sẹyìn láti ṣọ àwọn ẹ̀ka afúnnilẹ́wà ati ti òògùn títà rẹ̀ jí ̀kùnà.
Modified Sentence: Igbiyanju ti ile itaja nla yii se seyin lati so awon eka afunnilewa ati ti oogun tita re ji kuna.

Original Sentence: Ni ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ọdún 2000,ilé ìtaja Sainsbury dán oko-òwò alájọni wò pẹ̀lu Boots sùgbọ́n àsopọ náà pári lẹ́yìn aáwọ̀ kan lórí bí wọn yóò tí máa pín owó tó ńwọlé láti ibi ìtajà oogun tówà ninu àwọn ilé ìtajà ńlá rè̀.
Modified Sentence: Ni ibere awon odun 2000,ile itaja Sainsbury dan oko-owo alajoni wo pelu Boots sugbon asopo naa pari leyin aawo kan lori bi won yoo ti maa pin owo to nwole lati ibi itaja oogun towa ninu awon ile itaja nla re.

Original Sentence: ìgbeyẹwò tuntun náà ́wáyé lẹ́yìn ti Sainsbury's ta oko-òwò ílé-ìtajà òògùn ọrìnlénigba lé kan rẹ̀ fún Celesio, ẹnití ó ni ilé ìtajà alátagbà Lloyds Pharmacy, fún miliọnu máàrúndínlọ́gojè pọ́ùn, ni ọ́dún mẹ́ta sẹ́yìn.
Modified Sentence: igbeyewo tuntun naa waye leyin ti Sainsbury's ta oko-owo ile-itaja oogun orinlenigba le kan re fun Celesio, eniti o ni ile itaja alatagba Lloyds Pharmacy, fun milionu maarundinlogoje poun, ni odun meta seyin.

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé Lloyds yóò kó ipa nínú ètò náà, nípa ṣíṣe àfikún àwọn ọjà itọju awọ ara olorúkọ tógbòòrò bíi La Roch-Posay àti Vichy sínú ibi ìtajà mẹ́rin.
Modified Sentence: O sope Lloyds yoo ko ipa ninu eto naa, nipa sise afikun awon oja itoju awo ara oloruko togbooro bii La Roch-Posay ati Vichy sinu ibi itaja merin.

Original Sentence: Paul Mills-Hicks, olùdarí oko-òwò fún Sainsbury's, sọpé: ''A ti yí ìrísí àti ìmọ̀lára ti àwọn ojú ọ̀nà ibi ìtajà èròjà afúnnilẹwà wa padà láti jẹ́kí àyíká náà dára síi fún àwọn oníìbárà wa.
Modified Sentence: Paul Mills-Hicks, oludari oko-owo fun Sainsbury's, sope: ''A ti yi irisi ati imolara ti awon oju ona ibi itaja eroja afunnilewa wa pada lati jeki ayika naa dara sii fun awon oniibara wa.

Original Sentence: A tún ti dókòòwò nínú kíkọ́ àwọn alábàṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ wa lẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àkànṣe àwọn tí yóò máa wà láàrọ́wọ́tó láti fúnni ni ímọ̀ràn.
Modified Sentence: A tun ti dokoowo ninu kiko awon alabasisepo wa lekoo akanse awon ti yoo maa wa laarowoto lati funni ni imoran.

Original Sentence: Àwọn oríṣiríṣi ọjà olórúkọ wa ní a ṣàgbékalẹ̀ wọn láti bá gbogbo ìlò pàdé àtipé àyíká wa tó fanimọ́ra àti àwọn ibi tí ilé ìtajà wa wà ni ó rọrùn èyí sì túmọ sípé a ti di ibi kan tó pọn dandan eyiti àwọn eniyan yóò fẹ́ dé tí ó sì ńpe ọ̀nà ọjà rírà àtijọ́ níjà.
Modified Sentence: Awon orisirisi oja oloruko wa ni a sagbekale won lati ba gbogbo ilo pade atipe ayika wa to fanimora ati awon ibi ti ile itaja wa wa ni o rorun eyi si tumo sipe a ti di ibi kan to pon dandan eyiti awon eniyan yoo fe de ti o si npe ona oja rira atijo nija.

Original Sentence: Peter Jones 'bínu fùfù' lẹ́yìn ti Holly Willoughby jáde kúrò nínú àdéhùn oní-mílíọ́nù mọ́kànlá pọ́uǹ
Modified Sentence: Peter Jones 'binu fufu' leyin ti Holly Willoughby jade kuro ninu adehun oni-milionu mokanla poun

Original Sentence: Ìràwọ̀ Dragons Den Peter Jones kúrò pẹ̀lú 'ìbínú fùfù' lẹ́yìn tí atọ́kùn ètò Holly Willoughby jáde kúrò nínú àdéhùn oní-mílíọ̀nù mọ́kànlà pọ́ùn pẹ̀lú oko-òwò olorúkọ rẹ̀ ti ìgbésí-ayé rẹ̀ láti leè gbájúmọ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ àgbàṣe tuntun rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Marks and Spencer àti ITV
Modified Sentence: Irawo Dragons Den Peter Jones kuro pelu 'ibinu fufu' leyin ti atokun eto Holly Willoughby jade kuro ninu adehun oni-milionu mokanla poun pelu oko-owo oloruko re ti igbesi-aye re lati lee gbajumo awon ise agbase tuntun re pelu Marks and Spencer ati ITV

Original Sentence: Willoughby òní àyè fún ọjà olórúkọ aso iwọ nílé àti ̀ọja àsopọ̀Truly wọn mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Willoughby oni aye fun oja oloruko aso iwo nile ati oja asopoTruly won mo.

Original Sentence: Oko-òwò àwọn méjèèjì ni wọ́n fiwe ti ìdókóòwò olórúkọ Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow.
Modified Sentence: Oko-owo awon mejeeji ni won fiwe ti idokoowo oloruko Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow.

Original Sentence: Atọ́kùn Òwúrọ̀ yìí, ẹni oḍún mẹ́tàdínlógòjì lọsí Instagram láti kéde wípé ó ńkúrò.
Modified Sentence: Atokun Owuro yii, eni odun metadinlogoji losi Instagram lati kede wipe o nkuro.

Original Sentence: Holly Willoughby ti kúrò ni Dragons'' eni ìràwọ̀ Den Peter Jones ńbínú fùfù nípa jíjáde kúrò nínú oko-òwò elérè olórúkọ ti ọ̀nà ìgbésí-ayé ní ìṣẹ́jú tó gbẹ̀yìn - láti leè gbájúmọ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ àgbàṣe ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ tuntun rẹ̀ pẹ̀lú Marks and Spencer àti ITV.
Modified Sentence: Holly Willoughby ti kuro ni Dragons'' eni irawo Den Peter Jones nbinu fufu nipa jijade kuro ninu oko-owo elere oloruko ti ona igbesi-aye ni iseju to gbeyin - lati lee gbajumo awon ise agbase eleekunrere tuntun re pelu Marks and Spencer ati ITV.

Original Sentence: Àwọn orísun sọ wípé Jones ''bínù fùfù'' nigbati ọmọbìnrin wúrà amóhὺnmawòràn gbà nínú ìpàdé tó le koko kan lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun ní olú ilé-iṣẹ́ oko-òwò rẹ̀ toti gbọ̀rẹ̀gẹ̀digẹ̀ ní Marlow, Buckinghamshire. wípé àwọn àdéhùn tuntun rẹ̀ - eyiti ó tó mílíọ̀nù kan àti ààbọ̀ pọ́ùn - túmọ̀ sípé òhun kòní àkókò púpò mọ́ láti fi fún asọ íwọ̀ nílé àti àwọn àsopọ̀ olórúkọ Truly wọn mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Awon orisun so wipe Jones ''binu fufu'' nigbati omobinrin wura amohυnmaworan gba ninu ipade to le koko kan lojo Isegun ni olu ile-ise oko-owo re toti gboregedige ni Marlow, Buckinghamshire. wipe awon adehun tuntun re - eyiti o to milionu kan ati aabo poun - tumo sipe ohun koni akoko pupo mo lati fi fun aso iwo nile ati awon asopo oloruko Truly won mo.

Original Sentence: Oko-òwò náà ni wọ́n ti fiwé olorúkọ Oko-òwò Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow àtipé wọ́n ti sọpé àwọn dúkìá rẹ̀ yóò di ìlọ́po méjì ti Willoughby tí wọ́n ní ó tó mílíọ̀nù mọ́kànlá pọ́ùn.
Modified Sentence: Oko-owo naa ni won ti fiwe oloruko Oko-owo Goop ti Gwyneth Paltrow atipe won ti sope awon dukia re yoo di ilopo meji ti Willoughby ti won ni o to milionu mokanla poun.

Modified Sentence: Bi Willoughby, 37, losi Instagram lati kede wipe oun nfi Truly sile, Jones wo oko ofurufu jade kuro ni ile geesi ti osi forile okan lara awon ile isinmi re

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan tó lé ni ẹgbẹ̀rún kan ni wọn kú tí ẹgbẹ-ẹgbẹ̀run síì ti kúrò nílé wọn bii ẹgbẹ́ Kristiẹni àti Musulumi se koju ìjà ní àwọn òpópónà, pẹ̀lú àwọn àdá, ọrún àti ọfà, àti àwọn ohun ìjà àtọwọ́dá miran.

Modified Sentence: John Goldsmith, alaga ti Egbe Cromwell, sope: “O je ohun ti ko see dena ninu ariyanjiyan to nlo lowo nipa iyokuro awon eere wipe aworan eere ti Oliver Cromwell towa nita Aafin ti Westminster ni yoo di afojusun kan.

Modified Sentence: Boya Cromwell to se asise naa ni won yoo fi rubo fun awon ise Thomas baba-nla re ni awon ogoorun odun to saaju.

Original Sentence: Ìṣátúnfihàn ńlá ti Ọlọ́lajὺlọ́ William Hamo Thorneycroft nípa Cromwell ni ẹ̀rí ti èrò ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún ìkọkàndínlógún àti ara àkọsílẹ̀ ìtàn ẹnikan tí ọ̀pọ̀ eniyan sí gbàgbọ́ wípé ó sì yẹ lẹ́nití a ńṣàjọyọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Isatunfihan nla ti Ololajυlo William Hamo Thorneycroft nipa Cromwell ni eri ti ero ogoorun odun ikokandinlogun ati ara akosile itan enikan ti opo eniyan si gbagbo wipe o si ye leniti a nsajoyo.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Goldsmith sọ fún Sunday Telegraph: “Cromwell ni ọ̀pọ̀ eniyan kàsí, bóyá jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ lópin ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún kọkàndínlógún ju òní lọ, gẹ́gẹ́bí olùdáààbó ìgbìmọ̀ aṣojú-ṣofiń kúrò lọ́wọ́ ìnira tó ńwá láti ìta, níti ẹjọ́ tirẹ̀ àní àwọn orí-adé.
Modified Sentence: Ogbeni Goldsmith so fun Sunday Telegraph: “Cromwell ni opo eniyan kasi, boya ju bee lo lopin ogoorun odun kokandinlogun ju oni lo, gegebi oludaaabo igbimo asoju-sofin kuro lowo inira to nwa lati ita, niti ejo tire ani awon ori-ade.

Original Sentence: Bóyá ìyẹn jẹ ìsàtúnfihàn kan tó péye tí ó sì bójúmu jẹ́ orí ọ̀rọ̀ àríyànjiyàn ìtàn tó ńtẹ̀síwájú.

Original Sentence: Àgbẹ̀ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan ńgbaradì láti fún àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ lábẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára ní ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan lọ́gbọ̀njọ́, Oṣù Ẹ̀bibi, lọ́dun 2005 nílù Xining ti Ẹkùn Qinghai, lorilẹ-ede Ṣáínà.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí ìròyìn ti wí ó ti rin ìrìn-àjò pẹ̀lú ìbátan rẹ láti aláàmúlégbé ẹkùn Yunnan lọ́jọ́ 'Ru láti ta àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ mẹ́ẹ̀dógún ní ọjá náà.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi iroyin ti wi o ti rin irin-ajo pelu ibatan re lati alaamulegbe ekun Yunnan lojo 'Ru lati ta awon elede meedogun ni oja naa.

Original Sentence: Ní òwurọ̀ ọjọ́ kejì, ìbátan rẹ̀ ríi tóti kú, tí ó sì ṣàwári wípé ìlẹ̀kùn kan sí ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ aláàmúlégbe kan wà ní sísí sílẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ni owuro ojo keji, ibatan re rii toti ku, ti o si sawari wipe ilekun kan si ile elede alaamulegbe kan wa ni sisi sile.

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé ní inú ilé ẹlẹ́dẹ náà ni akọ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan gbé wá pẹ̀lú ẹ̀jẹ̀ lẹ́nu rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: O sope ni inu ile elede naa ni ako elede kan gbe wa pelu eje lenu re.

Original Sentence: Àyẹ̀wò láti ṣàwárí àwọn ẹ̀rí fi ìdí rẹ̀ múlẹ̀ pé akọ ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ tó níwọn ìwúwo ẹgbẹ̀tadínláàádọ́ta pọ́un náà ti ṣe ìpalára fún àgbẹ̀ náà títí dójú ikù, gẹ́gẹ́bí ìròyìn náà ti sọ.
Modified Sentence: Ayewo lati sawari awon eri fi idi re mule pe ako elede to niwon iwuwo egbetadinlaaadota poun naa ti se ipalara fun agbe naa titi doju iku, gegebi iroyin naa ti so.

Original Sentence: ìwé ìròyìn Guiyang Evening News yọ ọ̀ro ìbátaṇ̀ arákὺnrin náà lò o wipe ''Àwọn ẹsẹ̀ ìbátan mi ló jẹ́ kìkìdá ẹ̀jẹ̀ tíwọn sì ti fàya,''  ẹni tíwọ́n tọ́kasí nípa orúkọ ìdílé rẹ̀ ''Wu,''
Modified Sentence: iwe iroyin Guiyang Evening News yo oro ibatan arakυnrin naa lo o wipe ''Awon ese ibatan mi lo je kikida eje tiwon si ti faya,''  eni tiwon tokasi nipa oruko idile re ''Wu,''

Original Sentence: Ayawòrán aláàbò fi Yuan hàn bí ó ti ńwọnú ọjà lọ ní aago máàrún-ku-ogún ìsẹ́jú lọjọ 'Bọ̀ láti fún àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ rẹ̀ lóúnjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Ayaworan alaabo fi Yuan han bi o ti nwonu oja lo ni aago maarun-ku-ogun iseju lojo 'Bo lati fun awon elede re lounje.

Original Sentence: òkú rẹ̀ ni wọ́n rí ní wákàtí kan lẹ́yìn náà.
Modified Sentence: oku re ni won ri ni wakati kan leyin naa.

Original Sentence: Ẹranko tí ó pa ọkùnrin náà kìí ṣe ti Yuan tàbí ìbátan rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Eranko ti o pa okunrin naa kii se ti Yuan tabi ibatan re.

Original Sentence: Olùṣàkóso ọjà kan sọ fún Evening News wipe ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ náà ni wọn ti tì mọ́lé láti dènà kíkọlu ẹlomiran, nigbati àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ńkó ẹ̀rí jọ níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Olusakoso oja kan so fun Evening News wipe elede naa ni won ti ti mole lati dena kikolu elomiran, nigbati awon oloopa nko eri jo nibi isele naa.

Original Sentence: Ìdíle Yuan àti àwọn aláṣẹ ọjà ni ìròyìn sọpé wọn ti ńjíròrò lórí àti san owó gbà-maá-bínu fún ikú rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Idile Yuan ati awon alase oja ni iroyin sope won ti njiroro lori ati san owo gba-maa-binu fun iku re.

Original Sentence: Botilẹjepe kò wọ́pọ̀, àwọn ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kí àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ máa kọlu àwọn eniyan ni wọ́n ti ṣe àkọsílẹ wọn saáju rí.
Modified Sentence: Botilejepe ko wopo, awon isele ki awon elede maa kolu awon eniyan ni won ti se akosile won saaju ri.

Original Sentence: Lọ́dún 2016, ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kan kọlu obìnrin kan àti ọkọ rẹ̀ ní oko wọn ní ìlú Massachusetts, tí ò sì fi ọkùnrin náà sílẹ pẹ̀lú àwọn ìpalára báákú-bááyè.
Modified Sentence: Lodun 2016, elede kan kolu obinrin kan ati oko re ni oko won ni ilu Massachusetts, ti o si fi okunrin naa sile pelu awon ipalara baaku-baaye.

Original Sentence: Ní ọdún mẹ́wàá saáju, ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ oníwọ̀n ìwúwo ẹgbẹ̀taléláààdọ́ta pọ́un kan mú ọkùnrin àgbẹ̀ Welsh kan mọ́ ara katakata rẹ títí ti aya rẹ̀ fi dẹ́rùba ẹranko náà láti sálọ.
Modified Sentence: Ni odun mewaa saaju, elede oniwon iwuwo egbetalelaaadota poun kan mu okunrin agbe Welsh kan mo ara katakata re titi ti aya re fi deruba eranko naa lati salo.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn tí àgbẹ̀ Oregon kan di jíjẹ tán láti ọwọ́ àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́dún 2012, àgbẹ̀ Manitoba kan sọ fún CBC News wípé níti bótiyẹ àwọn ẹlẹ́dẹ̀ kìí ya ẹhànnà ṣùgbọ́n ìtọ́wò ẹ̀jẹ̀ leè ṣe bíi ''okó ìbọn.''
Modified Sentence: Leyin ti agbe Oregon kan di jije tan lati owo awon elede re lodun 2012, agbe Manitoba kan so fun CBC News wipe niti botiye awon elede kii ya ehanna sugbon itowo eje lee se bii ''oko ibon.''

Original Sentence: Wọ́n kàn máa ńjẹ eléré ni.
Modified Sentence: Won kan maa nje elere ni.

Original Sentence: Wọn jẹ ọmọdé eléèékánná, tó ńfẹ́ mọ ohun tó ńṣẹlẹ̀...wọ́n ko wa láti pa ọ́ lára.
Modified Sentence: Won je omode eleeekanna, to nfe mo ohun to nsele...won ko wa lati pa o lara.

Original Sentence: O kàn níláti fún wọn ní iye ọ̀wọ̀ tí ó yẹ, ni ó wí.
Modified Sentence: O kan nilati fun won ni iye owo ti o ye, ni o wi.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìyókù Ìjì-lílè Hurricane Rosa yóò mú òjò wọ káàkàkiri ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede US
Modified Sentence: Awon iyoku Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa yoo mu ojo wo kaakakiri iwo-oorun orile-ede US

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ojú-ọjọ́ ti sọ, agbára Hurricane Rosa ti ńdínkù bí ó ti gòkè lọ sórí àwọn omi tí ó tútú díẹ̀ síi ní àríwá bèbè òkun ti orilẹ-ede Mẹ́síkò.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi asotele oju-ojo ti so, agbara Hurricane Rosa ti ndinku bi o ti goke lo sori awon omi ti o tutu die sii ni ariwa bebe okun ti orile-ede Mesiko.

Original Sentence: Bótiwùkórí, Rosa yóò àwọn òjò oníìkún omi lọ́wọ́ bí ó ti ńla àríwá Mẹ́ṣíkò àti ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. kọ́ja ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó ḿbọ.
Modified Sentence: Botiwukori, Rosa yoo awon ojo oniikun omi lowo bi o ti nla ariwa Mesiko ati iwo-oorun orile-ede U.S. koja ni awon ojo to mbo.

Original Sentence: Rosa ní àwọn afẹ́fẹ́ tí ìwọn ìṣọwọ́sáré rẹ̀ jẹ́ máàrúndínláàádọ́ọ̀rún ìbùṣọ̀ ní wákàtí kan, Ìji-líle Hurricane Oníṣọ̀rí 1 kan, títí aago máàrún òwúrọ̀. Àkókò ìlà-oòrùn lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, tí wọn tí rí i ní máìlí irinwódínmẹ́ẹ̀dógún ní ìwọ̀-oòrùn gúúsù ti ìlú Punta Eugenia, lorilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò.
Modified Sentence: Rosa ni awon afefe ti iwon isowosare re je maarundinlaaadoorun ibuso ni wakati kan, Iji-lile Hurricane Onisori 1 kan, titi aago maarun owuro. Akoko ila-oorun lojo Aiku, ti won ti ri i ni maili irinwodinmeedogun ni iwo-oorun guusu ti ilu Punta Eugenia, lorile-ede Mesiko.

Original Sentence: Rosa ni wọ́n ńretí láti lọsí ìhà àríwá lọjọ́ Àìkú.
Modified Sentence: Rosa ni won nreti lati losi iha ariwa lojo Aiku.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àlàfo jìnjìn kan ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí farahàn lórí omi Òkun Pacific tí ó sì ńlọ sí apá ìlà-oòrùn láti dójúkọ Etíkun Ìwọ̀-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. Bí Rosa ti ńsúnmọ́ erékùsù Baja Carlifonia lọ́jọ́ ajé bíi ìjì ilẹ̀ olóoru yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí taari omi jínjìn ti ilẹ̀ olóoru sí ìhà àríwá lọsí ìwọ̀-oòrùn gúúsù orilẹ̀-ede U.S.
Modified Sentence: Ewe, alafo jinjin kan ti bere si farahan lori omi Okun Pacific ti o si nlo si apa ila-oorun lati dojuko Etikun Iwo-oorun orile-ede U.S. Bi Rosa ti nsunmo erekusu Baja Carlifonia lojo aje bii iji ile olooru yoo bere si taari omi jinjin ti ile olooru si iha ariwa losi iwo-oorun guusu orile-ede U.S.

Original Sentence: Rosa yóò mú ìwọn òjò tí ó tó íǹsì mẹ́wàá wọ àwọn apá Mẹ́ṣíkò lọ́jọ́ Ajé.
Modified Sentence: Rosa yoo mu iwon ojo ti o to insi mewaa wo awon apa Mesiko lojo Aje.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn náà, omi ilẹ̀ olóoru tó ńfara kan àlàfo jínjìn tó ḿbọ̀ yóò ṣẹ̀dá ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́ jákejádò apá Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Gúúsù ní àwọn ọjọ́ tó ḿbọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Leyin naa, omi ile olooru to nfara kan alafo jinjin to mbo yoo seda ekunrere jakejado apa Iwo-oorun Guusu ni awon ojo to mbo.

Original Sentence: Ní ti agbègbè, ìwọ̀n òjò íǹsì 1 sí 4 yóò fa ìkún omi aláyalù tó léwu, àwọn ìsàn pàǹti àtipé ó ṣeé ṣe kí àwọn ilẹ̀ ya sínú omi nínú aṣálẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ni ti agbegbe, iwon ojo insi 1 si 4 yoo fa ikun omi alayalu to lewu, awon isan panti atipe o see se ki awon ile ya sinu omi ninu asale.

Original Sentence: Omi olóoru tójínlẹ̀ yóò fa ìwọ̀n òjò rírọ̀ tí ó súnmọ́ íǹsì 2 sí 3 ni wákàtí kan ní àwọn ibi kan, papàá jùlọ ní àwọn apá ti gúúsù Nevada àti Arizona.
Modified Sentence: Omi olooru tojinle yoo fa iwon ojo riro ti o sunmo insi 2 si 3 ni wakati kan ni awon ibi kan, papaa julo ni awon apa ti guusu Nevada ati Arizona.

Original Sentence: Bi ìwọ̀n òjò íǹsì 2 si 4 ni wọ́n ńretí ní àwọn apá Ìwọ-oòrùn  Gúúsù náà, papàá jùlọ ní ọ̀pọ̀ agbègbè ti Arizona.
Modified Sentence: Bi iwon ojo insi 2 si 4 ni won nreti ni awon apa Iwo-oorun  Guusu naa, papaa julo ni opo agbegbe ti Arizona.

Original Sentence: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí ìkún omi aláyalù wáyé pẹ̀lú àwọn ipò tó ńburú síi nitori àbùdá onísége-sège ti òjò olóoru náà.
Modified Sentence: O see se ki ikun omi alayalu waye pelu awon ipo to nburu sii nitori abuda onisege-sege ti ojo olooru naa.

Original Sentence: Yóò jẹ́ àmọ̀ràn tí kò dára láti jáde síta sí inú aṣálẹ̀ náà pẹ̀lú ẹsẹ̀ níbití òjò olóoru tí ńdúnkóókò láti rọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Yoo je amoran ti ko dara lati jade sita si inu asale naa pelu ese nibiti ojo olooru ti ndunkooko lati ro.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀pọ̀ òjò leè fa kí àwọn àfonífojì di àwọn odò tó ńbínú fùfù tí àwọn ìjì abójòrìn yóò sì mú àwọn afẹ́fẹ́ agbègbè àti eruku tó ńfẹ́ lọ́wọ́.
Modified Sentence: Opo ojo lee fa ki awon afonifoji di awon odo to nbinu fufu ti awon iji abojorin yoo si mu awon afefe agbegbe ati eruku to nfe lowo.

Original Sentence: Àlàfo jínjìn tó ḿbọ̀ náà yóò mú ọ̀pọ̀ òjò agbègbè wọ àwọn apá ti bèbè okùn ìhà Gúúsù California.
Modified Sentence: Alafo jinjin to mbo naa yoo mu opo ojo agbegbe wo awon apa ti bebe okun iha Guusu California.

Original Sentence: Àwọn àrọ̀pọ̀ òjò rírọ̀ tí ó ju ìlàjì íǹsì kan lọ ṣeé ṣe, eyiti ó leè fa àwọn ìsàn pàǹtí ráńpẹ́ àti àwọn ojú ọ̀nà mọ́tò tó ńyọ́.
Modified Sentence: Awon aropo ojo riro ti o ju ilaji insi kan lo see se, eyiti o lee fa awon isan panti ranpe ati awon oju ona moto to nyo.

Original Sentence: Èyí ni yóò jẹ́ ìrọ̀ òjò àkọ́kọ́ ti agbègbè náà ti ìgbà òjò wọn.
Modified Sentence: Eyi ni yoo je iro ojo akoko ti agbegbe naa ti igba ojo won.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìrọ̀ òjò olóoru onísége-sège kan yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí súnmọ́ Arizona lọ́wọ́ alẹ́ ọjọ́ Àìkú àti kùtùkùtù ọjọ Ajé, kí òjò náà tó di eyiti ó ńrọ̀ káàkiri lálẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé àti ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun.
Modified Sentence: Awon iro ojo olooru onisege-sege kan yoo bere si sunmo Arizona lowo ale ojo Aiku ati kutukutu ojo Aje, ki ojo naa to di eyiti o nro kaakiri lale ojo Aje ati ojo Isegun.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀pọ̀ òjò yóò tàn káàkiri dé Àwọn Orígun Mẹ́rin lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun àti nígbẹ̀yìn ni gbogbo ọjọ 'Ru.
Modified Sentence: Opo ojo yoo tan kaakiri de Awon Origun Merin lojo Isegun ati nigbeyin ni gbogbo ojo 'Ru.

Original Sentence: Oṣù Ọ̀wàrà leè rí àwọn ìlọsókè-sódò kan nínú ìwọn ooru tàbi otútú jákè-jádò orilẹ-ede U.S. bí ìhà Arctic tí ńtutù síi, ṣùgbọ́n agbègbè olóoru sì m'óoru síbẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Osu Owara lee ri awon ilosoke-sodo kan ninu iwon ooru tabi otutu jake-jado orile-ede U.S. bi iha Arctic ti ntutu sii, sugbon agbegbe olooru si m'ooru sibe.

Original Sentence: Nigba miran èyí ńyọrísí àwọn ìyípadà tó yanilẹ́nu nínú ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru ní àwọn ọ̀nà ìrìn tó kúrú.
Modified Sentence: Nigba miran eyi nyorisi awon iyipada to yanilenu ninu iwon otutu tabi ooru ni awon ona irin to kuru.

Original Sentence: Àpẹẹrẹ ńlá tóyanilẹ́nu kan wà nípa ti àwọn ìyàtọ̀ ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru ní gbogbo ààrin gùngùn orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.
Modified Sentence: Apeere nla toyanilenu kan wa nipa ti awon iyato iwon otutu tabi ooru ni gbogbo aarin gungun orile-ede U.S. lojo Aiku.

Original Sentence: Ìyàtọ̀ tó fẹ́rẹ̀ tó ìwọ̀n ogún dìgírì ti otútù tàbí ooru lówà láàrin Ìlú Kansas, Missouri, àti Omaha, Nebraska, àti láarin St. Louis àti Des Moines, ní Iowa.
Modified Sentence: Iyato to fere to iwon ogun digiri ti otutu tabi ooru lowa laarin Ilu Kansas, Missouri, ati Omaha, Nebraska, ati laarin St. Louis ati Des Moines, ni Iowa.

Original Sentence: Nínú àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ tó ḿbọ̀ lọ́nà, ìmóoru ìgbà ooru tí yóò pẹ́ yóò gbiyanju láti kọ́lé tí yóò sì gbòòrò lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi.
Modified Sentence: Ninu awon ojo die to mbo lona, imooru igba ooru ti yoo pe yoo gbiyanju lati kole ti yoo si gbooro leekan sii.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀pọ̀ nínú agbègbè ààrin gungun àti ìlà-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. ní wọ́n ńretí láti rí ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ooru títí dé oṣù Ọ̀wàrà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìwọ̀n ọgọ́rin káàkiri láti Àwọn Ọ̀dàn Gúúsù náà sí àwọn apá ti Ìlà-oòrùn Àríwá.
Modified Sentence: Opo ninu agbegbe aarin gungun ati ila-oorun orile-ede U.S. ni won nreti lati ri ibere ooru titi de osu Owara pelu awon iwon ogorin kaakiri lati Awon Odan Guusu naa si awon apa ti Ila-oorun Ariwa.

Original Sentence: Ìlú New York leè dé àwọ̀n ìwọ̀n ọgọ́rin dìgírì lọ́jọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, èyítí yóò fi bíi ìwọ̀n dìgírì mẹ́wàá ju agbedeméjì lọ.
Modified Sentence: Ilu New York lee de awon iwon ogorin digiri lojo Isegun, eyiti yoo fi bii iwon digiri mewaa ju agbedemeji lo.

Original Sentence: Àsọtẹ́lẹ̀ ojú-ọjọ́ ọlọ́jọ́pípẹ́ wa ńtọ́kasí àwọ̀n ìṣọwọ́ṣeéṣe tóga fún àwọ̀n ìwọ̀n otútù tàbí ooru eyiti ó ju agbedeméjì lọ fún ìlà-oòrùn orilẹ-ede U.S. nínú gbogbo ìlàjí àkọ́kọ́ ti oṣù Ọ̀wàrà.
Modified Sentence: Asotele oju-ojo olojopipe wa ntokasi awon isowoseese toga fun awon iwon otutu tabi ooru eyiti o ju agbedemeji lo fun ila-oorun orile-ede U.S. ninu gbogbo ilaji akoko ti osu Owara.

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan tóju mílíọ̀nù ogún lọ ló wo ìgbẹ́jọ́ Kavanaugh
Modified Sentence: Awon eniyan toju milionu ogun lo lo wo igbejo Kavanaugh

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan tóju mílíọ̀nù ogún ló wo ìjẹ́ẹ̀rí amóríyá ti ẹnití a fàkalẹ̀ fún Ilé Ẹjọ́ tógajùlọ Brett Kavanaugh àti ti obìnrin tí o fẹ̀suǹ kàn án pé ó bá òun lòpọ̀ lọ́nà àìtọ́ eyiti ó sọpé ó ṣẹlẹ̀ nínú àwọn ọdún tówà láàrin1980 si 1989, Christine Blasey Ford, lórí àwọn ìtàkùn ẹrọ amóhùnmáwòrán mẹ́fà.
Modified Sentence: Awon eniyan toju milionu ogun lo wo ijeeri amoriya ti eniti a fakale fun Ile Ejo togajulo Brett Kavanaugh ati ti obinrin ti o fesun kan an pe o ba oun lopo lona aito eyiti o sope o sele ninu awon odun towa laarin1980 si 1989, Christine Blasey Ford, lori awon itakun ero amohunmaworan mefa.

Original Sentence: Lọ́nà miran ẹ̀wẹ̀, ipò òṣèlú èmikògbà-ìwọkògbà náà tẹ̀síwájú, pẹ̀lú àwọn agbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ tó ńdá àwọn èto tíwọn ńṣe ìdákúrekú fún àwọn ètò tóyẹ fún ìyípadà ìṣẹ́jú tógbẹ̀yìn ọjọ́ Ẹtì: àdéhùn kan tí Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà Jeff Flake ti Arizona ṣètò rẹ̀ fún àjọ FBI láti ṣe ìwáàdí ọlọ́sẹ̀ kan lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn náà.
Modified Sentence: Lona miran ewe, ipo oselu emikogba-iwokogba naa tesiwaju, pelu awon agbohunsafefe to nda awon eto tiwon nse idakureku fun awon eto toye fun iyipada iseju togbeyin ojo Eti: adehun kan ti Asoju-sofin Agba Jeff Flake ti Arizona seto re fun ajo FBI lati se iwaadi olose kan lori awon esun naa.

Original Sentence: Ford sọ fún Ìgbîmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ ti Àwọn Àṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà wípé ó dá òun lójù ní gbogbo ọ̀nà pé Kavanaugh fí ọwọ́ pa òun lára fún ìtẹ́lọ́rún ara rẹ lẹ́yìn tí ó mutíyò àtipé ó gbìyànjú láti bọ asọ kúrò lára òun ní òde àríya ilé-ẹ̀kọ́ gíga kan.
Modified Sentence: Ford so fun Igbimo Eto Idajo ti Awon Asoju-sofin Agba wipe o da oun loju ni gbogbo ona pe Kavanaugh fi owo pa oun lara fun itelorun ara re leyin ti o mutiyo atipe o gbiyanju lati bo aso kuro lara oun ni ode ariya ile-eko giga kan.

Original Sentence: Kavanaugh, nínú ẹ̀rí tí kò ká òun fúnrarẹ̀ lára, sọpé ó dá oùn lójú ní gbogbo ọ̀na pé kó ṣẹlẹ̀ rárá.
Modified Sentence: Kavanaugh, ninu eri ti ko ka oun funrare lara, sope o da oun loju ni gbogbo ona pe ko sele rara.

Original Sentence: Ó ṣeé ṣé kí ó jẹ́pé àwọn eniyan tó ju mílíọ̀nù ogun àti ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà irinwo ti Nielsen ròyìn rẹ̀ ló wò o.
Modified Sentence: O see se ki o jepe awon eniyan to ju milionu ogun ati egberun lona irinwo ti Nielsen royin re lo wo o.

Original Sentence: Ilé-iṣẹ́ náà ńṣe òǹka iye agbedeméjí àwọn olùwòran lórí CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News, Channel àti MSNBC.
Modified Sentence: Ile-ise naa nse onka iye agbedemeji awon oluworan lori CBS, ABC, NBC, CNN, Fox News, Channel ati MSNBC.

Original Sentence: Àwọn iye olùwòran kòwá nílẹ̀ lójú ẹsẹ fún àwọn ìtàkùn miran tó fi i hàn, pẹ̀lú PBS, C-SPAN àti Ìtàkùn Oko-òwò Fox.
Modified Sentence: Awon iye oluworan kowa nile loju ese fun awon itakun miran to fi i han, pelu PBS, C-SPAN ati Itakun Oko-owo Fox.

Original Sentence: Àtipé Nielsen sáábà máa ńní ìṣòro ìṣòdiwọ̀n iye àwọn eniyan ti o ńwòran ní àwọn ọ́fíìsì.
Modified Sentence: Atipe Nielsen saaba maa nni isoro isodiwon iye awon eniyan ti o nworan ni awon ofiisi.

Original Sentence: Láti fi ìyẹn sójú ìwòye, ìyẹn jẹ́ ìwọn olùwòran tó dàbí ti ìdíje eré bọ́ọ̀lù aláàfẹ̵sẹ̀gbá kan tàbí ti Ìgbàmì-ìdálólá Academy.
Modified Sentence: Lati fi iyen soju iwoye, iyen je iwon oluworan to dabi ti idije ere boolu alaafesegba kan tabi ti Igbami-idalola Academy.

Original Sentence: Ìkànnì Fox News, tí èrò àwọn olùgbàlejò rẹ̀ ti ṣàtìlẹ́yìn gidigidi fún fífún Kavanaugh níṣẹ́, ló síwáju gbogbo àwọn ìkànnì pẹ̀lú agbedeméjí àwọn olùwòran tííṣe mílíọ̀nù mẹ́fà dín lẹ́gbẹ̀rún mẹ́wàá nínú ìgbẹ́jọ́ tó gba gbogbo ọjọ kan náà, ni Nielsen sọ.
Modified Sentence: Ikanni Fox News, ti ero awon olugbalejo re ti satileyin gidigidi fun fifun Kavanaugh nise, lo siwaju gbogbo awon ikanni pelu agbedemeji awon oluworan tiise milionu mefa din legberun mewaa ninu igbejo to gba gbogbo ojo kan naa, ni Nielsen so.

Original Sentence: ABC ló ṣe ipò kejì pẹ̀lú àwọn olùwòran mílíọ̀nù mẹ́ta àti ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọ̀ọ́dúndínlógójì.
Modified Sentence: ABC lo se ipo keji pelu awon oluworan milionu meta ati egberun lona oodundinlogoji.

Original Sentence: CBS ní mílíọ̀nù 3.1, NBC ní mílíọ̀nù 2.94, MSNBC ní mílíọ̀nù 2.89 tí CNN sì ní mílíọ̀nù 2.52, ni Nielsen sọ.
Modified Sentence: CBS ni milionu 3.1, NBC ni milionu 2.94, MSNBC ni milionu 2.89 ti CNN si ni milionu 2.52, ni Nielsen so.

Original Sentence: Ìfẹ̀ láti mọ ohun tó nlọ sì ga síbẹ̀ lẹ́yìn ìgbẹ́jọ́ náà.
Modified Sentence: Ife lati mo ohun to nlo si ga sibe leyin igbejo naa.

Original Sentence: Flake jẹ ẹni àfojúsùn pàtàkì nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ ọjọ́ Ẹtì.
Modified Sentence: Flake je eni afojusun pataki ninu isele ojo Eti.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn tí ọ́fíìsì òṣèlú alábọ́dé ti Republican ṣe àtẹ̀jáde gbólóhùn kan wípé òun yóò dìbò fún Kavanaugh, àwọn kámẹ́rà CNN àti CBS gbá a mú ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹtì bí àwọn tó ńfì ìbínú wọn hàn ti ńpariwo lé e lórí bí ó ti ńgbiyanju láti wọ inú ẹ̀rọ agbénigòke-àjà lọ́si ibi ìgbéjọ́ Ìgbìmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ kan.
Modified Sentence: Leyin ti ofiisi oselu alabode ti Republican se atejade gbolohun kan wipe oun yoo dibo fun Kavanaugh, awon kamera CNN ati CBS gba a mu ni owuro ojo Eti bi awon to nfi ibinu won han ti npariwo le e lori bi o ti ngbiyanju lati wo inu ero agbenigoke-aja losi ibi igbejo Igbimo Eto Idajo kan.

Original Sentence: Ó dìde pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹyinjú tó doríkodò fún ọ̀pọ̀ ìṣẹ́jú bí  wọ́n tiṣe kàn an lábùkù, tí wọ́n sì gbé e jáde bóti ńṣẹlẹ̀ lori ẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán CNN.
Modified Sentence: O dide pelu awon eyinju to dorikodo fun opo iseju bi  won tise kan an labuku, ti won si gbe e jade boti nsele lori ero amohunmaworan CNN.

Original Sentence: ''Mo ńdúró níbí gan-an ní ìwájú yín,'' ni obìnrin kan sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Mo nduro nibi gan-an ni iwaju yin,'' ni obinrin kan so.

Original Sentence: ''Ǹjẹ́ o rò wípé ó ńsọ òtítọ́ fún orilẹ-ede?
Modified Sentence: ''Nje o ro wipe o nso otito fun orile-ede?

Original Sentence: Wọ́n sọ fún un, ''ìwọ ní agbára nigbati ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn obìnrin jẹ aláìlágbára.''''
Modified Sentence: Won so fun un, ''iwo ni agbara nigbati opo awon obinrin je alailagbara.''''

Original Sentence: Flake sọpé ọ́fíìsí òun ti ṣe àtẹ̀jáde gbólóhùn kan tí ó sì tún wí, kí ẹ̀rọ agbénigòkè-àjà tó palẹ̀kùndé, pé òun yóò ní ọ̀pọ̀ nǹkan láti sọ níbi ìgbẹ́jọ́ ìgbìmọ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Flake sope ofiisi oun ti se atejade gbolohun kan ti o si tun wi, ki ero agbenigoke-aja to palekunde, pe oun yoo ni opo nnkan lati so nibi igbejo igbimo naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìtàkùn olókùn àti ti agbóhùnsáfẹ́fẹ́ ní wọ́n ńgbé ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà bótiṣe ńwáyé lẹ́yìn àwọn wákàtí, nigbati Ìgbìmọ̀ Ètò Ìdájọ́ níláti dìbò láti jẹ́kí ìfanikalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ ti Kavanaugh tẹ̀síwájú sọ́dọ̀ gbogbo àwọn Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà.
Modified Sentence: Awon itakun olokun ati ti agbohunsafefe ni won ngbe isele naa botise nwaye leyin awon wakati, nigbati Igbimo Eto Idajo nilati dibo lati jeki ifanikale fun ise ti Kavanaugh tesiwaju sodo gbogbo awon Asoju-sofin Agba.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n Flake sọpé òun yóò ṣe bẹ́ẹ̀ nìkan pẹ̀lú òye wípé àwọn FBI yóò ṣe ìwáàdì lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn tí wọ́n fi kan ẹnití wọ́n fàkalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ náà fún ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀, eyiti àwọn aṣoju-ṣofin Democrats tó kéré níye ti ńsọpé àwọn ńfẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon Flake sope oun yoo se bee nikan pelu oye wipe awon FBI yoo se iwaadi lori awon esun ti won fi kan eniti won fakale fun ise naa fun ose to nbo, eyiti awon asoju-sofin Democrats to kere niye ti nsope awon nfe.

Original Sentence: Flake ni wọ́n mú ní ìdánilójú ni apá kan nípaṣẹ́ àwọn ìjíròrò pẹ̀lú ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà Chris Coons ti ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Democrats.
Modified Sentence: Flake ni won mu ni idaniloju ni apa kan nipase awon ijiroro pelu ore re Asoju-sofin Agba Chris Coons ti egbe oselu Democrats.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn ìjíròrò kan pẹ̀lú Coons àti ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin àgbà tówáyé lẹ́yìn náà, Flakes ṣe ìpinnu rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Leyin ijiroro kan pelu Coons ati opo awon asoju-sofin agba towaye leyin naa, Flakes se ipinnu re.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀yàn Flakes ni agbára, nitoripe ó ti fojú hàn gbangba pé àwọn ti Repubicans kòní ní àwọn ìbò láti fọwọ́sí Kavanaugh láìsí ìwáàdí náà.
Modified Sentence: Eyan Flakes ni agbara, nitoripe o ti foju han gbangba pe awon ti Repubicans koni ni awon ibo lati fowosi Kavanaugh laisi iwaadi naa.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ Trump ti sí ìwáàdí FBI kan sílẹ̀ láti bojúwo àwọn ẹ̀sùn tí wọn fi kan Kavanaugh.
Modified Sentence: Aare Trump ti si iwaadi FBI kan sile lati bojuwo awon esun ti won fi kan Kavanaugh.

Original Sentence: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì May ńfẹ̀sùn kan àwọn tó ńtọ́kasí àṣiṣe rẹ̀ wípé wọ́n 'ńṣe òṣèlú' pẹlúi ọ̀rọ̀ Brexit
Modified Sentence: Adari Igbimo Ijoba ile Geesi May nfesun kan awon to ntokasi asise re wipe won 'nse oselu' pelui oro Brexit

Original Sentence: Àdari Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Theresa May fẹ̀sùn kan àwọn tó ńsọ nípa ȧṣiṣe tówà nínú àwọn ètò àgbékalẹ rẹ̀ láti fi Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu sílẹ̀ wipe wọ́n ''ńṣe òṣèlú́'' pẹ̀lú ọjọ́ iwájú ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì tí wọn sì ńṣe àkóbá fún ìfẹ́-fún-ire ilẹ̀ náà nínú ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò kan pẹlu ìwé ìròyìn Sunday Times.
Modified Sentence: Adari Igbimo Ijoba Theresa May fesun kan awon to nso nipa asise towa ninu awon eto agbekale re lati fi Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu sile wipe won ''nse oselu'' pelu ojo iwaju ile Geesi ti won si nse akoba fun ife-fun-ire ile naa ninu iforowanilenuwo kan pelu iwe iroyin Sunday Times.

Original Sentence: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Briteeni Theresa May dé síbi ipade Àpèro Ẹgbẹ́ Òṣèlu Conservative ní Birmingham, lórilẹ-ede Briteeni, lọ́jọ́ kọkàndínlọ́gbọ́n, oṣù Owewe, lọ́dún 2018.
Modified Sentence: Adari Igbimo Ijoba Briteeni Theresa May de sibi ipade Apero Egbe Oselu Conservative ni Birmingham, lorile-ede Briteeni, lojo kokandinlogbon, osu Owewe, lodun 2018.

Original Sentence: Nínú ìfọ̀ròwánilẹ́nuwò miran èyí tókàn sí ọ̀kan pẹ̀lú rẹ̀ lójú ewé iwájú ti iwe iroyin náà, aláàkóso rẹ̀ tẹ́lẹ̀ rí fún ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè Boris Johnson tẹramọ́ ìtakoni tó ńṣe lórí ètò àgbékalẹ̀ rẹ̀ tó pè ní Aláràm̀barà fún Brexit, tó sì ńsọpé àbá kan tí ó wípé Briteeni àti àjọ EU níláti máa gba àwọn owó-orí ara wọn jẹ́ eyiti ''ó ńbéèrè àbùkú ní gbogbo ọ̀nà.''
Modified Sentence: Ninu iforowanilenuwo miran eyi tokan si okan pelu re loju ewe iwaju ti iwe iroyin naa, alaakoso re tele ri fun oro ile okeere Boris Johnson teramo itakoni to nse lori eto agbekale re to pe ni Alarambara fun Brexit, to si nsope aba kan ti o wipe Briteeni ati ajo EU nilati maa gba awon owo-ori ara won je eyiti ''o nbeere abuku ni gbogbo ona.''

Original Sentence: Ìbọn yínyín ti Wayde: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá mú Dyteon Simpson lórí ikú agbábọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ LSU
Modified Sentence: Ibon yinyin ti Wayde: Awon oloopa mu Dyteon Simpson lori iku agbaboolu alapere LSU
