Modified Sentence: Awon oloopa ti mu afurasi kan nitori ibon yinyin to jasi iku Wayde Sims, eni ogun odun kan toje agbaboolu alapere ni LSU.

Original Sentence: Dyteon Simpson, ọmọ ogún ọdún, ní wọ́n mú tí wọ́n sì fi sí ọgbà ẹ̀wọ̀n lórí ẹ̀sùn apànìyan onípele kejì, Ẹ̀ka Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Baton Rouge ni o sọ.
Modified Sentence: Dyteon Simpson, omo ogun odun, ni won mu ti won si fi si ogba ewon lori esun apaniyan onipele keji, Eka Awon Oloopa Baton Rouge ni o so.

Original Sentence: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ gbé àwòrán fídíò kan síta tó ṣàfihàn ìtàpórógan láàrin Sims àti Simpson, tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá sì sọpé Sims pàdánù àwọn awò ojú rẹ̀ nínú ìjá náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon osise gbe aworan fidio kan sita to safihan itaporogan laarin Sims ati Simpson, ti awon oloopa si sope Sims padanu awon awo oju re ninu ija naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá rí àwọn awò ojú mú kúrò níbì ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà tí wọ́n sì sọpé wọ́n rí kókó àbùdá àjẹbí DNA ti Simpson lára wọn, ní WAFB tííṣe alájọṣe CBS sọ nínú ìròyìn.
Modified Sentence: Awon oloopa ri awon awo oju mu kuro nibi isele naa ti won si sope won ri koko abuda ajebi DNA ti Simpson lara won, ni WAFB tiise alajose CBS so ninu iroyin.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n bèèrè ọ̀rọ̀ lọ́wọ́ Simpson, àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ní ó gbà wípé òun yin ìbọn tó jásí ikú Wayde.
Modified Sentence: Leyin ti won beere oro lowo Simpson, awon oloopa ni o gba wipe oun yin ibon to jasi iku Wayde.

Original Sentence: Owó oníìdúró rẹ̀ ní wọ́n ti fi sí ẹgbẹ̀rún-lọ́ná-irinwódínláàádọ́ta dọ́la, ìwé Advocate  ní ́o ìròyìn bẹẹ,
Modified Sentence: Owo oniiduro re ni won ti fi si egberun-lona-irinwodinlaaadota dola, iwe Advocate  ni o iroyin bee,

Original Sentence: Ọ́fíisì Olùwáàdí Ikú ti Ẹ̀ka Ìla Oòrùn Baton gbé ìròyìn ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ kan jadé lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì, tó ńsọpé ohun tó ṣokùnfa ikù ní ọgbẹ́ ìbọn kan tí wọn yìn sí orí náà sínú ọrùn.
Modified Sentence: Ofiisi Oluwaadi Iku ti Eka Ila Oorun Baton gbe iroyin ibere kan jade lojo Eti, to nsope ohun to sokunfa iku ni ogbe ibon kan ti won yin si ori naa sinu orun.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀ka náà ńkan sáará sí ikọ̀ amúṣẹ́ṣe lóri àwọn ìsáǹsá ti Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Ìpínlẹ̀ Louisiana, ilé iṣẹ́ aṣàyẹ̀wò ìwà ọ̀daràn ti àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá ìpínlẹ̀, àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá Yunifasiti Gúsúù àti àwọn olùgbé agbègbè náà fún ríràn wọ́n lọ́wọ́ nínu ìwáàdí eyiti o jẹ́kí wọ́n mú afurasí náà.
Modified Sentence: Eka naa nkan saara si iko amusese lori awon isansa ti Awon Oloopa Ipinle Louisiana, ile ise asayewo iwa odaran ti awon oloopa ipinle, awon oloopa Yunifasiti Gusuu ati awon olugbe agbegbe naa fun riran won lowo ninu iwaadi eyiti o jeki won mu afurasi naa.

Original Sentence: Olùdarí eré ìdárayá LSU Joe Alleva dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn agbófinró agbègbè fún ''iṣẹ́ takun-takun àti ilépa ìdájọ́'' wọn.
Modified Sentence: Oludari ere idaraya LSU Joe Alleva dupe lowo awon agbofinro agbegbe fun ''ise takun-takun ati ilepa idajo'' won.

Original Sentence: Sims jẹ́ ọmọ ogún ọdún lọ́jọ́ orí.
Modified Sentence: Sims je omo ogun odun lojo ori.

Original Sentence: Onípo-iwáju náà tóga níwọ̀n ẹsẹ̀ bàtà mẹ́fà àti íǹsì mẹ́fà dàgbà ní Baton Rouge, nibiti bàbá rẹ̀, Wayne, bákannáà ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ fún LSU.
Modified Sentence: Onipo-iwaju naa toga niwon ese bata mefa ati insi mefa dagba ni Baton Rouge, nibiti baba re, Wayne, bakannaa ti gba boolu alapere fun LSU.

Original Sentence: Ó gba kókó 5.6 ati àwọn àtúntasókè 2.6 níti agbedeméji nínú eré ní sáà tó kọjá.
Modified Sentence: O gba koko 5.6 ati awon atuntasoke 2.6 niti agbedemeji ninu ere ni saa to koja.

Original Sentence: Ní òwúrọ ọjọ́ Ẹtì, akọ́nimọ̀-ọ́n-gbá bọ́ọ̀lù alápẹ̀rẹ̀ ti LSU Will Wade sọpé ikọ̀ náà wà nínú ''ipò aláìlágbára'' àtipé ''háà ṣe wọ́n'' nípaṣẹ̵̀ ikú Wayde.
Modified Sentence: Ni owuro ojo Eti, akonimo-on-gba boolu alapere ti LSU Will Wade sope iko naa wa ninu ''ipo alailagbara'' atipe ''haa se won'' nipase iku Wayde.

Original Sentence: Wade sowipe ''Èyí ní ohun ti ó ma ńṣàníyàn rẹ̀ ní gbogbo igbà,'̣.
Modified Sentence: Wade sowipe ''Eyi ni ohun ti o ma nsaniyan re ni gbogbo igba,'.

Original Sentence: Orí-ilẹ̀ tó lanu Fòlikánò ńpọ̀ eérú jáde ní Ìlú Mẹ́ṣíkò
Modified Sentence: Ori-ile to lanu Folikano npo eeru jade ni Ilu Mesiko

Original Sentence: Eérú tí a ńpọ̀ jáde láti orí-ilẹ́ tí ó lanu Fòlìkánò Popocatepetl ti dé àwọn agbègbe gúúsù ti olú-ìlú orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò.
Modified Sentence: Eeru ti a npo jade lati ori-ile ti o lanu Folikano Popocatepetl ti de awon agbegbe guusu ti olu-ilu orile-ede Mesiko.

Original Sentence: Ibùdò tó Ńrísí Dídènà Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ Àjálù Lorilẹ-ede ti kìlọ fún àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta wípé kí wọn kùrò níbi fòlìkánò náà lẹ́yìn tí iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ gbéra sókè lẹ́nu ihò tí wọ́n sì ṣàkọsílẹ̀ àwọn ìtújáde afẹ́fẹ́ àti eérú nígbà mẹ́tàlélọ́gọ́sán láàrin wákàtí mẹ́riǹlélógún.
Modified Sentence: Ibudo to Nrisi Didena Isele Ajalu Lorile-ede ti kilo fun awon omo orile-ede Mesiko lojo Abameta wipe ki won kuro nibi folikano naa leyin ti ise re gbera soke lenu iho ti won si sakosile awon itujade afefe ati eeru nigba metalelogosan laarin wakati merinlelogun.

Original Sentence: Ibùdó náà ńṣàkíyèsí ọpọlọpọ àwọn ìrọ́kẹ̀kẹ̀ àti ìmìtìtì ilẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ibudo naa nsakiyesi opolopo awon irokeke ati imititi ile.

Original Sentence: Àwọn aworan lori àwọn ojú-òpó ìbáṣepọ̀ ti ayelujara ṣàfihàn àwọn ipele fẹ́rẹfẹ́ éerú lárá gíláàsì àwọn ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ ní àwọn agbègbè ti Ìlú Mẹ́ṣíkò bíi Xochimilco.
Modified Sentence: Awon aworan lori awon oju-opo ibasepo ti ayelujara safihan awon ipele ferefe eeru lara gilaasi awon oko ayokele ni awon agbegbe ti Ilu Mesiko bii Xochimilco.

Original Sentence: Àwọn onímọ-orilẹ-ayé ti ṣàkíyèsí pípọ̀síi nínú iṣẹ́ níbí fòlìkánò náà eyiti ó jókòó ní máìlì máàrúndínláàádọ́ta (kilomita méjìléláàádọ́rin) ní ìlà-oórùn gúúsù ti olú-ìlú náà lẹ́yìn ti ilẹ̀ rírì oníwọ̀n-7.1 kan tó ṣe ọṣẹ́ ní ààrin-gùngùn Mẹ́ṣíkò nínú oṣù Owewe lọ́dún 2017.
Modified Sentence: Awon onimo-orile-aye ti sakiyesi piposii ninu ise nibi folikano naa eyiti o jokoo ni maili maarundinlaaadota (kilomita mejilelaaadorin) ni ila-oorun guusu ti olu-ilu naa leyin ti ile riri oniwon-7.1 kan to se ose ni aarin-gungun Mesiko ninu osu Owewe lodun 2017.

Original Sentence: Fòlìkánò náà tí wọ́n mọ̀ bíi ''Don Goyo'' ti ńṣiṣé di ìsinsìnyí láti ọdún 1994.
Modified Sentence: Folikano naa ti won mo bii ''Don Goyo'' ti nsise di isinsinyi lati odun 1994.

Original Sentence: Ìkọlù àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá pẹ̀lú àwọn ajàfómìnira Catalan sáájú àjọ̀dun ìbò òmìnira
Modified Sentence: Ikolu awon oloopa pelu awon ajafominira Catalan saaju ajodun ibo ominira

Original Sentence: Eniyan mẹ́fà ni wọ́n mú sátìmọ́lé ní ìlú Barcelona lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta lẹ́yìn tí àwọn tó ńfẹ̀hónúhàn nitori àti-gbòmìnira kọlú àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀, tí bíi àwọn ẹgbẹ̀rún eniyan sì darapọ̀ mọ awọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn olórogún miran láti ṣààmi àjọ̀dún àkọ́kọ́ ti ìbò tópín ilẹ̀ Catalonia sì méjì lórí àti dá dúró bíi olómìnira.
Modified Sentence: Eniyan mefa ni won mu satimole ni ilu Barcelona lojo Abameta leyin ti awon to nfehonuhan nitori ati-gbominira kolu awon oloopa apana-ote, ti bii awon egberun eniyan si darapo mo awon ifehonuhan olorogun miran lati saami ajodun akoko ti ibo topin ile Catalonia si meji lori ati da duro bii olominira.

Original Sentence: Ẹgbẹ́ kan ti àwọn tófẹ́ omìnira tíwọn lo ìbòjú tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀ dínà mọ́ ńju wọ́n lókò pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹyin ti wọn sì tún ńfẹ́ ọ̀dà aláàtíkè sí wọn, eyiti ó ṣẹ̀dá àwọn kùrukùru eruku dúdú ní àwọn òpópónà tí ó máa ńsáábà kún fọ́fọ́ fún àwọn arìnrìn-àjò ìgbafẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Egbe kan ti awon tofe ominira tiwon lo iboju ti awon oloopa apana-ote dina mo nju won loko pelu awon eyin ti won si tun nfe oda alaatike si won, eyiti o seda awon kurukuru eruku dudu ni awon opopona ti o maa nsaaba kun fofo fun awon arinrin-ajo igbafe.

Original Sentence: Ìjàngbọ̀n tún bẹ́ sílẹ̀ nígbà tóyá lọ́jọ́ náà pẹ̀lú àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá tíwọn ńlo kóńdò wọn láti kápá ìjà náà.
Modified Sentence: Ijangbon tun be sile nigba toya lojo naa pelu awon oloopa tiwon nlo kondo won lati kapa ija naa.

Original Sentence: Fún ọ̀pọ̀ wákàtí ni àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tófẹ́ òmìnira fi ńkọrin ''Kòsí gbígbàgbé, kòsí ìdáríjìn'' tíwọ́n sì kọjú ìjà sí àwọn tó ńfẹ̀hónúhàn fún ìsọkan tó ńpariwo, ''Ḱ Sipeeni kí ó pẹ́.''
Modified Sentence: Fun opo wakati ni awon egbe tofe ominira fi nkorin ''Kosi gbigbagbe, kosi idarijin'' tiwon si koju ija si awon to nfehonuhan fun isokan to npariwo, ''K Sipeeni ki o pe.''

Original Sentence: Eniyan mẹ́rìnlá ló gba ìtọ́jú fún ìfarapa díẹ̀ tí wọ́n ní níbí àwọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn náà, ni àwọn oníròyìn agbègbè sọ.
Modified Sentence: Eniyan merinla lo gba itoju fun ifarapa die ti won ni nibi awon ifehonuhan naa, ni awon oniroyin agbegbe so.

Original Sentence: Àwọn àìbalẹ̀-ọkàn tóga sì wà ní agbègbe tófẹ́ òmìnira lẹ́yìn ọdún kan tíwọn dìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ní ọjọ́ Kìn-ín-ní oṣù Ọ̀wàrà eyiti Madrid sọpé ó lòdì sófin ṣùgbọ́n tí àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Catalonia tófẹ òmìnira ńṣàjọyọ̀ rẹ̀
Modified Sentence: Awon aibale-okan toga si wa ni agbegbe tofe ominira leyin odun kan tiwon dibo onibeeni-beeko ni ojo Kin-in-ni osu Owara eyiti Madrid sope o lodi sofin sugbon ti awon omo ile Catalonia tofe ominira nsajoyo re

Original Sentence: Àwọn olùdìbò yàn lọ́ná tí kòṣeé dojúkọ láti di olómìnira, botilẹjepe iye àwọn tó jáde dìbò kéré pẹ̀lú ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn tó ńtako dídádúró tíwọn dẹ́yẹ sí ìbò náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon oludibo yan lona ti kosee dojuko lati di olominira, botilejepe iye awon to jade dibo kere pelu opo awon to ntako didaduro tiwon deye si ibo naa.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn aláṣẹ Catalonia ti wí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ tó ẹgbẹ̀rún eniyan tí ó farapa lọ́dún tó kọjá lẹ́yìn tí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá gbìyànjú láti dá ìbò tó ńlọ dúró ní àwọn ibùdó ìdìbò káàkiri agbègbè náà nínú àwọn ìkọlù ipá.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi awon alase Catalonia ti wi o fere to egberun eniyan ti o farapa lodun to koja leyin ti awon oloopa gbiyanju lati da ibo to nlo duro ni awon ibudo idibo kaakiri agbegbe naa ninu awon ikolu ipa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ẹgbẹ́ tófẹ́ òmìnira ti pàgọ́ síta ní gbogbo òru ọjọ́ Ẹtì láti ìwọ́de kan tíwọ́n fẹ́ fi ṣàtìlẹyìn fún àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá orilẹ-ede náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon egbe tofe ominira ti pago sita ni gbogbo oru ojo Eti lati iwode kan tiwon fe fi satileyin fun awon oloopa orile-ede naa.

Original Sentence: Ìwọ́de náà tẹ̀síwájú ṣùgbọn wọ́n fi ipá mú un láti gba ọ̀nà kan tó yàtọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Iwode naa tesiwaju sugbon won fi ipa mu un lati gba ona kan to yato.

Original Sentence: Narcis Termes, ẹni ọdún méjìdínláàádọ́rin, òṣìṣẹ́ iná mànàmáná tó ńlọ síbí ìfẹ̀hónúhàn àwọn tófẹ òmìnira pẹ̀lú aya rẹ̀ sọpé òun kòní ìrètí mọ́ nípa ìṣọwọ́ṣeéṣe àṣeyọrí fún Catalonia láti gba òmìnira.
Modified Sentence: Narcis Termes, eni odun mejidinlaaadorin, osise ina manamana to nlo sibi ifehonuhan awon tofe ominira pelu aya re sope oun koni ireti mo nipa isowoseese aseyori fun Catalonia lati gba ominira.

Original Sentence: ''Lọ́dún tó kọjá a gbé nínù ọ̀kan nínú àwọn àkókò tó dára jùlọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Lodun to koja a gbe ninu okan ninu awon akoko to dara julo.

Original Sentence: Mo wo àwọn òbí mi bí wọ́n ti ńsọkún ayọ̀ nitori pe wọ́n leè dìbo sùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí a ti há sójú kan,'' ni o sọ.
Modified Sentence: Mo wo awon obi mi bi won ti nsokun ayo nitori pe won lee dibo sugbon nisinsinyi a ti ha soju kan,'' ni o so.

Original Sentence: Pẹ̀lú wípé wọ́n rápálá láti jáwé olúborí tóṣe pàtakì nínú àwọn ìbò agbègbè nínú oṣù Ọpẹ́ tó kọjá, àwọn ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Catalonia tófẹ́ òmìnira ti làkàkà láti tún di agbára mú lọ́dún yìí p̀ẹlú wípé ọ̀pọ̀ nínú àwọn adarí wọn tí wọ́n gbajúmọ̀ jùlọ ti sálọ lọ sájò fúnrawọn tàbí kí wọ́n wà látìmọ́lé nibiti wọn tí ńdúró dé ìgbẹ́jọ́ fún ipa ti wọ́n kó nínú ṣíṣe ètò ìdìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ àti kíkéde òmìnira lẹ́yìn rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Pelu wipe won rapala lati jawe olubori tose pataki ninu awon ibo agbegbe ninu osu Ope to koja, awon egbe oselu Catalonia tofe ominira ti lakaka lati tun di agbara mu lodun yii pelu wipe opo ninu awon adari won ti won gbajumo julo ti salo lo sajo funrawon tabi ki won wa latimole nibiti won ti nduro de igbejo fun ipa ti won ko ninu sise eto idibo onibeeni-beeko ati kikede ominira leyin re.

Original Sentence: Joan Puig, òṣìṣẹ́ àtọkọ̀ṣe ẹni ọdún méjìlélógójì tó ńṣe ìgbàsílẹ̀ ìfẹ̀hónúhàn hàn fún àtìlẹ́yìn àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá lórí fóònu rẹ̀, sọpé aáwọ̀ nàà ní àwọn òṣèlu ti rú iná sí ní àwọn ìhà méjèèjì.
Modified Sentence: Joan Puig, osise atokose eni odun mejilelogoji to nse igbasile ifehonuhan han fun atileyin awon oloopa lori foonu re, sope aawo naa ni awon oselu ti ru ina si ni awon iha mejeeji.

Original Sentence: ''Ó kàn túnbọ̀ ńgbóná síwájú àti síwájú síi,'' ní ó sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''O kan tunbo ngbona siwaju ati siwaju sii,'' ni o so.

Original Sentence: Lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, Oriol Junqueras, ọ̀kan nínú àwọn adarí Catalonia tówà lẹ́wọ̀n kí ìgbẹ́jọ́ tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti òpin ọdún tó kọjá, kéde wípé òun yóò díje nínú àwọn ìdìbò sílé Ìgbímọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin ti Àjọ Yuroopu lọ́dún tó ńbọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Lojo Abameta, Oriol Junqueras, okan ninu awon adari Catalonia towa lewon ki igbejo to bere lati opin odun to koja, kede wipe oun yoo dije ninu awon idibo sile Igbimo Asoju-sofin ti Ajo Yuroopu lodun to nbo.

Original Sentence: ''Dídúró bíi olùdíje kan fún àwọn ìdìbò ti Yuroopu ni ọ̀nà kan tó dára jùlọ láti kọ ìfàsẹ́yìn tó ńdébá àwọn ohun rere ti ìjọba àwarawa àti inira tí a tí láti ọwọ́ ìjọba Sipeeni.
Modified Sentence: ''Diduro bii oludije kan fun awon idibo ti Yuroopu ni ona kan to dara julo lati ko ifaseyin to ndeba awon ohun rere ti ijoba awarawa ati inira ti a ti lati owo ijoba Sipeeni.

Original Sentence: Ìlú Lọndọnderi: Wọ́n mú àwọn ọkùnrin sátìmọ́lé lẹ́yìn ìfipáwa-ọkọ́ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ wọnú ilé
Modified Sentence: Ilu Londonderi: Won mu awon okunrin satimole leyin ifipawa-oko ayokele wonu ile

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọkùnrin mẹ́ta, tí ọjọ́-orí wọn jẹ́ ọdún mẹ́tàlélọ́gbọ̀n, mẹ́rìnlélọ́gbọ̀n àti ọ̀kàndínlógójì ni wọn ti mú sátìmọ́lé lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fi ipá wa ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ wọ inú ilé kan léra-léra ní ìlú Lọndọndẹri.
Modified Sentence: Awon okunrin meta, ti ojo-ori won je odun metalelogbon, merinlelogbon ati okandinlogoji ni won ti mu satimole leyin ti won fi ipa wa oko ayokele wo inu ile kan lera-lera ni ilu Londonderi.

Original Sentence: Ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà fojú hàn síta ní Ballynagard Crescent lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀ ní bíi aago méje àti ààbọ̀ alẹ́ Àkókò ti Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.
Modified Sentence: Isele naa foju han sita ni Ballynagard Crescent lojo 'Bo ni bii aago meje ati aabo ale Akoko ti Geesi.

Original Sentence: Òṣiṣẹ́ Ọ̀tẹlẹ̀múyẹ́ Bob Blemmings sọpé ó fa ìdíbàjẹ́ fún ẹnu-ọ̀nà ilé àti ile gan-an fúnrarẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Osise Otelemuye Bob Blemmings sope o fa idibaje fun enu-ona ile ati ile gan-an funrare.

Original Sentence: Ó ṣeé ṣe kí wọ́n ti fi ọrún alásomọ́gi kan ta ọfà mọ́ ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ nàà nigba kan rí.
Modified Sentence: O see se ki won ti fi orun alasomogi kan ta ofa mo oko ayokele naa nigba kan ri.

Original Sentence: Gbígbá aláìtàsé ti Menga fún Livingston ní ìborí 1-0 lórí Rangers.
Modified Sentence: Gbigba alaitase ti Menga fun Livingston ni ibori 1-0 lori Rangers.

Original Sentence: Bọ́ọ̀lù àkọ́kọ́ tí Dolly Menga gbá wọlé fún Livingston ló mú ìṣẹ́gun dájú
Modified Sentence: Boolu akoko ti Dolly Menga gba wole fun Livingston lo mu isegun daju

Original Sentence: Livingston tó gba ìgbéga sọ Ranger di òmùgọ̀ láti fi Steven Gerrard sínù ìjákulẹ̀ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji rẹ nínú ìdíje méjìdínlógún gẹ́gẹ́bí alaakoso fún ẹgbẹ́ Ibrox náà.
Modified Sentence: Livingston to gba igbega so Ranger di omugo lati fi Steven Gerrard sinu ijakule eleekeji re ninu idije mejidinlogun gegebi alaakoso fun egbe Ibrox naa.

Original Sentence: Gbígbá aláìtàsé ti Dolly Menga fihàn gbangba pé ohun ni ìyàtọ̀ náà bí ẹgbẹ́ ti Gary Holt sún ipele pẹ̀lú Hibernian ní ipò keji.
Modified Sentence: Gbigba alaitase ti Dolly Menga fihan gbangba pe ohun ni iyato naa bi egbe ti Gary Holt sun ipele pelu Hibernian ni ipo keji.

Original Sentence: Ẹgbẹ́ ti Gerrard sì wà síbẹ̀ láìní ìbori kankan lẹ́yìn odi nínú Ìṣọ̀rí Líìgí Àkọ́kọ́ ní sáà yìí tí wọ́n sí ńkojú àwọn olóri tííṣe Hearts, ẹniti wọ́n ńtẹ̀lé pẹ̀lú àmì kókó mẹ́jọ, lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta tó ńbọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Egbe ti Gerrard si wa sibe laini ibori kankan leyin odi ninu Isori Liigi Akoko ni saa yii ti won si nkoju awon olori tiise Hearts, eniti won ntele pelu ami koko mejo, lojo Abameta to nbo.

Original Sentence: Saájú rẹ̀, Rangers ti gbàlejò Rapid Vienna nínú Líìgì Yuropa lọjọ 'Bọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Saaju re, Rangers ti gbalejo Rapid Vienna ninu Liigi Yuropa lojo 'Bo.

Original Sentence: Livingston, ẹ̀wẹ̀, sì ńmú aré aílàní-ìjákulẹ̀ rẹ gbòòrò síi nínú ìpín náà lọsí ìdíje mẹ́fà, pẹ̀lú olórí akọ́nimọ̀-ọ́n-gbá Holt tí kò tíì tọ́ ìjákulẹ̀ wo lẹ́yìn tí ó ti pààrọ̀ Kenny Miller lóṣu tó kọjá.
Modified Sentence: Livingston, ewe, si nmu are ailani-ijakule re gbooro sii ninu ipin naa losi idije mefa, pelu olori akonimo-on-gba Holt ti ko tii to ijakule wo leyin ti o ti paaro Kenny Miller losu to koja.

Original Sentence: Livinston pàdánù àwọn àǹfààní tóyẹ kí ó lò lòdì sí àwọn olùbẹwò kògbérèégbè
Modified Sentence: Livinston padanu awon anfaani toye ki o lo lodi si awon olubewo kogbereegbe

Original Sentence: Ìkọ ti Holt yẹ kóti wà níwájú tipẹ́ kí wọ́n tó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé, pẹ̀lú ìgbájúmọ́ sí ìlépa wọn eyiti ó fa oŕiṣiriṣi àwọn ìyọnu fún Rangers.
Modified Sentence: Iko ti Holt ye koti wa niwaju tipe ki won to gba boolu wole, pelu igbajumo si ilepa won eyiti o fa orisirisi awon iyonu fun Rangers.

Original Sentence: Scott Robinson la àlùyọ ṣùgbọ́n ó fa igbiyanju rẹ nílẹ̀ nìgbàtí ó kọjú sílé latí gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé, lẹ́yìn náà Alan Lithgow kàn leè kọjú ipá tirẹ̀ sí igbó lẹ́yìn tó ti yọ wọlé láti pàdé àforìgbá ti Craig Halkett lójú ilé.
Modified Sentence: Scott Robinson la aluyo sugbon o fa igbiyanju re nile nigbati o koju sile lati gba boolu wole, leyin naa Alan Lithgow kan lee koju ipa tire si igbo leyin to ti yo wole lati pade aforigba ti Craig Halkett loju ile.

Original Sentence: Àwọn olùgbàlejò náà ti ní ìtẹ́lọ́rùn láti jẹ́kí Rangers gbá bọ́ọ̀lú níwájú wọn, pẹ̀lu pé wọ́n mọ́pè àwọn leè da àwọn náà ní ẹyọ-ẹyọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon olugbalejo naa ti ni itelorun lati jeki Rangers gba boolu niwaju won, pelu pe won mope awon lee da awon naa ni eyo-eyo.

Original Sentence: Ìyẹn sì ni ọ̀nà náà tí àmì ayò tóṣe pàtàkì náà fi wá.
Modified Sentence: Iyen si ni ona naa ti ami ayo tose pataki naa fi wa.

Original Sentence: Rangers fáàyè gba ìjìya bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbá aláìsí-àtakò tí Livinston sì ṣiṣẹ́ láti sí ọ̀nà kan sílẹ̀, Declan Gallagher àti Robinson ńpá iṣẹ́ pọ̀ láti fún Menga ni àǹfààní, ẹniti ó gba ìfọwọ́kàn kàn tí ó sì gbá bọ́ọ̀lù wọlé ní ààrin àpótí ìjìya pẹnariti náà.
Modified Sentence: Rangers faaye gba ijiya boolu gbigba alaisi-atako ti Livinston si sise lati si ona kan sile, Declan Gallagher ati Robinson npa ise po lati fun Menga ni anfaani, eniti o gba ifowokan kan ti o si gba boolu wole ni aarin apoti ijiya penariti naa.

Original Sentence: Ní ipele yẹn, Rangers ti borí nípa kí bọ́ọ̀lù pẹ́ lẹ́sẹ̀ ẹni sùgbọ́n wọ́n ti rí i pé ààbò àwọn onile kòṣeé wọ tí kòsí sí ìpayá rárá fún olùṣọ́lé Liam Kelly.
Modified Sentence: Ni ipele yen, Rangers ti bori nipa ki boolu pe lese eni sugbon won ti ri i pe aabo awon onile kosee wo ti kosi si ipaya rara fun olusole Liam Kelly.

Original Sentence: Bátàni yẹn tẹsiwaju wọ inú abala keji ìdíje náà botilẹjẹpe Alfred Morelos fi ipa mú Kelly láti dènà ìwọlé bọ́ọ̀lù kan.
Modified Sentence: Batani yen tesiwaju wo inu abala keji idije naa botilejepe Alfred Morelos fi ipa mu Kelly lati dena iwole boolu kan.

Original Sentence: Scott Pittman ní a fi àǹfàànì dùn nípaṣẹ̀ ẹsẹ̀ olùṣọ́lé Rangers Allan McGregor tí Lithgow sì gbá bọ́ọ̀lù miran tí Livingston fún un dànù sígbó.
Modified Sentence: Scott Pittman ni a fi anfaani dun nipase ese olusole Rangers Allan McGregor ti Lithgow si gba boolu miran ti Livingston fun un danu sigbo.

Original Sentence: Bọ́ọ̀lù ńtẹ̀síwájú láti máa wá sínú àpòtí pẹnariti ti Livinston láti àwọn igun-ilé tí wọ́n sì ńgbá wọn dànu, nigbati àwọn ìbèèrè fún ẹ̀tọ́ ìjìyà pẹnariti méjì -lẹ́yìn i̇̀kọlù Halkett lórí àfirọ́pò Glenn Middleton, àti ọ̀kan fún bọ́ọ̀lù àfọwọ́mù - ni wọ́n bí dànù.
Modified Sentence: Boolu ntesiwaju lati maa wa sinu apoti penariti ti Livinston lati awon igun-ile ti won si ngba won danu, nigbati awon ibeere fun eto ijiya penariti meji -leyin ikolu Halkett lori afiropo Glenn Middleton, ati okan fun boolu afowomu - ni won bi danu.

Original Sentence: 'Ìyanu Àrà-ọ̀tọ̀' láti Livingston - ìṣàtúpalẹ̀
Modified Sentence: 'Iyanu Ara-oto' lati Livingston - isatupale

Original Sentence: Alasdair Lamont ti BBC Scotland ní Gbàgede Tony Macaroni
Modified Sentence: Alasdair Lamont ti BBC Scotland ni Gbagede Tony Macaroni

Original Sentence: Iṣẹ́ takun-takun àra-ọ̀tọ̀ tó yanilẹ́nu àti èsì fún Livingston.
Modified Sentence: Ise takun-takun ara-oto to yanilenu ati esi fun Livingston.

Original Sentence: Sí ẹnìkan, wọ́n j̇ẹ́ ohun tó tayọ, títẹ̀síwájú láti tayọ àwọn ìrètí lójú ipa ọ̀nà òké yìí.
Modified Sentence: Si enikan, won je ohun to tayo, titesiwaju lati tayo awon ireti loju ipa ona oke yii.

Original Sentence: Ìrúfẹ ọ̀nà bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbá wọn àti àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ kò fí bẹ́ẹ̀ yípadà láti ìgbà ìpadàbọ̀ wọn sókè, sùgbọn òṣùbà ńlá nilati lọ́ sọ́dọ̀ Holt fun ọ̀nà tí ó gbà ṣékóríyá fún ikọ̀ náà láti ìgbà tí ò ti dé.
Modified Sentence: Irufe ona boolu gbigba won ati awon osise ko fi bee yipada lati igba ipadabo won soke, sugbon osuba nla nilati lo sodo Holt fun ona ti o gba sekoriya fun iko naa lati igba ti o ti de.

Original Sentence: Ó ní ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn akọni.
Modified Sentence: O ni opo awon akoni.

Original Sentence: Balògun Halkett pọ̀lọ́kan, tí ó ndarí ààbò eyiti ààtò rẹ̀ lágbára, nigbati Menga fi Connor Golson àti Joe Worall sípò àìnísinmi lórí ẹsẹ̀ títí tí ìdíje fi parí.
Modified Sentence: Balogun Halkett polokan, ti o ndari aabo eyiti aato re lagbara, nigbati Menga fi Connor Golson ati Joe Worall sipo ainisinmi lori ese titi ti idije fi pari.

Original Sentence: Rangers kòní ìmísí, bótiwùkórí.
Modified Sentence: Rangers koni imisi, botiwukori.

Original Sentence: Bí wọ́n ti dára tó ni àwọn àkókò tíwọ́n lábẹ́ Gerrard, wọ́n kùnà gidi láti dé irú àwọn òdiwọ̀n wọ̀nyẹn.
Modified Sentence: Bi won ti dara to ni awon akoko tiwon labe Gerrard, won kuna gidi lati de iru awon odiwon wonyen.

Original Sentence: Bọ́ọ̀lù wọn tó gbẹ̀yìn ṣe aláìpéye - ẹ̀ẹ̀kan ṣoṣo ni wọ́n sí ilé awọn onílé sílẹ̀ - tí èyí sì jẹ nǹkan bíi ìpè ìtanijí kan fún Rangers, àwọn tí wọn ti rí ara wọn laàrin tábìlì ìṣòrí.
Modified Sentence: Boolu won to gbeyin se alaipeye - eekan soso ni won si ile awon onile sile - ti eyi si je nnkan bii ipe itaniji kan fun Rangers, awon ti won ti ri ara won laarin tabili isori.

Original Sentence: Erdogan gba ìgbanilálejò aládàlú ní Cologne
Modified Sentence: Erdogan gba igbanilalejo aladalu ni Cologne

Original Sentence: Àwọn ẹ̀rín àti ojú-ọrun aláwọ aró lówà lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́tà (ìkọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣ̀ù Owewe) bí àwọn adari orilẹ-ede Tọ́kì àti orilẹ-ede Jamani ṣe pàdé fún oúnjẹ òwúrọ̀ ní ìlú Berlin.
Modified Sentence: Awon erin ati oju-orun alawo aro lowa lojo Abameta (ikokandinlogbon osu Owewe) bi awon adari orile-ede Toki ati orile-ede Jamani se pade fun ounje owuro ni ilu Berlin.

Original Sentence: Ó jẹ́ ọjọ tó gbẹ̀yìn ti ìbẹ̀wò aláàríyànjiyàn Aàrẹ Erdogan sí orilẹ-ede Jamani - eyiti ó fi lépa ọ̀nà  láti tún ìbáṣepọ̀ tówà láàrin alájọṣe NATO ṣe.
Modified Sentence: O je ojo to gbeyin ti ibewo alaariyanjiyan Aare Erdogan si orile-ede Jamani - eyiti o fi lepa ona  lati tun ibasepo towa laarin alajose NATO se.

Original Sentence: Wọn tí ni èdè-àìyede lórí àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ẹ̀tọ̀ ọmọniyàn, òmìnira àwọn oníròyìn àti ètò ìṣàfikún orilẹ-ede Tọki sínú àjọ EU.
Modified Sentence: Won ti ni ede-aiyede lori awon oro to niise pelu eto omoniyan, ominira awon oniroyin ati eto isafikun orile-ede Toki sinu ajo EU.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn náà ni Erdogan dári lọ sí ìlú Cologne láti sí mọ́sálásí ńlá kan.
Modified Sentence: Leyin naa ni Erdogan dari lo si ilu Cologne lati si mosalasi nla kan.

Original Sentence: Ìlú náà jẹ́ ilé fún àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Tọki tópọ̀ jùlọ lẹ́yìn odi Tọki.
Modified Sentence: Ilu naa je ile fun awon omo ile Toki topo julo leyin odi Toki.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá sọpé fún ìdí ààbò àwọn nilati dínà mọ́ èrò  ẹlẹ́gbẹ̀rún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dọ́gbọ̀n eniyan kí wọ́n má baà leè péjò niwaju mọ́sálásí náà, ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn jáde wa nítòsí láti rí ààrẹ wọn.
Modified Sentence: Awon oloopa sope fun idi aabo awon nilati dina mo ero  elegberun meeedogbon eniyan ki won ma baa lee pejo niwaju mosalasi naa, sugbon opo awon alatileyin jade wa nitosi lati ri aare won.

Original Sentence: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn afẹ̀hónúhàn tíwọ́n jẹ́ alátakò Erdogan - tí ọ̀pọ̀ ninu wọn jẹ ẹ̀yà Kurd - bákannáà fọ ohùn wọn fáyé gbọ́, tíwọn sì ńbu ẹnu atẹ́ lu àwọn ìlànà ìṣejọba Erdogan àti ìpinnu ìjọba ilẹ̀ Jamani láti kì i káàbọ sí orilẹ-ede náà.
Modified Sentence: Ogo-ogoorun awon afehonuhan tiwon je alatako Erdogan - ti opo ninu won je eya Kurd - bakannaa fo ohun won faye gbo, tiwon si nbu enu ate lu awon ilana isejoba Erdogan ati ipinnu ijoba ile Jamani lati ki i kaabo si orile-ede naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìfẹ̀hónúhàn oníjà náà fi ìṣègbè olùbẹ̀wò kan hàn ẹniti àwọn ọmọ Tọki ilẹ̀ Jamani kan ńyìn bí akọni tí àwọn miran sì ńsọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ láburú bí afipáṣejọba kan.
Modified Sentence: Awon ifehonuhan onija naa fi isegbe olubewo kan han eniti awon omo Toki ile Jamani kan nyin bi akoni ti awon miran si nsoro re laburu bi afipasejoba kan.

Original Sentence: Ìjàm̀bá òpópónà Deptford: Agunkẹ̀kẹ́ kú nínú ìforísọrawọn pẹ̀lú ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́
Modified Sentence: Ijamba opopona Deptford: Agunkeke ku ninu iforisorawon pelu oko ayokele

Original Sentence: Agunkẹ̀kẹ́ kan ti kú nínú ìforísọrawọn kan tí ó nííṣe pẹ̀lú ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ kan ní ìlú Lọndọnu.
Modified Sentence: Agunkeke kan ti ku ninu iforisorawon kan ti o niise pelu oko ayokele kan ni ilu Londonu.

Original Sentence: Ìjàm̀bá náà ṣẹlẹ̀ nítòsí oríta ti Òpópónà Bestwood àti Òpópònà Evelyn, ọ̀nà kàn tí kìí sinmi ní Deptfird, ní ìlà-oòrùn ìlú náà ní bíi aago mẹ́wàá kọjá ìṣẹ́gún mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún Àkókò Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.
Modified Sentence: Ijamba naa sele nitosi orita ti Opopona Bestwood ati Opopona Evelyn, ona kan ti kii sinmi ni Deptfird, ni ila-oorun ilu naa ni bii aago mewaa koja isegun meeedogun Akoko Geesi.

Original Sentence: Awakọ̀ ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà dúró tí àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìlera sì mójútó o, s̀ugbọ́n ọkùnrin náà kú níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Awako oko ayokele naa duro ti awon osise ilera si mojuto o, sugbon okunrin naa ku nibi isele naa.

Original Sentence: Ìjàm̀bá náà wáyé lẹ́yìn oṣu diẹ̀ ti agunkẹ̀kẹ́ miran kú nínú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ ó-gbá-a-ó-sálọ kan ní Òpópónà Childers ní bíi máìlì kan síbi ìjàm̀bá ti ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.
Modified Sentence: Ijamba naa waye leyin osu die ti agunkeke miran ku ninu isele o-gba-a-o-salo kan ni Opopona Childers ni bii maili kan sibi ijamba ti ojo Abameta.

Original Sentence: Àwọn Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Metropolitan sọpé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ńṣiṣẹ́ láti dá ọkùnrin náà mọ̀ kí wọ́n sì fi tó ìbátan rẹ̀ tó súnmọ́ ọ́n jùlọ létí.
Modified Sentence: Awon Oloopa Metropolitan sope awon osise nsise lati da okunrin naa mo ki won si fi to ibatan re to sunmo on julo leti.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọ̀nà títìpa àti ìdarí bọ́ọ̀sì-akérò síbòmíràn  wá nípò tí wọ́n sì gba àwọn awakọ̀ lámọ̀ràn láti  yàgò fún agbègbè náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon ona titipa ati idari boosi-akero sibomiran  wa nipo ti won si gba awon awako lamoran lati  yago fun agbegbe naa.

Original Sentence: Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n Long Lartin: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́fà farapa nínú ìdàrúdàpọ̀
Modified Sentence: Ogba-ewon Long Lartin: Awon osise mefa farapa ninu idarudapo

Original Sentence: Àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ ogbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n mẹ́fà níwọn farapa níbi ìdàdarádàpọ̀ kan nínú ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n aláààbò gíga ti àwọn ọkùnrin, Ọ́fíìsì Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà ti sọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon osise ogba-ewon mefa niwon farapa nibi idadaradapo kan ninu ogba-ewon alaaabo giga ti awon okunrin, Ofiisi Ogba-ewon naa ti so.

Original Sentence: Ìdàrúdàpọ̀ bẹ́ sílẹ̀ ní HMP Long Lartin ní Worcestershire ní bíi aago mẹ́ẹ̀sán àti ààbọ̀ Àkókò Gẹ̀ẹ́sì lọ́jọ́ Àìkú àtipé ó sì ńlọ lọ́wọ́.
Modified Sentence: Idarudapo be sile ni HMP Long Lartin ni Worcestershire ni bii aago meesan ati aabo Akoko Geesi lojo Aiku atipe o si nlo lowo.

Original Sentence: Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ''Tornado'' níwọ́n ti kó wọlé láti yanjú aáwọ̀ náà, eyiti o nííṣe pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹlẹ́wọ̀n mẹ́jọ tí ó sì dáwà ní apá kan ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon osise akosemose ''Tornado'' niwon ti ko wole lati yanju aawo naa, eyiti o niise pelu awon elewon mejo ti o si dawa ni apa kan ogba-ewon naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ náà níwọ́n tọ́jú àwọn ìfarapa ojú tómọ̀ níwọ̀nba níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon osise naa niwon toju awon ifarapa oju tomo niwonba nibi isele naa.

Original Sentence: Agbẹnusọ Ìṣẹ́ Ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n kan sọ: ''Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ọgbà-ẹ̀wọn tí a ti kọ́ lẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àkànṣ̵e ní a ti kó lọ láti yanjú ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ tó ńwáyé lọ́wọ́ ní HMP Long Lartin.
Modified Sentence: Agbenuso Ise Ogba-ewon kan so: ''Awon osise ogba-ewon ti a ti ko lekoo akanse ni a ti ko lo lati yanju isele to nwaye lowo ni HMP Long Lartin.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣìṣẹ́ mẹ́fà ni a ti tọ́jú fún àwọn ìpalára.
Modified Sentence: Awon omo egbe osise mefa ni a ti toju fun awon ipalara.

Original Sentence: A kò fààyè gba ìwà ipá nínú àwọn ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n wa, tí a sì fihàn gbangba pé àwọn tí ó ṣe é ni a o fà lé àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá lọ́wọ́ tí wọ́n sì leè lo àkókó  tó gùn díẹ̀ síi lẹ́yìn àwọn irin àhámọ́.
Modified Sentence: A ko faaye gba iwa ipa ninu awon ogba-ewon wa, ti a si fihan gbangba pe awon ti o se e ni a o fa le awon oloopa lowo ti won si lee lo akoko  to gun die sii leyin awon irin ahamo.

Original Sentence: HMP Long Lartin ńtọ́jú àwọn ẹlẹ́wọn tóju ẹ̀ẹ́dẹ̀gbẹ̀ta lọ, pẹ̀lú àwọn kan nínú àwọn ọ̀daràn náà tóléwu jùlọ ní orilẹ-ede.
Modified Sentence: HMP Long Lartin ntoju awon elewon toju eedegbeta lo, pelu awon kan ninu awon odaran naa tolewu julo ni orile-ede.

Original Sentence: Nínú oṣù Òkúdu níwọ́n ròyìn wípé gómìnà ọgba-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà gba ìtọ́jú ilé-ìwòsàn lẹ́yìn tí ẹlẹ́wọn kan kọ lù ú.
Modified Sentence: Ninu osu Okudu niwon royin wipe gomina ogba-ewon naa gba itoju ile-iwosan leyin ti elewon kan ko lu u.

Original Sentence: Àtipé nínú oṣù Ọ̀wàrà lọ́dún tó kọjá wọ́n pé àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ apaná-ọ̀tẹ̀ sínú ọgbà-ẹ̀wọ̀n náà láti yanjú aáwọ̀ líle kan nínú eyiti wọ́n ti kọlu àwọn òṣìsẹ́ pẹ̀lú àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù alekoko-bí-irin.
Modified Sentence: Atipe ninu osu Owara lodun to koja won pe awon osise apana-ote sinu ogba-ewon naa lati yanju aawo lile kan ninu eyiti won ti kolu awon osise pelu awon boolu alekoko-bi-irin.

Original Sentence: Ìjì-líle Hurricane Rosa ńdúnkòokò mọ́ Phoenix, Las Vegas, Ìlú Salt Lake pẹ̀lú Ìkún-omi aláyalù (Àwọn agbègbè Ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ leè jẹ́ Àǹfààní)
Modified Sentence: Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa ndunkooko mo Phoenix, Las Vegas, Ilu Salt Lake pelu Ikun-omi alayalu (Awon agbegbe Ogbele lee je Anfaani)

Original Sentence: ṣọ̀wọ́n fún ìjìnwọnú ilẹ̀ olóoru kan láti kọlu Arizona, ṣùgbọn ìyẹn gan-an ní ó ṣeé ṣe kí ó ṣẹlẹ̀  níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ bí agbara Ìjì líle Hurricane Rosa tóṣẹ́kù ṣe ńtọ ipa lọ láti la Asálẹ Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Gúúsù já, tí ó sì àwọn ewu ìkún-omi aláyalù sílẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: sowon fun ijinwonu ile olooru kan lati kolu Arizona, sugbon iyen gan-an ni o see se ki o sele  nibere ose to nbo bi agbara Iji lile Hurricane Rosa toseku se nto ipa lo lati la Asale Iwo-oorun Guusu ja, ti o si awon ewu ikun-omi alayalu sile.

Original Sentence: Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ojú-ọjọ́ ti Orilẹ-ede náà ti ṣàgbéjáde àwọn ìṣọ́nà fún ìkún-omi aláyalù fún ọjọ́ Ajé àti ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun fún apà ìwọ-oòrùn Arizona sínu gúùsù àti ìlà-oòrùn Nevada, ìlà-oòrùn gúúsù California àti Utah, pẹ̀lú àwọn ìlú ti Phoenix. Flagstaff, Las Vegas, ati Ìlú Salt Lake.
Modified Sentence: Ile-ise Oju-ojo ti Orile-ede naa ti sagbejade awon isona fun ikun-omi alayalu fun ojo Aje ati ojo Isegun fun apa iwo-oorun Arizona sinu guusu ati ila-oorun Nevada, ila-oorun guusu California ati Utah, pelu awon ilu ti Phoenix. Flagstaff, Las Vegas, ati Ilu Salt Lake.

Original Sentence: Rosa ni a retí láti gba ọ̀nà tààrà kan lórí Phoenix lọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun, tósì ńsúnmọ́ alẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé pẹ̀lú òjò.
Modified Sentence: Rosa ni a reti lati gba ona taara kan lori Phoenix lojo Isegun, tosi nsunmo ale ojo Aje pelu ojo.

Original Sentence: Ilé-iṣẹ́ Ojú-ọjọ́ ti Orilẹ-ede ní Phoenix ṣàkíyèsí nínú àtẹ̀jade tuwiti kan wípé ''àwọn ìjì-líle cyclone mẹ́wàá nìkan níwọn nmú ẹ̀fúùfú lílé tilẹ̀ olóoru tàbi ìjìnwọnú-ilẹ̀ dání láàrin igba máìlì ti Phoenix láti ọdún 1950!
Modified Sentence: Ile-ise Oju-ojo ti Orile-ede ni Phoenix sakiyesi ninu atejade tuwiti kan wipe ''awon iji-lile cyclone mewaa nikan niwon nmu efuufu lile tile olooru tabi ijinwonu-ile dani laarin igba maili ti Phoenix lati odun 1950!

Original Sentence: Katrina (1967) jẹ́ ìjì-líle hurricane kan laàrin ogójì máìlì ti ààlà AZ náà.''
Modified Sentence: Katrina (1967) je iji-lile hurricane kan laarin ogoji maili ti aala AZ naa.''

Original Sentence: Àwọn àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde àwòkọ́ṣe ti Ibùdó Ìjì-líle ti Orilẹ-ede ṣàsọtẹ́lẹ̀ àwọn ìwọn íǹsì 2 sí 4 ti òjò-rírọ, pẹ̀lú iye àwọn ìwọn ínsí tí ó le tó 6 oníkéle-kèle ní Mologon Rim ti Arizona.
Modified Sentence: Awon asesejade awokose ti Ibudo Iji-lile ti Orile-ede sasotele awon iwon insi 2 si 4 ti ojo-riro, pelu iye awon iwon insi ti o le to 6 onikele-kele ni Mologon Rim ti Arizona.

Original Sentence: Àwọn agbègbè miran ti Ìwọ-oòrùn Gúúsù pẹ̀lú ààrin gúngún Rockies àti Great Basin náà ní ó ṣeé ṣe kí wọ́n gba ìwọn íǹsì 1 sí 2, pẹ̀lú àwọn àropọ̀ onísége-sège tí ó ṣeé ṣe kí ó tó íǹsì 4.
Modified Sentence: Awon agbegbe miran ti Iwo-oorun Guusu pelu aarin gungun Rockies ati Great Basin naa ni o see se ki won gba iwon insi 1 si 2, pelu awon aropo onisege-sege ti o see se ki o to insi 4.

Original Sentence: Fún àwọn tí kòsí níbiti ewu ìkún-omi aláyalù wà, òjò Rosa leè jẹ́ ìbùkún níwọ́n bí agbègbè náà ti jẹ́ eyiti ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ ńbá jà.
Modified Sentence: Fun awon ti kosi nibiti ewu ikun-omi alayalu wa, ojo Rosa lee je ibukun niwon bi agbegbe naa ti je eyiti ogbele nba ja.

Original Sentence: Botilẹjẹpe ìkùn-omi jẹ ohun tó fúnni ní ìpayà gidi, àwọn òjò-rírọ̀  kan yóò jẹ́ eyiti yóò ṣeni láǹfààní níwọ̀n igbati Iwọ-oòrùn gúúsù ti ńní ìrírí àwọn ipò ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
Modified Sentence: Botilejepe ikun-omi je ohun to funni ni ipaya gidi, awon ojo-riro  kan yoo je eyiti yoo seni lanfaani niwon igbati Iwo-oorun guusu ti nni iriri awon ipo ogbele lowolowo.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí orilẹ-ede U.S. ti wí Aláàmójútó Ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀, ó lé ní ìdá ogójì nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti Arizona ló ńní ìrírì ó kéré tán ọ̀gbẹlẹ̀ tó bọ́ sódì, ìṣọ̀rí tóga jùlọ ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji,'' ní weather.com sọ níròyìn.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi orile-ede U.S. ti wi Alaamojuto Ogbele, o le ni ida ogoji ninu ogoorun ti Arizona lo nni iriri o kere tan ogbele to bo sodi, isori toga julo eleekeji,'' ni weather.com so niroyin.

Original Sentence: Àkọ́kọ́, ipa ọ̀nà Ìjì-líle Hurricane Rosa ńdarí lọsí  àkọ́rí ilẹ láti inú òkun wọ gbogbo erékùsù Baja California ti Mẹ́síkò.
Modified Sentence: Akoko, ipa ona Iji-lile Hurricane Rosa ndari losi  akori ile lati inu okun wo gbogbo erekusu Baja California ti Mesiko.

Original Sentence: Rosa, tósì wà síbẹ̀ pẹ̀lú agbára hurricane lọ́jọ́ Àìkú pẹ̀lú àwọn ẹ̀fúùfù tóga jùlọ ti máìlì máàrúnlélọ́gọ́rin ní wákàtí kan, ńbẹ ní máìlì irinwó-dín-mẹ́ẹ̀ẹ́dógún gúúsù ti Punta Eugenia, Mẹ́ṣíkò tí ó sì ńlọ sí àríwá ní máìlì mẹ́wàá ní wákàtí kan.
Modified Sentence: Rosa, tosi wa sibe pelu agbara hurricane lojo Aiku pelu awon efuufu toga julo ti maili maarunlelogorin ni wakati kan, nbe ni maili irinwo-din-meeedogun guusu ti Punta Eugenia, Mesiko ti o si nlo si ariwa ni maili mewaa ni wakati kan.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀fúùfù náà ńpàdé àwọn omi tó tutú díẹ̀ síi lọ́nà ní Pacific tí agbára rẹ̀ sì ńdínkù nitori ìdí èyí.
Modified Sentence: Efuufu naa npade awon omi to tutu die sii lona ni Pacific ti agbara re si ndinku nitori idi eyi.

Original Sentence: Nitorinaa, a ńretí wípé yóò forí sọlẹ̀ ní Mẹ́ṣíkò nínú agbára ẹ̀fúùfù ti olóorun ní ọ̀sán tábi ìrọ̀lẹ́  lọ́jọ́ Ajé.
Modified Sentence: Nitorinaa, a nreti wipe yoo fori sole ni Mesiko ninu agbara efuufu ti oloorun ni osan tabi irole  lojo Aje.

Original Sentence: Òjò-rírọ̀ káàkiri àwọn ìpin ti Mẹ́ṣíkò leè pọ púpọ̀, tí ó sì ńfi ewu ìkún-omi tóṣe pàtakì kàn hàn.
Modified Sentence: Ojo-riro kaakiri awon ipin ti Mesiko lee po pupo, ti o si nfi ewu ikun-omi tose pataki kan han.

Original Sentence: Àwọn àropọ òjò-rírọ̀ ti ìwọn íǹsì 3 sí 6 ni a retí láti Baja California wọ inú ìwọ̀-oòrùn àríwá Sonora tí eyiti ó tó íǹsì 10 sì ṣeé ṣe.
Modified Sentence: Awon aropo ojo-riro ti iwon insi 3 si 6 ni a reti lati Baja California wo inu iwo-oorun ariwa Sonora ti eyiti o to insi 10 si see se.

Original Sentence: Rosa yóò la ipa lẹ́yìn náà sí apá àríwá láti la Mẹ́síkò já bíi ẹ̀fùúfú olóoru kan kí ó tó dé ààlà Arizona ní àwọn wákàtí ìsáájú ti òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ìṣẹ́gun bíi ìjìnwọnú-ilẹ̀ olóoru kan, eyiti yóò la ipa lẹ́yìn náà gòkè gba inú Arizona àti sínú gúúsù Utah kí ó tó di alẹ́ ọjọ Ìṣẹ́gun.
Modified Sentence: Rosa yoo la ipa leyin naa si apa ariwa lati la Mesiko ja bii efuufu olooru kan ki o to de aala Arizona ni awon wakati isaaju ti owuro ojo Isegun bii ijinwonu-ile olooru kan, eyiti yoo la ipa leyin naa goke gba inu Arizona ati sinu guusu Utah ki o to di ale ojo Isegun.

Original Sentence: Okùnfà ewu gbòógì náà tí a reti láti ọwọ́ Rosa tàbí àwọn ìyókù rẹ̵̀ ni ọ̀pọ̀ òjò-rírọ̀ gidi ní Baja California, ní ìwọ-oòrùn àríwá Sonora, àti orilẹ-ede U.S. Asálẹ Ìlà-oòrùn Gúúsù,'' ni Ibùdó Ìjì-líle Hurricane ti Orilẹ-ede náà sọ.
Modified Sentence: Okunfa ewu gboogi naa ti a reti lati owo Rosa tabi awon iyoku re ni opo ojo-riro gidi ni Baja California, ni iwo-oorun ariwa Sonora, ati orile-ede U.S. Asale Ila-oorun Guusu,'' ni Ibudo Iji-lile Hurricane ti Orile-ede naa so.

Original Sentence: Àwọn òjò ni a rètí wípé wọn yóò fa ìkún-omi aláyalù àti àwọn ìsàn pàǹtí eyiti ó leè gba ẹ̀mí eniyan nínú àwọn asálẹ̀, àti àwọn ilẹ̀ yíya ní awọn ibití ó jẹ́ òkè.

Original Sentence: Ìkọlù Midsomer Norton: wọn tì awon mẹ́rin ́sátìmọ́lé fún gbìgbìyànjú láti pànìyàn
Modified Sentence: Ikolu Midsomer Norton: won ti awon merin satimole fun gbigbiyanju lati paniyan

Modified Sentence: Awon osise ti rawo ebe si enikeni ti o lee ni igbasile fidio ohun ti o sele sori foonu alaagbeka lati jade wa.

Modified Sentence: Trump sope Kavanaugh 'jiya, iko-irira naa, ibinu naa' ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat

Modified Sentence: Ibo kan fun Adajo Kavanaugh je ibo kan lati ko awon eto agbekale alailaaanu ti o buru ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat,'' ni Trump so nibi ipejopo kan ni Wheeling, West Virginia.

Original Sentence: Trump sọpé Kavanaugh ti ''jìya ìkórìíra náà, ìbínú náà'' ti Ẹgbẹ́ Òṣèlú Àwọn Democrat nínú gbogbo ìgbésẹ̀ ìfanikalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Trump sope Kavanaugh ti ''jiya ikoriira naa, ibinu naa'' ti Egbe Oselu Awon Democrat ninu gbogbo igbese ifanikale fun ise re.

Original Sentence: Kavanaugh jẹ́ ẹ̀rí niwaju Ìgbìmọ̀ lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀, pẹ̀lú ipá àti ìmọ̀lára tí ó sì ńṣẹ́ sí ẹ̀sùn kan láti ọwọ́ Christine Blasey Ford wípé ó kọlu òun nitori ìbálòpọ̀ ní awọn ọdún sẹ́yìn nígbàti àwọn jẹ́ màjèsín.
Modified Sentence: Kavanaugh je eri niwaju Igbimo lojo 'Bo, pelu ipa ati imolara ti o si nse si esun kan lati owo Christine Blasey Ford wipe o kolu oun nitori ibalopo ni awon odun seyin nigbati awon je majesin.

Modified Sentence: Bakannaa ni Ford je eri nibi igbejo nipa esun re.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ náà sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta pé ''Àwọn eniyan Amẹ́ríkà rí ọpọlọ pípé àti ìsọwọ́dára àti ìgboyà'' ti Kavanaugh lọ́jọ́ yẹn.
Modified Sentence: Aare naa so lojo Abameta pe ''Awon eniyan Amerika ri opolo pipe ati isowodara ati igboya'' ti Kavanaugh lojo yen.

Original Sentence: ''Ìbò kan láti ṣàtìlẹ́yìn fún Adájọ́ Kavanaugh jẹ́ ìbò kan ṣàtìlẹ́yìn fún ọ̀kan ninu àwọn onímọ òfin tó ṣàṣeyọrí jùlọ ni àkokó wa, adájọ́ tí àkọsílẹ̀ ìsìnrú ìlú tó yanranntì,'' ní ó sọ fún ìpéjọpọ̀ àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn rẹ̀ ní West Virginia.
Modified Sentence: ''Ibo kan lati satileyin fun Adajo Kavanaugh je ibo kan satileyin fun okan ninu awon onimo ofin to saseyori julo ni akoko wa, adajo ti akosile isinru ilu to yanrannti,'' ni o so fun ipejopo awon alatileyin re ni West Virginia.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ náà fi ìyapa kuro lọ́nà tí ó tọ́ tọ́kasí ìfanikalẹ fún iṣẹ́ Kavanaugh nigbati ó ńsọrọ nípa bí jíjáde síta àwọn ẹgbẹ́ Republican tiṣe pàtakì tó ninu àwọn ìdìbò ti ààrin-sáà.
Modified Sentence: Aare naa fi iyapa kuro lona ti o to tokasi ifanikale fun ise Kavanaugh nigbati o nsoro nipa bi jijade sita awon egbe Republican tise pataki to ninu awon idibo ti aarin-saa.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀sẹ mẹ́fa lókù sí ọ̀kan nínú àwọn ìdìbò tóṣe pàtàkì jùlọ nínú àwọn àkóko ìgbésí-ayé wa.
Modified Sentence: Ose mefa loku si okan ninu awon idibo tose pataki julo ninu awon akoko igbesi-aye wa.

Original Sentence: Emi ko díje, ṣùgbọn Mo ńdíje nítòótọ́,'' ni ó sọ.
Modified Sentence: Emi ko dije, sugbon Mo ndije nitooto,'' ni o so.

Modified Sentence: ''Idi niyi ti Mo fi nlosi ibi gbogbo ti Mo si nja fun awon oludije nla.''

Original Sentence: Trump wí àwíjàre wípé àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Democrat wà nínú ìlépa láti ''dojúkọ̀ni àti láti dínilọ́wọ̀.''
Modified Sentence: Trump wi awijare wipe awon omo egbe oselu Democrat wa ninu ilepa lati ''dojukoni ati lati dinilowo.''

Original Sentence: Ìbò oníìgbésẹ̀ tóṣe pàtàkì àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò wáyé nínú ilé ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà lórí ìfàkalẹ̀ fún iṣẹ́ Kavanaugh ni a réti lati waye nígbàtí kò gbọdọ̀ ju ọjọ́ Ẹtì lọ, ni olùránlọ́wọ́ fún adarí àgbà ti ẹgbẹ́ GOP kan sọ fún CNN.
Modified Sentence: Ibo oniigbese tose pataki akoko ti yoo waye ninu ile igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba lori ifakale fun ise Kavanaugh ni a reti lati waye nigbati ko gbodo ju ojo Eti lo, ni oluranlowo fun adari agba ti egbe GOP kan so fun CNN.

Original Sentence: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún eniyan ló kú nípaṣẹ̀ ilẹ̀ rírì, ìkún-omi tsunami ti ilẹ Indonesia, tí a sì ńríi pé iye náà sì ńga síi
Modified Sentence: Ogo-ogoorun eniyan lo ku nipase ile riri, ikun-omi tsunami ti ile Indonesia, ti a si nrii pe iye naa si nga sii

Original Sentence: Ó kéré tán eniyan irinwó-dínní-mẹ́rindínlógún ló kú, ọ̀pọ̀ nísàn omi gbé lọ bí ìjì ńlá ti kọlu àwọn etíkun. nigbati ilẹ̀ rírì púpọ̀ kan àti ìkún-omi tsunami kọlu erékùsù orilẹ-ede Indonesia ti Sulawesi, ni àwọn aláṣẹ sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbamẹ́ta.
Modified Sentence: O kere tan eniyan irinwo-dinni-merindinlogun lo ku, opo nisan omi gbe lo bi iji nla ti kolu awon etikun. nigbati ile riri pupo kan ati ikun-omi tsunami kolu erekusu orile-ede Indonesia ti Sulawesi, ni awon alase so lojo Abameta.

Original Sentence: Ọgọ-ọgọ́ọ̀rún eniyan niwọń tipéjọ fun àjọ̀dún kan ní etíkun ti ìlú Palu lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì nigbati àwọn ìjì òkun tóga tó ìwọ̀n mítà mẹ́fà (ẹsẹ̀ bàtà 18) fagbára wólulẹ̀ létíkun ní àásálẹ́, tí wọ́n sì gba ọ̀pọ̀ lọ sínú ikú wọn tí wọ́n sì pa ohunkóhun tówà ní ipa ọ̀nà wọn.
Modified Sentence: Ogo-ogoorun eniyan niwon tipejo fun ajodun kan ni etikun ti ilu Palu lojo Eti nigbati awon iji okun toga to iwon mita mefa (ese bata 18) fagbara wolule letikun ni aasale, ti won si gba opo lo sinu iku won ti won si pa ohunkohun towa ni ipa ona won.

Original Sentence: Ìkún-omi tsunami náà tẹ̀lé ilẹ̀ rírì oníwọ̀n agbara 7.5 kan.
Modified Sentence: Ikun-omi tsunami naa tele ile riri oniwon agbara 7.5 kan.

Original Sentence: ''Nigbati ìdúnkoòkò tsunami náà dìde ní àná, àwọn eniyan sì ńṣe iṣẹ́ wọn létíkun tíwọn kòsì sá kuro lójú-ẹsẹ̀ tí wọ́n sì di ẹniti o farakó-áásá,'' ni Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, agbẹnusọ fún àjọ tó ńrísí díndín ewu ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù kù lorilẹ-ede Indonesia BNPB sọ nínú ìfitónilétí kan Jarkata.
Modified Sentence: ''Nigbati idunkooko tsunami naa dide ni ana, awon eniyan si nse ise won letikun tiwon kosi sa kuro loju-ese ti won si di eniti o farako-aasa,'' ni Sutopo Purwo Nugroho, agbenuso fun ajo to nrisi dindin ewu isele ajalu ku lorile-ede Indonesia BNPB so ninu ifitonileti kan Jarkata.

Original Sentence: Ìkún-omi tsunami náà kòwá nípa ara rẹ̀, ó wọ́ àwọn ọkọ́ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́, àwọn igi, àwọn ilé, ó kọlu ohun gbogbo lórí ilẹ̀,'' ni Nugroho sọ, tí ó sì fikún un pé ìkún-omi tsunami náà ti rin ìrìn-àjò kọjá gbangba òkun ní àwọn ìwọ̀n ìṣọwọ́sáré kìlómítà ẹgbẹ̀jọ̀ ní wákàtí kan (máìlí 497 ní wákàtí kan) kí ó tó kọlu bèbè òkun.
Modified Sentence: Ikun-omi tsunami naa kowa nipa ara re, o wo awon oko ayokele, awon igi, awon ile, o kolu ohun gbogbo lori ile,'' ni Nugroho so, ti o si fikun un pe ikun-omi tsunami naa ti rin irin-ajo koja gbangba okun ni awon iwon isowosare kilomita egbejo ni wakati kan (maili 497 ni wakati kan) ki o to kolu bebe okun.

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan kan gun igi láti sá àsálà kuro lọ́wọ́ ìkún omi tsunami náà tí wọ́n sì yè, ni ó sọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon eniyan kan gun igi lati sa asala kuro lowo ikun omi tsunami naa ti won si ye, ni o so.

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan bíi ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́tadínlógúndín-lọ́ọ̀dún ni wọn yára gbélọ sí àwọn ibùdó ní Palu.
Modified Sentence: Awon eniyan bii egberun metadinlogundin-loodun ni won yara gbelo si awon ibudo ni Palu.

Original Sentence: Àwọn fọ́tò àtòkèya tí àjọ tó ńrísí ìṣẹ̀lẹ àjálù náà gbéjáde fi ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ilé àti àwọn sọ́ọ̀bù tí o ti bàjẹ́, àwọn afárá tí ó ti wọ́ tí ó sì wọ́ lulẹ̀ àti mọ́sálásí kan tí omi ti yípo.
Modified Sentence: Awon foto atokeya ti ajo to nrisi isele ajalu naa gbejade fi opo awon ile ati awon soobu ti o ti baje, awon afara ti o ti wo ti o si wo lule ati mosalasi kan ti omi ti yipo.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìmìtìtì-ilẹ̀ tẹ̀síwájú láti máa mú ìlú ẹ̀bá òkun náà rọ́kẹ̀kẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.
Modified Sentence: Awon imititi-ile tesiwaju lati maa mu ilu eba okun naa rokeke lojo Abameta.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilẹ̀ rírì oní-ṣiṣẹ̀-ń-tẹ̀lé náà ní wọ́n mọ̀lára ní agbègbe kan tóní mílíọ̀nù méjí àti irinwó eniyan.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile riri oni-sise-n-tele naa ni won molara ni agbegbe kan toni milionu meji ati irinwo eniyan.

Original Sentence: Àjọ tó Ńse Àgbéléwọ̀n àti Ìsàmúlò Ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ilẹ̀ Indonesia (BPPT) sọ ninu gbólóhùn wipe agbára tí ọ̀pọ̀ ilẹ̀-rírì ọjọ́ Ẹtì náà tú síta tó bíi i̇̀lopọ̀ igba ti àdó-olóró tí wọ́n jù sórí ìlú Hiroshima nigba Ogun Àgbáyé Kejì.
Modified Sentence: Ajo to Nse Agbelewon ati Isamulo Imo-ero ti ile Indonesia (BPPT) so ninu gbolohun wipe agbara ti opo ile-riri ojo Eti naa tu sita to bii ilopo igba ti ado-oloro ti won ju sori ilu Hiroshima nigba Ogun Agbaye Keji.

Original Sentence: Ìṣẹ̀dá orí-ilẹ̀ ìlú náà, eyiti ó jókòó sí òpin ilẹ̀ tówọnú òkun, gíguǹ kan, leè ti mú ìwọ̀n ìkún-omi tsunami náà gbòòrò síi, ní ó wí.
Modified Sentence: Iseda ori-ile ilu naa, eyiti o jokoo si opin ile towonu okun, gigun kan, lee ti mu iwon ikun-omi tsunami naa gbooro sii, ni o wi.

Original Sentence: Nugroho ṣàpèjúwe ìdibàjẹ́ náà bíi eyiti ''ó kọjá ààlà'' tí ó sì sọpé ẹgbẹ-ẹgbẹ̀rún àwọn ilé, àwọn ilé-ìwòsàn, àwọn ilé ìtaja ńlá àti àwọn ilé-ìtura niwọ́n ti wó lulẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Nugroho sapejuwe idibaje naa bii eyiti ''o koja aala'' ti o si sope egbe-egberun awon ile, awon ile-iwosan, awon ile itaja nla ati awon ile-itura niwon ti wo lule.

Original Sentence: Àwọn àgọ́-ara ti àwọn tó farakó-áásá niwọ́n rí lábẹ́ àlàpà àwọn ilé tówó lulẹ̀, ní ó sọ, tí ó sì fi kún un pé ẹgbẹ̀tadínlọ́gọ́tá eniyan ló farapa tí ọ̀kaǹdińlọ́gbọ̀n sì ṣọnù.
Modified Sentence: Awon ago-ara ti awon to farako-aasa niwon ri labe alapa awon ile towo lule, ni o so, ti o si fi kun un pe egbetadinlogota eniyan lo farapa ti okandinlogbon si sonu.

Original Sentence: Nugroho sọpé àwọn tó farakó áásá àti ìdibàjẹ́ náà leè pọ̀jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ ní àwọn bèbè òkun  kílòmìtà 300 (máìlì 190) àríwá ti Palu, agbègbe kan tíwọn ńpè ní Donggala, eyiti ó súnmọ́ ààrin gungun agbára ilẹ̀ rírì náà.
Modified Sentence: Nugroho sope awon to farako aasa ati idibaje naa lee poju bee lo ni awon bebe okun  kilomita 300 (maili 190) ariwa ti Palu, agbegbe kan tiwon npe ni Donggala, eyiti o sunmo aarin gungun agbara ile riri naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìkànsíra-ẹni ni ''di àrọ aláìlẹ́sẹ̀ pátápátá láìsì ìròyìn kankan'' láti Donggala, ni Nugroho sọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon ikansira-eni ni ''di aro alailese patapata laisi iroyin kankan'' lati Donggala, ni Nugroho so.

Original Sentence: Ó lé ni ẹgbẹ̀run lọ́nà ọ̀ọ́dún àwọn eniyan tó ńgbé níbẹ̀, ni Ẹgbẹ́ Aláàgbéléèbú Pupa sọ ninu gbólóhùn kan, tí wọn sì fi kún un pe àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ wọn àti awọn tó yọ̀ǹda ara wọn fún iṣẹ́ niwọ́n ti ńlọ sí àwọn agbègbe tí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà ti wáyé.
Modified Sentence: O le ni egberun lona oodun awon eniyan to ngbe nibe, ni Egbe Alaagbeleebu Pupa so ninu gbolohun kan, ti won si fi kun un pe awon osise won ati awon to yonda ara won fun ise niwon ti nlo si awon agbegbe ti isele naa ti waye.

Original Sentence: ''Èyí ti di ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù buburú kan, ṣùgbọ́n o leè tún burú síwájú síi,'' ni o wí.
Modified Sentence: ''Eyi ti di isele ajalu buburu kan, sugbon o lee tun buru siwaju sii,'' ni o wi.

Original Sentence: Àjọ náà ni ọ̀pọ̀ bu ẹnu àtẹ́ lù lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta nitoripe kò fitó àwọn eniyan létí pe ìkún-omi tsunami ti kọlu Palu, botilẹjẹpe àwọn òṣiṣẹ́ sọpé àwọn ìjì òkun ti dé láàrin àkókò náà tí wọ́n ṣe àgbéjáde ìkìlọ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Ajo naa ni opo bu enu ate lu lojo Abameta nitoripe ko fito awon eniyan leti pe ikun-omi tsunami ti kolu Palu, botilejepe awon osise sope awon iji okun ti de laarin akoko naa ti won se agbejade ikilo naa.

Original Sentence: Nínú àwòrán fídíò tí kìí ṣe ti akọṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ tíwọn pín lórì ojú-òpò ìbáṣepọ̀ ti ayelujara ni eniyan ti leè gbọ́ ti ọkùnrin kan tówà ní àjà òkè ilé kan ti ńpariwo ìkìlọ̀ nípa ti ìkún-omi tsunami tó ńbọ̀ sí àwọn eniyan tówà ní òpópóna nísàlẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ninu aworan fidio ti kii se ti akosemose tiwon pin lori oju-opo ibasepo ti ayelujara ni eniyan ti lee gbo ti okunrin kan towa ni aja oke ile kan ti npariwo ikilo nipa ti ikun-omi tsunami to nbo si awon eniyan towa ni opopona nisale.

Original Sentence: Láàrin àwọn ìṣẹ́jú ògiri omi kan wó sí bèbè òkun náà, tí ó sì ńgbé àwọn ilé àti àwọn ọkọ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ lọ.
Modified Sentence: Laarin awon iseju ogiri omi kan wo si bebe okun naa, ti o si ngbe awon ile ati awon oko ayokele lo.

Original Sentence: Reuters kò leè fi ìdí àwòrán fídíò náà múlẹ̀ lójú-ẹṣẹ̀ wípé ó jẹ òtítọ́.
Modified Sentence: Reuters ko lee fi idi aworan fidio naa mule loju-ese wipe o je otito.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ̀ rírì àti ìkún-omi tsunami ṣe okùnfà àìsí iná mànàmáná eyiti ó gé àwọn okùn ìkànsí-ara-ẹni ní àyíká ìlú Palu tí ó sì jẹ́kí ó ṣòro fun àwọn aláṣẹ lati darí àwọn igbiyanju fún ìdóòlà-ẹ̀mí àwọn eniyan.
Modified Sentence: Ile riri ati ikun-omi tsunami se okunfa aisi ina manamana eyiti o ge awon okun ikansi-ara-eni ni ayika ilu Palu ti o si jeki o soro fun awon alase lati dari awon igbiyanju fun idoola-emi awon eniyan.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ológun ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí fi àwọn ọkọ̀ òfurufú akẹ́rù ránṣẹ́ pẹ̀lú ìrànwọ́ lati Jarkata àti àwọn ìlú miran, ni àwọn aláṣẹ sọ, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn eniyan tíwọn sáré gbé kúro níbí ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà sì nílò oúnjẹ àti àwọn ohun tójẹ́ dandan miran.
Modified Sentence: Awon ologun ti bere si fi awon oko ofurufu akeru ranse pelu iranwo lati Jarkata ati awon ilu miran, ni awon alase so, sugbon awon eniyan tiwon sare gbe kuro nibi isele naa si nilo ounje ati awon ohun toje dandan miran.

Original Sentence: Ibùdókọ̀ ọkọ̀ òfurufú ti ìlu náà ni wọ́n ti tún sí padà fún àwọn iṣẹ́ ìtura nìkan tí yóò sì wà ní títìpa títí di oṣù Ọ̀wàrà.
Modified Sentence: Ibudoko oko ofurufu ti ilu naa ni won ti tun si pada fun awon ise itura nikan ti yoo si wa ni titipa titi di osu Owara.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ Joko Widodo ni wọ́n ti ṣààtò rẹ̀ láti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí àwọn ibùdó tí àwọn tíwọn gbé kuro níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà lọ́jọ́ Àìkú.
Modified Sentence: Aare Joko Widodo ni won ti saato re lati sabewo si awon ibudo ti awon tiwon gbe kuro nibi isele naa lojo Aiku.

Original Sentence: Iye eniyan tóku nínu Ìkún-omi Tsunami ti Indonesia ti fò sòke ju ẹ̣gbẹ̀rin lọ
Modified Sentence: Iye eniyan toku ninu Ikun-omi Tsunami ti Indonesia ti fo soke ju egberin lo

Modified Sentence: O buru pupo

Original Sentence: Nigbati àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ World Vision láti Donggala ti dé ìlú Palu lálàáfía, níbití àwọn abániṣiṣẹ́ tí ńgbé nínú àwọn àgọ́ oní-tapóólì tí wọn ṣe àtòpọ̀ rẹ̀ ninu ọgbà ọ́fíìsì wọn, wọ́n gba àwọn ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù náà kọjá lójú ọ̀nà, ni Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Doseba sọ.
Modified Sentence: Nigbati awon osise World Vision lati Donggala ti de ilu Palu lalaafia, nibiti awon abanisise ti ngbe ninu awon ago oni-tapooli ti won se atopo re ninu ogba ofiisi won, won gba awon ibi isele ajalu naa koja loju ona, ni Ogbeni Doseba so.

Original Sentence: ''Wọ́n sọ fuńmi wipe àwọn rí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn ilé tí wọn ti parun, ni ó wí.
Modified Sentence: ''Won so funmi wipe awon ri opolopo awon ile ti won ti parun, ni o wi.

Original Sentence: Ó burú púpọ̀ ju.
Modified Sentence: O buru pupo ju.

Original Sentence: Àní bí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ onírànlọ́wọ́ ti bẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ìrìn àìsinmi fún bíbẹ̀rẹ̀ àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ láti pèsè ìtura fún àjálù, àwọn kan fẹ̀sùn kan pé wọ́n dínà mọ́ àwọn oníṣẹ́ ìrànwọ́ láti ilẹ̀-òkèèrè láti máṣe rin ìrìn-àjò sí Palu.
Modified Sentence: Ani bi awon egbe oniranlowo ti bere awon irin aisinmi fun bibere awon igbese lati pese itura fun ajalu, awon kan fesun kan pe won dina mo awon onise iranwo lati ile-okeere lati mase rin irin-ajo si Palu.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn òfin ilẹ̀ Indonesia ti wí, fífúnnilówó, àwọn ìpèsè àti fífúnnilóṣìṣẹ́ láti òkè-òkun leè bẹ̀rẹ̀ sí wọlé nìkan bí wọ́n bá kéde ibi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ kan bíi agbègbè ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù ti orilẹ-ede.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi awon ofin ile Indonesia ti wi, fifunnilowo, awon ipese ati fifunnilosise lati oke-okun lee bere si wole nikan bi won ba kede ibi isele kan bii agbegbe isele ajalu ti orile-ede.

Original Sentence: Síbẹ̀ èyí kò tìí ṣẹlẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Sibe eyi ko tii sele.

Original Sentence: ''Ó sí jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù onípele tí ẹkùn kan síbẹ̀,'' ni Aulia Arriani, agbẹnusọ kan fún Ẹgbẹ́ Aláàgbéléèbú Pupa ti Indonesia ni o so bẹẹ̣.
Modified Sentence: ''O si je isele ajalu onipele ti ekun kan sibe,'' ni Aulia Arriani, agbenuso kan fun Egbe Alaagbeleebu Pupa ti Indonesia ni o so bee.

Original Sentence: ''Ní kété tí ìjọba bá sọpé, ''Ó dára, èyí jẹ́ ìṣẹ̀lù àjálù ti orilẹ-ede kan,'' a leè sílẹ̀kùn sílẹ̀ fún ìrànwọ́ àgbáyé ṣùgbọ́n kò tìí sí irú ipò yẹn síbẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: ''Ni kete ti ijoba ba sope, ''O dara, eyi je iselu ajalu ti orile-ede kan,'' a lee silekun sile fun iranwo agbaye sugbon ko tii si iru ipo yen sibe.

Original Sentence: Bí alẹ́ ọjọ́ kejì  ti ńlẹ́ ní Palu lẹ́yìn ilẹ̀ rírì àti ìkún-omi tsunami ti ọjọ́ Ẹtì, àwọn ọ̀rẹ́ ati ìdílé àwọn tí  ó ṣọnù sì ńní ìrèti wipe àwọn olùfẹ́ wọn yóò jẹ́ àwọn iṣẹ́ ìyanu náà tí ó leè wú àkàrà àwọn ìlà ìtàn aláìnírètí ti àwọn iṣ̵ẹ̀lẹ̀ àjálù àtọ̀runwá náà.
Modified Sentence: Bi ale ojo keji  ti nle ni Palu leyin ile riri ati ikun-omi tsunami ti ojo Eti, awon ore ati idile awon ti  o sonu si nni ireti wipe awon olufe won yoo je awon ise iyanu naa ti o lee wu akara awon ila itan alainireti ti awon isele ajalu atorunwa naa.

Original Sentence: Lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, wọ́n fa ọmọkùnrin kékeré kan yọ jáde láti inú egboro tó ńgbé ìgbọ̀nṣẹ̀ kan.
Modified Sentence: Lojo Abameta, won fa omokunrin kekere kan yo jade lati inu egboro to ngbe igbonse kan.

Original Sentence: Lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, àwọn adóòlà-ẹ̀mí yọ obìnrin kan ti ògiri àlàpà ti mú mọ́lẹ̀ sábẹ́ fún ọjọ́ méjì pẹ̀lú àgọ́-ara ìyá rẹ̀ lẹ́ẹ̀gbẹ́ rẹ̀
Modified Sentence: Lojo Aiku, awon adoola-emi yo obinrin kan ti ogiri alapa ti mu mole sabe fun ojo meji pelu ago-ara iya re leegbe re

Original Sentence: Gendon Subandono, akọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti àwọn ikọ̀ tó ńlo àpò-alátẹ́gùn lórí omi ti orilẹ-ede Indonesia, ti kọ́ méjì ninu awọn tó ńlo àpò-alátẹgùn náà tó ṣọnù fún Àwọn Ìdíje Asia, eyiti wọ́n parí ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ oṣù yìí ní Indonesia.
Modified Sentence: Gendon Subandono, akonilekoo ti awon iko to nlo apo-alategun lori omi ti orile-ede Indonesia, ti ko meji ninu awon to nlo apo-alategun naa to sonu fun Awon Idije Asia, eyiti won pari ni ibere osu yii ni Indonesia.

Original Sentence: Àwọn miran ninu àwọn tó bọ́há sínú Ilé Ìtura Roa Roa, tí Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Mandagi wà ninu wọn, jé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Awon miran ninu awon to boha sinu Ile Itura Roa Roa, ti Ogbeni Mandagi wa ninu won, je awon akekoo re.

Original Sentence: Botilẹjepe, àwọn ìfiránṣẹ́ rẹ̀, kàn yọrísí àmì ìṣàmi aláwọ̀ eérú kan, dípò àwọn ìṣàmì aláwọ̀ aró oníbejì kan.

Original Sentence: Àwọn olè gba ẹgbẹ́rùn lọ́nà mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n àti ẹgbẹ̀rindínláàádọ́ta dọ́là níbití wọ́n ti ńkówósí inú ẹ̀rọ pọwọ́-pọwọ́ ATM ní Newport lórí Levee
Modified Sentence: Awon ole gba egberun lona merindinlogbon ati egberindinlaaadota dola nibiti won ti nkowosi inu ero powo-powo ATM ni Newport lori Levee

Original Sentence: Àwọn olè ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹti gba ẹgbẹ́rùn lọ́nà mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n àti ẹgbẹ̀rindínláàádọ́ta dọ́là lọ́wọ́ òṣìṣẹ́ Brink kan tó ńkówó sínú ẹ̀rọ pọwó-pọwó ATM ní Newport lórí Levee, gẹ́gẹ́bí àgbéjáde ìròyìn kan láti Ẹ̀ka Ilé iṣẹ́ Ọlọ́ọ̀pá Newport.
Modified Sentence: Awon ole ni owuro ojo Eti gba egberun lona merindinlogbon ati egberindinlaaadota dola lowo osise Brink kan to nkowo sinu ero powo-powo ATM ni Newport lori Levee, gegebi agbejade iroyin kan lati Eka Ile ise Oloopa Newport.

Original Sentence: Awạko ọkọ̀ ayọ́kẹ́lẹ́ náà ti ńjẹ́kí ẹ̀rọ pọwó-pọwó náà sófo ninu ilé ìdánilárayá ńlá náà tí ó sì ńgbaradì láti kó owó púpọ̀ síi, ni Ọ̀tẹlẹ̀múyẹ Dennis McCarthy kọ sínú àgbéjáde náà.
Modified Sentence: Awako oko ayokele naa ti njeki ero powo-powo naa sofo ninu ile idanilaraya nla naa ti o si ngbaradi lati ko owo pupo sii, ni Otelemuye Dennis McCarthy ko sinu agbejade naa.

Original Sentence: Níbití ọwọ́ rẹ̀ ti kún fún iṣẹ́, ọkùnrin miran ''sáré gòkè láti ẹ̀yìn òṣìṣẹ́ Brink náà'' tí ó sì jí àpò owó kan tí ó wà fún ìfijíṣẹ́ gbé.
Modified Sentence: Nibiti owo re ti kun fun ise, okunrin miran ''sare goke lati eyin osise Brink naa'' ti o si ji apo owo kan ti o wa fun ifijise gbe.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ẹlẹ́ẹ̀rí rí ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ àwọn afurasí tíwọn ńsá kúrò níbi ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà, gẹ́gẹ́bí àgbéjadé náà, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá kò sọní pàtó iye àwọn tíwọ́n kópa ninu ìṣẹ̀lẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon eleeri ri opolopo awon afurasi tiwon nsa kuro nibi isele naa, gegebi agbejade naa, sugbon awon oloopa ko soni pato iye awon tiwon kopa ninu isele naa.

Original Sentence: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bání ìwífúnni nípa àwọn ìdánimọ̀ wọn kí ó kàn sí àwọn ọlọ́ọ̀pá Newport ní 859-292-3680.
Modified Sentence: Enikeni ti o bani iwifunni nipa awon idanimo won ki o kan si awon oloopa Newport ni 859-292-3680.

Modified Sentence: Kanye West: Akorinbieniti-nsoro yi oruko re pada si Ye

Modified Sentence: Akorinbieniti-nsoro Kanye West nyi oruko re pada - si Ye.

Modified Sentence: Boti nkede iyipada naa lori Twitter lojo Abameta, o kowe: ''Eni naa ti a mo tele nipa ti ise bii Kanye West.''

Original Sentence: West, ẹni ọdún mẹ́rinlélógójì, ni wọ́n ti sọ ní orúkọ ìnagijẹ Ye fún àwọn àkókò kan tí ó sì lo orúkọ àpèjẹ́ náà bíi àkọlé fún àwo orin ìkẹjọ rẹ̀, eyiti ó gbéjáde ninu oṣù Òkúdu.
Modified Sentence: West, eni odun merinlelogoji, ni won ti so ni oruko inagije Ye fun awon akoko kan ti o si lo oruko apeje naa bii akole fun awo orin ikejo re, eyiti o gbejade ninu osu Okudu.

Modified Sentence: O nropo akorin Ariana Grande lori eto naa eniti o fagile e fun ''awon idi imolara,'' ni aseda eto naa so.

Modified Sentence: Pelu wipe o je ikekuru ti oruko akosemose re to nlo lowolowo, West ti so saaju wipe oro naa  ni isepataki nipa ti esin fun oun

Modified Sentence: ''Mo gbagbo pe 'ye' ni oro naa ti a lo ti o wopo julo ninu Bibeli, atipe ninu Bibeli o tumo si 'iwo,''' ni West so ni ibere odun yii, nigbati o nsoro nipa akole awo orin re pelu olugbalejo redio Big Boy.
