Modified Sentence: O je okan ninu onka awon akorinbieniti-nsoro to yi oruko won pada.

Original Sentence: Sean Combs ni wọń ti mọ lóríṣiríṣi ọ̀nà bíi Puff Daddy, P. Diddy tàbí Diddy, ṣùgbọn lọ́dún yìí kéde ìfẹ́ tóga jùlọ rẹ̀ fún àwọn orúkọ Love and Brother Love.
Modified Sentence: Sean Combs ni won ti mo lorisirisi ona bii Puff Daddy, P. Diddy tabi Diddy, sugbon lodun yii kede ife toga julo re fun awon oruko Love and Brother Love.

Original Sentence: Abániṣàjọṣepọ̀ West kan tẹ́lẹ̀rí, JAY-Z, bákannáà ti ṣe nǹkan rí pẹ̀lú tàbi láìsí àmì ìdánudúró láàrin àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ kan àti àwọn álífábẹ̵́ẹ̀tì ńlá.
Modified Sentence: Abanisajosepo West kan teleri, JAY-Z, bakannaa ti se nnkan ri pelu tabi laisi ami idanuduro laarin awon oro kan ati awon alifabeeti nla.

Original Sentence: AMLO ti Mẹ́ṣíkò jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ̵́ láti máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun lòdì sí àwọn ara ìlú.
Modified Sentence: AMLO ti Mesiko je eje lati mase lo awon omo ogun lodi si awon ara ilu.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ-tíwọnṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀-dìbòyàn ti orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador ti jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ́ láti máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun lòdì sí àwọn ara ìlú láíláí bí orilẹ-ede náà ti ńsúnmọ́ ayẹyẹ àjọ̀dún àádọ́tá ti ìgbẹ̀san òdì sí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan nínú eyiti ẹ̀jẹ̀ ti sàn.
Modified Sentence: Aare-tiwonsese-diboyan ti orile-ede Mesiko Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador ti je eje lati mase lo awon omo ogun lodi si awon ara ilu lailai bi orile-ede naa ti nsunmo ayeye ajodun aadota ti igbesan odi si awon akekoo kan ninu eyiti eje ti san.

Original Sentence: Lopez Obrador ṣe ìlérí lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹta nì Gbàgede Tlatelolco láti ''máṣe lo àwọn ọmọ ogun fún ìfipatẹ-orí àwọn eniyan Mẹ́ṣíkò náà ba.''
Modified Sentence: Lopez Obrador se ileri lojo Abameta ni Gbagede Tlatelolco lati ''mase lo awon omo ogun fun ifipate-ori awon eniyan Mesiko naa ba.''

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ogun yìnbọn lu ìwọ́de alálàáfíà kan ni gbàgede náà lọ́jọ́ kejì oṣù Ọ̀wàrà, lọ́dún 1968, tíwọ́n sì pa ọ̀pọ̀ tí ó tó bíi ọ̀ọ́dúrun ènìyàn ní àkókò kan tí àwọn ẹgbẹ́ àkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ òṣèlú ọlọ́wọ́-òsì ńfi gbòǹgbò múlẹ̀ jákè-jádò ilẹ̀ Látìnì Amẹ́ríkà.
Modified Sentence: Awon omo ogun yinbon lu iwode alalaafia kan ni gbagede naa lojo keji osu Owara, lodun 1968, tiwon si pa opo ti o to bii oodurun eniyan ni akoko kan ti awon egbe akekoo oselu olowo-osi nfi gbongbo mule jake-jado ile Latini Amerika.

Original Sentence: Lopez Obrador ti jẹ́ ẹ̀jẹ́ láti ṣàtìlẹ́yîn fun àwọn ọ̀dọ́ orilẹ-ede Mẹ́ṣíkò nípa fífún àwọn tó ńkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní owó ìrọ̀rùn olóoṣooṣù àti sísí àwọn ilẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ yunifásitì ọlọ́ọ̀fẹ́ ti ara ìlú díẹ̵̀ síi.
Modified Sentence: Lopez Obrador ti je eje lati satileyin fun awon odo orile-ede Mesiko nipa fifun awon to nkekoo ni owo irorun oloosoosu ati sisi awon ile eko yunifasiti oloofe ti ara ilu die sii.

Original Sentence: O tí sọpé àìríṣẹ́ṣe àti àìsí àwọn àǹfààní ètò-ẹ̀kọ́  ńfa àwọn ọ̀dọ́ wọnú àwọn ẹgbẹ́ ọ̀daràn.
Modified Sentence: O ti sope airisese ati aisi awon anfaani eto-eko  nfa awon odo wonu awon egbe odaran.

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede U.S. níláti sọ ìfúnnilówó ti A.I di ìlọ́poméjì
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede U.S. nilati so ifunnilowo ti A.I di ilopomeji

Original Sentence: Olùdóko-òwò àti òṣìṣẹ́ AI kan, Kai-Fu Lee, ẹniti ó ti ṣiṣẹ́ fún Google, Microsoft àti Apple tí sọ wipe bí orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ti ǹṣíṣẹ́ tákútákún ninu ọpọlọ àtọwọ́dá, orilẹ-ede U.S níláti sọ iye owó tí ó ńná lórí ìwáàdí ninu ẹ̀ka ìmọ̀ náà di ìlọ́po méjì.
Modified Sentence: Oludoko-owo ati osise AI kan, Kai-Fu Lee, eniti o ti sise fun Google, Microsoft ati Apple ti so wipe bi orile-ede Saina ti nsise takutakun ninu opolo atowoda, orile-ede U.S nilati so iye owo ti o nna lori iwaadi ninu eka imo naa di ilopo meji.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọ̀rọ náà jáde lẹ́yìn tí oríṣiríṣi àwọn ẹ̀ka ìjọba orilẹ-ede U.S. tiṣe àwọn ìkéde AI, àní bíi orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́nà gbogbo tisẹ aláìní ọ̀nà àgbékalẹ̀ fun àtiṣe AI.
Modified Sentence: Awon oro naa jade leyin ti orisirisi awon eka ijoba orile-ede U.S. tise awon ikede AI, ani bii orile-ede U.S. lona gbogbo tise alaini ona agbekale fun atise AI.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, orilẹ-ede Ṣáìnà ti ṣàfihàn àgbékalẹ̀ ètò rẹ̀ lọ́dún tó kọjá: ó ńlépa láti wàní ipò ìkínní nínú ọgbọ́n ìṣàgbéjáde AI kí ó tó di ọdún 2030.
Modified Sentence: Ewe, orile-ede Saina ti safihan agbekale eto re lodun to koja: o nlepa lati wani ipo ikinni ninu ogbon isagbejade AI ki o to di odun 2030.

Original Sentence: Lee tunb́o ̣so wipẹ ''Sísọ owò tí a ńyà ṣọ́tọ̀ fún ìwáàdí AI di ìlọ́pòméjì yóò jẹ́ ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ rere kan, pẹ̀lú wipe àwọn orilẹ-ede miran wà lọ́nà tójìnnà púpọ̀ lẹ́yìn orilẹ-ede U.S., tí àwá sì ńfojú sójú sọ́nà fún àlùyọ tókan ninu AI.
Modified Sentence: Lee tunbo so wipe ''Siso owo ti a nya soto fun iwaadi AI di ilopomeji yoo je ibere rere kan, pelu wipe awon orile-ede miran wa lona tojinna pupo leyin orile-ede U.S., ti awa si nfoju soju sona fun aluyo tokan ninu AI.

Original Sentence: Sísọ ìfúnnilówó dí ìlọ́poméjì leè sọ àwọn ìṣọwọṣéeṣe náà di méjì láti ríi pé àṣeyọrí AI títóbi tókàn ní yóò di ṣíṣe ní orilẹ-ede U.S., gẹgẹ bíi Lee ṣe sọ fún CNBC ninu ìfọ̀rọ̀wánilẹ́nuwò kan lọ̣́̀sẹ́ yìí.
Modified Sentence: Siso ifunnilowo di ilopomeji lee so awon isowoseese naa di meji lati rii pe aseyori AI titobi tokan ni yoo di sise ni orile-ede U.S., gege bii Lee se so fun CNBC ninu iforowanilenuwo kan lose yii.

Original Sentence: Lee, ẹnití ìwé rẹ̀ ''AI Superpowers”: Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà, Àfonífojì Silikọn ati Ààtò Ayé Tuntun'' ni wọ̀n ṣàgbéjáde lóṣù yìí láti ọwọ́ Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, tójẹ́ Olùdarí Àwọn Ìdókòòwò Sinovation, eyiti ó ti dókòòwò ninu ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ AI tó gbajú-gbajà ní orilẹ-ede Ṣáìnà, Face++.
Modified Sentence: Lee, eniti iwe re ''AI Superpowers”: Orile-ede Saina, Afonifoji Silikon ati Aato Aye Tuntun'' ni won sagbejade losu yii lati owo Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, toje Oludari Awon Idokoowo Sinovation, eyiti o ti dokoowo ninu okan ninu awon ile ise AI to gbaju-gbaja ni orile-ede Saina, Face++.

Original Sentence: Ní àwọn ọdún 1980 sí 1989 ní Yunifásítì Carnegie Mellon ó ṣiṣẹ́ lórí ìlànà ètò àmúlòṣiṣẹ́ kan eyiti ó tayọ ti elére Othelo ti Amẹ́ríkà tówà lókè jùlọ, àtipé lẹ́yìn náà ó di aláṣẹ ti Ìwáàdí Microsoft àti ààrẹ ti ẹ̀ka Google ní orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà.
Modified Sentence: Ni awon odun 1980 si 1989 ni Yunifasiti Carnegie Mellon o sise lori ilana eto amulosise kan eyiti o tayo ti elere Othelo ti Amerika towa loke julo, atipe leyin naa o di alase ti Iwaadi Microsoft ati aare ti eka Google ni orile-ede Saina.

Original Sentence: Lee ṣe ìdánimọ àwọn ìdíje ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ ti ìjọba orilẹ-ede U.S. bíi Ìpèníjà ti Àwọn Ẹ̀rọ Aláàdáṣiṣẹ́ ti Àjọ Àwọn Ìṣẹ́ Àkànṣe Ìwáàdí Tójinlẹ̀ nípa ààbò tí ó sì bèèrè igbati òmíràn tókàn jáde, láti leè ṣe ìrànwọ dídá àwọn eniyan oníran mọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Lee se idanimo awon idije imo-ero ti ijoba orile-ede U.S. bii Ipenija ti Awon Ero Alaadasise ti Ajo Awon Ise Akanse Iwaadi Tojinle nipa aabo ti o si beere igbati omiran tokan jade, lati lee se iranwo dida awon eniyan oniran mo.

Original Sentence: Àwọn oní-ìwáàdí ní orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà níláti ṣiṣẹ́ takun-takun láti leè rí àwọn owó ìjọba gbà, ni Lee sọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon oni-iwaadi ni orile-ede U.S. lopo igba nilati sise takun-takun lati lee ri awon owo ijoba gba, ni Lee so.

Original Sentence: Lee tun so wipe ''Kì í ṣe orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ló ńkó àwọn adarí ninu ẹ̀kọ́ lọ; bíkoṣe wipe àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ nla''.
Modified Sentence: Lee tun so wipe ''Ki i se orile-ede Saina lo nko awon adari ninu eko lo; bikose wipe awon ile ise nla''.

Original Sentence: Facebook, Google àti àwọn ilé iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ miran ti gba àwọn ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká ṣiṣẹ́ láti àwọn yunifásitì kí wọn leè ṣiṣẹ́ lórí AI ní àwọn ọdún àìpẹ́.
Modified Sentence: Facebook, Google ati awon ile ise imo-ero miran ti gba awon ilumooka sise lati awon yunifasiti ki won lee sise lori AI ni awon odun aipe.

Original Sentence: Lee sọpé àwọn ìyípadà ninu ìlàna lórí ìjáde àti ìwọlé àwọn àlejò bákannáà leè ran orilẹ-ede U.S. lọ́wọ́ láti mú ìgbéga bá àwọn ipá rẹ̀ lórí AI.
Modified Sentence: Lee sope awon iyipada ninu ilana lori ijade ati iwole awon alejo bakannaa lee ran orile-ede U.S. lowo lati mu igbega ba awon ipa re lori AI.

Original Sentence: ''Mo lérò wípé wọ́n nílatí máa fún àwọn tó kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gboyè PhD ninu AI ni àwọn káàdi ìwé ìgbé-ìlú aláwọ̀ ewé láìsí tàbí-ṣùgbọ́n, ni ó sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Mo lero wipe won nilati maa fun awon to kekoo gboye PhD ninu AI ni awon kaadi iwe igbe-ilu alawo ewe laisi tabi-sugbon, ni o so.

Original Sentence: Ìgbìmọ̀ Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ṣàgbéjáde Àgbékalẹ Ètò Ìdàgbàsókè Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́dá ti Ìran Tókàn nínú oṣù Agẹmọ lọ́dún 2017.
Modified Sentence: Igbimo Orile-ede Saina sagbejade Agbekale Eto Idagbasoke Opolo Atowoda ti Iran Tokan ninu osu Agemo lodun 2017.

Original Sentence: Àjọ Ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́ńsì fún Nǹkan Àtọ̀runwá ti Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà ńpèsè owó fún àwọn eniyan ní àwọn ilé ẹ̀kọ́ ní ọ̀nà tó farajọ bí Àjọ Ìmọ̀ Sáyẹ́ńsì ti Orilẹ-ede àti àwọn àjọ miran ṣe ńfún àwọn oníṣẹ́-ìwáàdí orilẹ-ede U.S., ṣùgbọ́n ìṣọwọ́dára iṣẹ́ ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wá nílẹ̀ lorilẹ-ede Ṣáínà, gẹgẹ bíi Lee ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: Ajo Imo Sayensi fun Nnkan Atorunwa ti Orile-ede Saina npese owo fun awon eniyan ni awon ile eko ni ona to farajo bi Ajo Imo Sayensi ti Orile-ede ati awon ajo miran se nfun awon onise-iwaadi orile-ede U.S., sugbon isowodara ise ikekoo wa nile lorile-ede Saina, gege bii Lee se so.

Original Sentence: Níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọdún yìí orilẹ-ede U.S. Ẹ̀ka ti Ààbò ṣe ìdásílẹ̀ Ibùdó Ọpọlọ Àtọwọdá Alájọni kan, eyiti tó ní àwọn alájọ́ṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ láti ilé iṣẹ́ àti ilé ẹ̀kọ́ nínú, ti Ilé Ìjọba Funfun sì kéde ìṣẹ̀dá Ìgbìmọ̀ Àsàyàn lórí Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́dá kan.
Modified Sentence: Nibere odun yii orile-ede U.S. Eka ti Aabo se idasile Ibudo Opolo Atowoda Alajoni kan, eyiti to ni awon alajosisepo lati ile ise ati ile eko ninu, ti Ile Ijoba Funfun si kede iseda Igbimo Asayan lori Opolo Atowoda kan.

Original Sentence: Àtipé lóṣù yìí DARPA kéde ìdókòòwò oní-bílíọ̀nù méjì dọ́là nínú ìrònú-dọgbọ́n kan tí wọ́n pè ni AI Tókàn.
Modified Sentence: Atipe losu yii DARPA kede idokoowo oni-bilionu meji dola ninu ironu-dogbon kan ti won pe ni AI Tokan.

Original Sentence: Nípá ti NSF náà, ó ńdóoko-òwò ọgọ́ọ̀rún mílíọ̀nù dọ́là lọ́dọ́ọdún nínú ìwáàdí AI.
Modified Sentence: Nipa ti NSF naa, o ndooko-owo ogoorun milionu dola lodoodun ninu iwaadi AI.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, òfin orilẹ-ede U.S. tí ó ńwá láti ṣẹ̀dá Ìgbìmọ̀ Amúṣẹ́ṣe ti Ààbò Orilẹ-ede lórí Ọpọlọ Àtọwọ́da kan kò tíì rí iṣẹ́ ṣe ninu awọn oṣù.
Modified Sentence: Ewe, ofin orile-ede U.S. ti o nwa lati seda Igbimo Amusese ti Aabo Orile-ede lori Opolo Atowoda kan ko tii ri ise se ninu awon osu.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Macedonia ńdìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ lórí bóyá kí wọn yí orúkọ orilẹ̵-ede padà
Modified Sentence: Awon omo orile-ede Macedonia ndibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko lori boya ki won yi oruko orile-ede pada

Original Sentence: Àwọn eniyan Macedoni dìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́èni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ kan lọ́jọ́ Àìkú lórí bóyá kí wọ́n yí orúkọ rẹ̀ padà si ''Ilẹ̀ Olómìnira ti Àríwá Masidónià,'' ìgbésẹ kan tí yóò yanjú èdè-àìyedè atọdunmọdun kan pẹlu orilẹ-ede Gíríkì eyiti ó ti dínà mọ́ àwọn ìgbìyànjú rẹ̀ lati di ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu àti NATO.
Modified Sentence: Awon eniyan Macedoni dibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko kan lojo Aiku lori boya ki won yi oruko re pada si ''Ile Olominira ti Ariwa Masidonia,'' igbese kan ti yoo yanju ede-aiyede atodunmodun kan pelu orile-ede Giriki eyiti o ti dina mo awon igbiyanju re lati di omo egbe Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu ati NATO.

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede Gíríkì, eyiti ó ni ẹkùn tí a ńpè ni Masidóníà, ńtẹnumọ fún ìgbà pipẹ wípé orúkọ aláàmúlégbè òun ní ìhà àríwá ńdúró fun ṣíṣe bi olúwa lóri ilẹ̀ òun tí ó sì ti dìbò láti dínà mọ́ wíwọlé rẹ sínú àjọ NATO àti EU.
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede Giriki, eyiti o ni ekun ti a npe ni Masidonia, ntenumo fun igba pipe wipe oruko alaamulegbe oun ni iha ariwa nduro fun sise bi oluwa lori ile oun ti o si ti dibo lati dina mo wiwole re sinu ajo NATO ati EU.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìjọba méjèèjì náà ṣe àdéhùn kan ninu oṣù Òkúdu ní ìdúró lórí orúkọ tuntun náà tí wọn dá àbá rẹ̀, ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede tójẹ́ alátakò wí àwíjàre pé orúkọ náà yóò dín agbára ìdánimọ̀ àwọn ẹ̀yà Slavic ti Masidóníà tíwọ́n pọ̀ jùlọ kù.
Modified Sentence: Awon ijoba mejeeji naa se adehun kan ninu osu Okudu ni iduro lori oruko tuntun naa ti won da aba re, sugbon awon omo orile-ede toje alatako wi awijare pe oruko naa yoo din agbara idanimo awon eya Slavic ti Masidonia tiwon po julo ku.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ Gjorge Ivanov ti sọpé òun kòní dìbò ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ àtipé ìpolongo fún ìdẹ́yẹsí kan ti jẹ́kí àwọn ìsiyèméjì wà lórí bóyá ìjádedìbò yóò tó ìdá àádọ́ta ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún eyiti i ṣe iye tó kéré jùlọ tí wọ́n nílò fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà láti jẹ́ eyiti ó wúlò.
Modified Sentence: Aare Gjorge Ivanov ti sope oun koni dibo ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko atipe ipolongo fun ideyesi kan ti jeki awon isiyemeji wa lori boya ijadedibo yoo to ida aadota ninu ogoorun eyiti i se iye to kere julo ti won nilo fun ibo onibeeni-beeko naa lati je eyiti o wulo.

Original Sentence: Ìbéèrè náà lóri ìwé àmútẹ̀kasí fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà kà báyìí: ''Ṣe o faramọ́ ìjọ́mọ-ẹgbẹ́ àjọ NATO àti EU pẹ̀lú ìtẹ́wọ́gbà ti àdéhùn náà pẹ̀lú orilẹ-ede Gíríkì.''.
Modified Sentence: Ibeere naa lori iwe amutekasi fun ibo onibeeni-beeko naa ka bayii: ''Se o faramo ijomo-egbe ajo NATO ati EU pelu itewogba ti adehun naa pelu orile-ede Giriki.''.

Original Sentence: Àwọn alátìlẹyìn ti ìyípadà orúkọ náà, pẹ̀lú Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Ìjọba Zoran Zaev, wí àwíjàre wipe ó jẹ́ ìdíyelé tóyẹ kan láti san láti leè lépa ìgbaniwọlé sinu àwọn àjọ bíi EU àti NATO fún Masidóníà, ọ̀kan ninu àwọn orilẹ̀-ede tó yọ jáde síta láti inú ìwólulẹ̀ ti Orilẹ-ede Yugosilafia.
Modified Sentence: Awon alatileyin ti iyipada oruko naa, pelu Adari Igbimo Ijoba Zoran Zaev, wi awijare wipe o je idiyele toye kan lati san lati lee lepa igbaniwole sinu awon ajo bii EU ati NATO fun Masidonia, okan ninu awon orile-ede to yo jade sita lati inu iwolule ti Orile-ede Yugosilafia.

Original Sentence: Mó wá lóòní láti di ìbò fún ọjọ́ iwájú orilẹ-ede náà, fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Masidóníà kí wọ́n leè máa gbé ní òmìnira lábẹ́ agboòrùn ti Àjọ Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Yuroopu nitoripe ó túmọ̀ sí àwọn ìgbésí ayé aláìléwu púpọ̀ síi fún gbogbo wa,'' gẹgẹ bíi Olivera Georgijevska, ẹni ọdún mọ́kàndínlọ́gọ́rin ṣe sọ, ní ìlú Skopje.
Modified Sentence: Mo wa looni lati di ibo fun ojo iwaju orile-ede naa, fun awon odo ni Masidonia ki won lee maa gbe ni ominira labe agboorun ti Ajo Awon Orile-ede Yuroopu nitoripe o tumo si awon igbesi aye alailewu pupo sii fun gbogbo wa,'' gege bii Olivera Georgijevska, eni odun mokandinlogorin se so, ni ilu Skopje.

Original Sentence: Botilẹjepe kìí ṣe àdéhùn tó ńfipá múni lábẹ̀ òfin, àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ ilé ìgbìmọ aṣojú-ṣòfin tí ó tóníye ti sọpé àwọn faramọ̀ àbájáde ìbò náà láti ṣeé ní eyiti ẹnu rẹ̀ múlẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Botilejepe kii se adehun to nfipa muni labe ofin, awon omo egbe ile igbimo asoju-sofin ti o toniye ti sope awon faramo abajade ibo naa lati see ni eyiti enu re mule.

Original Sentence: Ìyípadà orúkọ náà yóò nílò ìdá méjì tópọ̀jù ninu ìdá mẹ́ta àwọn ọmọ ilé ìgbìmọ aṣojú-ṣòfin.
Modified Sentence: Iyipada oruko naa yoo nilo ida meji topoju ninu ida meta awon omo ile igbimo asoju-sofin.

Original Sentence: Ìgbìmọ̀ amúṣẹ́ṣe lori ìdìbò ti orilẹ-ede náà sọpé kòsí àwọn ìròyìn àìṣedéédéé kankan títí aago méjì ọ̀sán.
Modified Sentence: Igbimo amusese lori idibo ti orile-ede naa sope kosi awon iroyin aisedeedee kankan titi aago meji osan.

Original Sentence: Bótiwùkórí, ìjáde-dìbò dúró ní ìdá mẹ́rìndínlógún ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀run, bí a ṣafiwé rẹ̀ sì ìdá mẹ́rìnlélọ́gbọ̀n ti inú ìdìbò àwọn aṣojú-ṣòfin tókọjá lọ́dún 2016 nigbati ìdá mẹ́rìndínláàádọ́rin àwọn olùdìbò tó forúkọ sílẹ̀ fi ìwé àmútẹkasí láti dìbo wọn sílẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Botiwukori, ijade-dibo duro ni ida merindinlogun ninu ida ogoorun, bi a safiwe re si ida merinlelogbon ti inu idibo awon asoju-sofin tokoja lodun 2016 nigbati ida merindinlaaadorin awon oludibo to foruko sile fi iwe amutekasi lati dibo won sile.

Original Sentence: ''Mo jáde síta láti dìbò nitori àwọn ọmọ mi, ipò wa wà ninu Yuroopu,'' gẹgẹ bíi Gjose Tanevski, ẹni ọdún méjìlélọ́gọ́ta, olùdìbo kan ní olù-ìlú náà, Skopje ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Mo jade sita lati dibo nitori awon omo mi, ipo wa wa ninu Yuroopu,'' gege bii Gjose Tanevski, eni odun mejilelogota, oludibo kan ni olu-ilu naa, Skopje se so.

Original Sentence: Adarí Ìgbìmọ Ìjọba ti Masidóníà Zoran Zaev, aya rẹ̀ Zorica àti ọmọdékùnrin rẹ̀ Dushko fi ìwé àmútẹ̀kasí láti dìbò wọn sílẹ̀ fún ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ ní Masidónía lori yíyí orúkọ orilẹ-ede náà pada eyiti yóò sí ọ̀nà fún un láti darapọ mọ àjọ NATO àti Ẹgbẹ́ Àwọn Orilẹ'ede Yuroopu ní ìlú Strumica, lorilẹ-ede Masidóníà ni ọgbọ̀nọ́jọ́ oṣù Owewe ĺọ̀dún 2018.
Modified Sentence: Adari Igbimo Ijoba ti Masidonia Zoran Zaev, aya re Zorica ati omodekunrin re Dushko fi iwe amutekasi lati dibo won sile fun ibo onibeeni-beeko ni Masidonia lori yiyi oruko orile-ede naa pada eyiti yoo si ona fun un lati darapo mo ajo NATO ati Egbe Awon Orile'ede Yuroopu ni ilu Strumica, lorile-ede Masidonia ni ogbonojo osu Owewe lodun 2018.

Original Sentence: Níwájú ilé ìgbìmọ̀ àwọn aṣoju-ṣòfin ní ìlú Skopje, Vlamirir Kavardarkov, ẹni ọdún mẹ́rìnléláàádọ́ta, ńgba ìtàgé kékeré kan láradì tí ó sì fa àwọn àga tówà niwaju àwọn àgọ́ tí àwọn ti yóò dẹ́yẹ sí ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà ṣàtòpọ̀ wọn sókè.
Modified Sentence: Niwaju ile igbimo awon asoju-sofin ni ilu Skopje, Vlamirir Kavardarkov, eni odun merinlelaaadota, ngba itage kekere kan laradi ti o si fa awon aga towa niwaju awon ago ti awon ti yoo deye si ibo onibeeni-beeko naa satopo won soke.

Original Sentence: ''Àwa wà fún àjọ NATO àti EU, ṣugbọn a fẹ́ darapọ̀ pẹ̀lú orí wa lókè, kìí ṣe nípaṣẹ̀ iṣe ẹnu ọ̀nạ̀́'' Kadarkov ni o so bẹẹ̣́ ̣.
Modified Sentence: ''Awa wa fun ajo NATO ati EU, sugbon a fe darapo pelu ori wa loke, kii se nipase ise enu ona'' Kadarkov ni o so bee .

Original Sentence: “Àwá jẹ́ orilẹ-ede tí ò kúùṣẹ́, ṣ̵ùgbọ́n a ní ọ̀wọ̀ ara-ẹni.
Modified Sentence: “Awa je orile-ede ti o kuuse, sugbon a ni owo ara-eni.

Original Sentence: Bí wọn kòbá fẹ́ gbà wá gẹ́gẹ́bí Masidóníà, a leè kọjú sí àwọn ẹlòmíràn bíi orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà àti Rọ́síà kí á sì dí ara ti àjọṣepọ̀ Euro-Asia.
Modified Sentence: Bi won koba fe gba wa gegebi Masidonia, a lee koju si awon elomiran bii orile-ede Saina ati Rosia ki a si di ara ti ajosepo Euro-Asia.

Original Sentence: Adarí Ìgbìmọ̀ Zaev sọpé ìjọ́mọ-ẹgbẹ́ NATO yóò mú ìdókòòwò tíwọ́n nílò púpọ̀ wọ orilẹ-ede Masidóníà, eyiti tí ó ní òdiwọn àìríṣẹ́ṣe tí o ju ìdá ogún ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ.
Modified Sentence: Adari Igbimo Zaev sope ijomo-egbe NATO yoo mu idokoowo tiwon nilo pupo wo orile-ede Masidonia, eyiti ti o ni odiwon airisese ti o ju ida ogun ninu ida ogoorun lo.

Original Sentence: ''Mo gbàgbọ́ wípé àwọn eniyan pupọ̀ yóò fi ojú rere hàn síi nitori àwọn ọmọ ìlú wa tóju ìdá ọgọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ ńfi ojú rere hàn sí ti àjọ EU àti NATO,'' Zaev ni o sọ báyií lẹ́yìn tí o ju ìwé amútẹ̀kàsí rẹ̀ sínu àpótí.
Modified Sentence: ''Mo gbagbo wipe awon eniyan pupo yoo fi oju rere han sii nitori awon omo ilu wa toju ida ogorin ninu ogoorun lo nfi oju rere han si ti ajo EU ati NATO,'' Zaev ni o so bayii leyin ti o ju iwe amutekasi re sinu apoti.

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé ìbò ''bẹ́ẹ̀ni'' yóò jẹ ''ìjẹ́ríìsí ọjọ́ iwájú wa.”
Modified Sentence: O sope ibo ''beeni'' yoo je ''ijeriisi ojo iwaju wa.”

Original Sentence: Ìdìbò èrò ara ìlú kan tíwọ́n ṣàgbéjáde rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ Ajé láti ọwọ́ Àjọ fún Ìwáàdí nípa Ìlàna Ìṣèjọba sọpé láàrin ìdá ọgbọ̀n àti ìdá mẹ́tàlélógójì ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn olùdìbò ni yóò kópa ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà - tí o ́lọ sílẹ̀ ju iye ìjáde-dìbò tíwọ́n nílò lọ.
Modified Sentence: Idibo ero ara ilu kan tiwon sagbejade re lojo Aje lati owo Ajo fun Iwaadi nipa Ilana Isejoba sope laarin ida ogbon ati ida metalelogoji ninu ida ogoorun awon oludibo ni yoo kopa ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko naa - ti o lo sile ju iye ijade-dibo tiwon nilo lo.

Original Sentence: Ìdìbò èrò ara ìlú miran, tí ilé iṣẹ́ Amóhùnmáwòrán Telma ṣe, ríi pé ìdá mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn olùdáhùn ni wọ́n ńgbèrò láti di ìbò náà lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.
Modified Sentence: Idibo ero ara ilu miran, ti ile ise Amohunmaworan Telma se, rii pe ida metadinlogota ninu ida ogoorun awon oludahun ni won ngbero lati di ibo naa lojo Abameta.

Original Sentence: Nínú wọ̀n, ìdá àádọ́rin nínú ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún sọpé àwọn yóò dìbò fún bẹ́ẹ̀ni.
Modified Sentence: Ninu won, ida aadorin ninu ida ogoorun sope awon yoo dibo fun beeni.

Original Sentence: Fún ki ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà láti jẹ́ àṣeyọrí ìjáde-dìbò nílò láti jẹ́ ìbò ìdá àádọ́ta ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àti ẹyọ kan.
Modified Sentence: Fun ki ibo onibeeni-beeko naa lati je aseyori ijade-dibo nilo lati je ibo ida aadota ninu ida ogoorun ati eyo kan.

Original Sentence: Ìkùnà ninu ìbò oníbẹ́ẹ̀ni-bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́ náà yóò duro fún àbùkù gbòógì àkọ́kọ́ tí yóò kan ìlànà ìṣèjọba ti ìjọba tó ńṣeti awọn orilẹ-ede Yuroopu ati ilẹ Amẹ́ríkà látígbà tóti gba ìjọba lóṣù Ẹ̀bibi lọ́dún tó kọjá.
Modified Sentence: Ikuna ninu ibo onibeeni-beeko naa yoo duro fun abuku gboogi akoko ti yoo kan ilana isejoba ti ijoba to nseti awon orile-ede Yuroopu ati ile Amerika latigba toti gba ijoba losu Ebibi lodun to koja.

Original Sentence: Wòran: Sergio Aguero ti Manchester City bóti ńtukọ̀ ara rẹ káàkiri gbogbo àabo Brighton láti gbá ayò wọlé
Modified Sentence: Woran: Sergio Aguero ti Manchester City boti ntuko ara re kaakiri gbogbo aabo Brighton lati gba ayo wole

Original Sentence: Sergio Aguero àti Raheem Sterling rán iṣẹ́ sínú ààbò Brighton ninu bíborí oní 2-0 ti Manchester City lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹta ni Pápá Ìṣeré ti Etihad ní ìlú Manchester, lorilẹ-ede Gẹ̀ẹ́sì.
Modified Sentence: Sergio Aguero ati Raheem Sterling ran ise sinu aabo Brighton ninu bibori oni 2-0 ti Manchester City lojo Abameta ni Papa Isere ti Etihad ni ilu Manchester, lorile-ede Geesi.

Original Sentence: Aguero jẹ́kí ó dàbí pé ó ti rọrùn ju nípa ayò afiniṣẹ̀ṣín rẹ̀ eyiti ó gbá wọlé ni ìṣẹ́jú karùndínláàdọ́rin náà.
Modified Sentence: Aguero jeki o dabi pe o ti rorun ju nipa ayo afinisesin re eyiti o gba wole ni iseju karundinlaadorin naa.

Original Sentence: Agbábọ́ọ̀lùmátàṣé ọmọ ilẹ̀ Ajẹntína gba ìgbásíni kan láàrin gungun orí pápá ní ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ ti ṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé náà.
Modified Sentence: Agbaboolumatase omo ile Ajentina gba igbasini kan laarin gungun ori papa ni ibere ti sise-n-tele naa.

Original Sentence: Ó sáré láàrin àwọn olùdáààbòbò ilé Brighton mẹ́ta kí ó tó lọ bí abẹ ninu pápá tósí sílẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: O sare laarin awon oludaaabobo ile Brighton meta ki o to lo bi abe ninu papa tosi sile naa.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn náà Aguero rí ara níbití àwọn ẹlẹ́wù aláwọ̀ ewé mẹ́rin ti yìí ká.
Modified Sentence: Leyin naa Aguero ri ara nibiti awon elewu alawo ewe merin ti yii ka.

Original Sentence: Ní tòótọ́, Mo mọ̀ wipe Mo jẹ́ olóríire ju àwọn kan ninu àwọn akẹgbẹ́ mi lọ bí ó ṣe jẹ́pé àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí a darí sọ́dọ̀ mi tí máa ńjẹ́ ti òṣèlú.
Modified Sentence: Ni tooto, Mo mo wipe Mo je oloriire ju awon kan ninu awon akegbe mi lo bi o se jepe awon oro ti a dari sodo mi ti maa nje ti oselu.

Original Sentence: Ẹnu máa ńyà mi nípa ti ìwà akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ àti ìṣọkàngírí ti àwọn akẹgbẹ́ wọ̀nyen tí wọ́n ńdojúkọ òjò èèbù ti àwọn tí kòka obìnrin sí nǹkan àti àwọn ẹlẹ́yàmẹ̀yà lójoojúmọ́ ṣùgbọ́n tíwọn kò sálọ nígbà kankan.
Modified Sentence: Enu maa nya mi nipa ti iwa akosemose ati isokangiri ti awon akegbe wonyen ti won ndojuko ojo eebu ti awon ti koka obinrin si nnkan ati awon eleyameya lojoojumo sugbon tiwon ko salo nigba kankan.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀kan ninu àwọn nǹkan tó ńjánikulẹ̀ jùlọ ninu òṣèlú ti òde-ìwòyí ni bí àwọn ipele èèbù bíbú ti wá di àṣà tó bójúmu.
Modified Sentence: Okan ninu awon nnkan to njanikule julo ninu oselu ti ode-iwoyi ni bi awon ipele eebu bibu ti wa di asa to bojumu.

Original Sentence: Jeremy Corbyn  sọ lọ́sẹ̀ tókọjá wipe ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlu Labour níláti jẹ́kí ìdàgbàsókè bá àṣà ìpamọ́ra.
Modified Sentence: Jeremy Corbyn  so lose tokoja wipe egbe oselu Labour nilati jeki idagbasoke ba asa ipamora.

Original Sentence: Òtítọ náà nipé a kìí ṣe sọọsi tó gbòòrò yẹn mọ́ àtipé pẹ̀lu gbogbo àbá ''kòsí-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé'' tabi àwọn ìlàna ìyípadà ti ìyannisipò ẹgbẹ òṣèlu náà ńdi eyiti ó ńtín-ín-rín púpọ síi.
Modified Sentence: Otito naa nipe a kii se soosi to gbooro yen mo atipe pelu gbogbo aba ''kosi-igbekele'' tabi awon ilana iyipada ti iyannisipo egbe oselu naa ndi eyiti o ntin-in-rin pupo sii.

Original Sentence: Mo ti ní ọpọ ìmọràn láàrin ọdún méjì tókọjá tó ńpàrọwà fún mi láti jẹ́kí orí mi wà nísàlẹ̀, kí ńmá fí bẹ́ẹ̀ sọ̀rọ̀ mọ́ àtipé lẹ́yìn náà N ó ''wà dáadáa.''
Modified Sentence: Mo ti ni opo imoran laarin odun meji tokoja to nparowa fun mi lati jeki ori mi wa nisale, ki nma fi bee soro mo atipe leyin naa N o ''wa daadaa.''

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n ìyẹn kìí ṣe ohun tí Mo wá sínú òṣèlú láti ṣe.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon iyen kii se ohun ti Mo wa sinu oselu lati se.

Original Sentence: Láti ìgbà tí Mo ti darapọ̀ mọ́ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour bí ọmọ ilé ìwé kan, lẹ́yìn inú tó bí mi nípa àìbìkítà ìjọba Thatcher eyiti ó fi kíláàsì ilé-ìwé onígbogbo-ẹ̀kọ́ mi sílẹ̀ nípò tóti fẹ́rẹ̀ wólulẹ̀ tán, Mo ti ṣe àwárí láti máa jà fún ìmúdára síi àwọn iṣẹ́ ìlú fún àwọn tí wọ́n nílò wọn jùlọ - bóyá gẹ́gẹ́bí káńsílọ̀ agbègbè kan tàbí aláàkóso ìjọba.
Modified Sentence: Lati igba ti Mo ti darapo mo egbe oselu Labour bi omo ile iwe kan, leyin inu to bi mi nipa aibikita ijoba Thatcher eyiti o fi kilaasi ile-iwe onigbogbo-eko mi sile nipo toti fere wolule tan, Mo ti se awari lati maa ja fun imudara sii awon ise ilu fun awon ti won nilo won julo - boya gegebi kansilo agbegbe kan tabi alaakoso ijoba.

Original Sentence: Èmi kòfi ìgbà kankan fi òṣèlú mi pamọ́, àti ninu ìdìbò tókọjá náà.
Modified Sentence: Emi kofi igba kankan fi oselu mi pamo, ati ninu idibo tokoja naa.

Original Sentence: Kòsí ẹnikan ninu Ìla-oòrùn Nottingham tí ó leè ní ìpòrúùru ọkàn lọ́nàkọnà nípa àwọn ipò ìlànà mi àti àwọn ipele àìleèfohùnṣọ̀kan pẹ̀lú àwọn adàri tówànípò lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́.
Modified Sentence: Kosi enikan ninu Ila-oorun Nottingham ti o lee ni iporuuru okan lonakona nipa awon ipo ilana mi ati awon ipele aileefohunsokan pelu awon adari towanipo lowolowo.

Original Sentence: Fún àwọn tíwọn jẹ́kí ìtẹ̀síwájú bá àbá náà lọ́jọ́ Ẹtì, gbogbo ohun ti N ó sọ nipé nigbati orilẹ-ede náà ńroko sọ́nà ọ̀dọ̀ Brexit kan eyiti yóò pa àwọn ara-ilé, àwọn oko-òwò, àti àwọn iṣé ìlú lára, Èmi kòní òye ìfẹ́ náà láti máa fi àkókò àti agbára mi ṣofo lórí jíjẹ́ olóòtítọ́ si adarí ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour.
Modified Sentence: Fun awon tiwon jeki itesiwaju ba aba naa lojo Eti, gbogbo ohun ti N o so nipe nigbati orile-ede naa nroko sona odo Brexit kan eyiti yoo pa awon ara-ile, awon oko-owo, ati awon ise ilu lara, Emi koni oye ife naa lati maa fi akoko ati agbara mi sofo lori jije olootito si adari egbe oselu Labour.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọn lóòtítọ iṣẹ ìránṣẹ́ kan tí Mo ní kìí ṣe sí Nothingham Momentum, o wá fún àwọn to dìbò fún mí, bóyá wọ́n jẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣèlú Labour tàbí bẹ́ẹ̀kọ́: Mo ń yangàn láti sìn yín tí Mo sì ṣe ìlérì wipe kòsí iye àwọn ìdúnkookò ìyọnikúrò tàbi ti òṣèlú   kòṣẹlẹ̀-kíákíá tí yóò dámi lọ́wọ́ kọ́ láti máṣe kópa mọ́ ninu ohun tí Mo gbàgbó wipe wọ́n jẹ́ àwọn ohun dára jùlọ fún gbogbo yín.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon lootito ise iranse kan ti Mo ni kii se si Nothingham Momentum, o wa fun awon to dibo fun mi, boya won je omo egbe oselu Labour tabi beeko: Mo n yangan lati sin yin ti Mo si se ileri wipe kosi iye awon idunkooko iyonikuro tabi ti oselu   kosele-kiakia ti yoo dami lowo ko lati mase kopa mo ninu ohun ti Mo gbagbo wipe won je awon ohun dara julo fun gbogbo yin.

Original Sentence: Chris Leslie  ni MP fún Ìla-oòrùn Nottingham
Modified Sentence: Chris Leslie  ni MP fun Ila-oorun Nottingham

Original Sentence: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Ayr tíwọn kòlù rí lọ sóke
Modified Sentence: Ayr 38 - 17 Melrose: Ayr tiwon kolu ri lo soke

Original Sentence: Awọn ìgbìyànjú ìgbẹ̀yìn méjì leè ti sún èsì ìpari náà bákan-bákan, ṣùgbọ́n kòsí àni-àní wipe Ayr yẹ láti borí ninu ìdíje ọjọ́ náà yìí tójẹ́ apanilẹ́ẹ̀rín tótún yanilẹ́nu ninu Ìṣọ̀rí Aláàkọ́kọ́ ti Tennent.
Modified Sentence: Awon igbiyanju igbeyin meji lee ti sun esi ipari naa bakan-bakan, sugbon kosi ani-ani wipe Ayr ye lati bori ninu idije ojo naa yii toje apanileerin totun yanilenu ninu Isori Alaakoko ti Tennent.

Original Sentence: Báyìí àwọn ni ó wà lóòkè tábìlì náà, ikọ̀ kan ṣoṣo ninu mẹ́wàá tíwọn kò tíì lù rí.
Modified Sentence: Bayii awon ni o wa looke tabili naa, iko kan soso ninu mewaa tiwon ko tii lu ri.

Original Sentence: Ní òpin rẹ̀, ààbò wọn tógbópọn ni, pẹ̀lú pé wọ́n ńṣàmúlò àwọn àǹfààní lọ́ná tódára jù, eyiti ó gbé ikọ̀ ti ilé náà tí olùkọ́ni wọn sì ní gbogbo ẹ̀tọ́ láti máa dunnú.
Modified Sentence: Ni opin re, aabo won togbopon ni, pelu pe won nsamulo awon anfaani lona todara ju, eyiti o gbe iko ti ile naa ti olukoni won si ni gbogbo eto lati maa dunnu.

Original Sentence: ''A ti dán wa wò nínú àwọn ayò wa tìtí dé ibí yìí, àtipé síbẹ̀ kòsí ẹnití ó tíì lù wá, nitorinaa Mo nílatí máa dunnú,'' ni ó sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''A ti dan wa wo ninu awon ayo wa titi de ibi yii, atipe sibe kosi eniti o tii lu wa, nitorinaa Mo nilati maa dunnu,'' ni o so.

Original Sentence: Robyn Christie ti Melrose sọpé: ''Òṣùba lọ sọ́dọ̀ Ayr, wọ́n ṣàmúlò àwọn àǹfààní wọn lọ́nà tódára ju bí àwa tiṣe lọ.''
Modified Sentence: Robyn Christie ti Melrose sope: ''Osuba lo sodo Ayr, won samulo awon anfaani won lona todara ju bi awa tise lo.''

Original Sentence: Ìgbìyànjú ìṣẹ́jú ìkẹrìnlá ti Grant Anderson, ti a yípada nípaṣẹ̀ Frazier Climo, fi Ayr síwájú, ṣùgbọ́n káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé kan fún onífìla ilẹ̀ Scotland Rory Hughes, tí Warriors fi sílẹ̀ fún ìdíje náà, gba Melrose láyè láti jẹ́kí àwọn nọmba sọ̀rọ̀ tí Jason Baggot sì sáré di ìgbìyànjú kan tí a kò yípadà mu.
Modified Sentence: Igbiyanju iseju ikerinla ti Grant Anderson, ti a yipada nipase Frazier Climo, fi Ayr siwaju, sugbon kaadi alawo ofeeefe kan fun onifila ile Scotland Rory Hughes, ti Warriors fi sile fun idije naa, gba Melrose laye lati jeki awon nomba soro ti Jason Baggot si sare di igbiyanju kan ti a ko yipada mu.

Original Sentence: Climo fẹ ìléwájú Ayr lójú pẹ̀lú ìjìyà pẹnariti kan, saájú, ní ìdajì àkókò gan-an, ó gbá ayò wọlé lẹ́yìn náà ó yí ìgbìyànjú aláàdáṣe kan padà láti sọ ọ́ di 17-5 fún Ayr ní àkókò ìsinmi náà.
Modified Sentence: Climo fe ilewaju Ayr loju pelu ijiya penariti kan, saaju, ni idaji akoko gan-an, o gba ayo wole leyin naa o yi igbiyanju alaadase kan pada lati so o di 17-5 fun Ayr ni akoko isinmi naa.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n Melrose bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìdajì ìdíje ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì náà lọ́nà tódára tí ìgbìyànjú Patrick Anderson, tí Baggot yípadà sì dín ìyàtọ̀ náà kù sí àwọn kókó máàrún.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon Melrose bere idaji idije eleekeji naa lona todara ti igbiyanju Patrick Anderson, ti Baggot yipada si din iyato naa ku si awon koko maarun.

Original Sentence: Ìdádúró gígùn kan wà lẹ́yìn náà fún ìfarapa púpọ̀ tí Ruaridh Knott ní, ẹnití wọ́n gbé jáde kúrò, àtipé láti àtúnbẹ̀rẹ̀ náà, Ayr tún yọrí síwájú nípaṣẹ̀ ìgbìyànjú Stafford McDowall kan, eyití wọ́n yípadà láti ọwọ́ Climo.
Modified Sentence: Idaduro gigun kan wa leyin naa fun ifarapa pupo ti Ruaridh Knott ni, eniti won gbe jade kuro, atipe lati atunbere naa, Ayr tun yori siwaju nipase igbiyanju Stafford McDowall kan, eyiti won yipada lati owo Climo.

Original Sentence: Adele balógun ti Ayr Blair Macpherson niwọ́n fún ní káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé lẹ́yìn náà, àtipé lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi, Melrose jẹ́kì ọkùnrin àfikún náà sanwó pẹ̀lú ìgbìyànjú Bruce Colvine kan tíwọn kò yípadà, ní òpin èèdi oní-ìdààmu tó gbóná gidigidi kan.
Modified Sentence: Adele balogun ti Ayr Blair Macpherson niwon fun ni kaadi alawo ofeeefe leyin naa, atipe leekan sii, Melrose jeki okunrin afikun naa sanwo pelu igbiyanju Bruce Colvine kan tiwon ko yipada, ni opin eedi oni-idaamu to gbona gidigidi kan.

Original Sentence: Ikọ̀ onílé náà padà wá, lábẹ̀ botiwukori, àtipé nigbati wọ́n fún Struan Hutchinson ni káàdì aláwọ̀ òfééèfé fún títako Climo láìsí bọ́ọ̀lù, láti ibi ìlà ìjìyà pẹnariti, MacPherson fẹṣẹ̀ kan ilẹ̀ lẹ́yìn òòlù àwọn Ayr tó ńtẹ̀síwájú.
Modified Sentence: Iko onile naa pada wa, labe botiwukori, atipe nigbati won fun Struan Hutchinson ni kaadi alawo ofeeefe fun titako Climo laisi boolu, lati ibi ila ijiya penariti, MacPherson fese kan ile leyin oolu awon Ayr to ntesiwaju.

Original Sentence: Climo yí padà, bí ó tunṣe ṣe n’ibẹ̀rẹ̀, lẹ́yìn tí Kyle Rowe gba bọ́ọ̀lù ti David Armstrong gbá lati inú apoti tí ó sì fi onípò-igun ránṣẹ́ síta fún ìgbìyànjú ẹlẹẹ̀kaàrún fun àwọn ikọ̀ onílé náà.
Modified Sentence: Climo yi pada, bi o tunse se n’ibere, leyin ti Kyle Rowe gba boolu ti David Armstrong gba lati inu apoti ti o si fi onipo-igun ranse sita fun igbiyanju eleekaarun fun awon iko onile naa.

Original Sentence: Ìràwọ Still Game dábì ẹniti óti ṣetán fún iṣẹ́-ìṣe tuntun ní ilé iṣẹ́ ẹka ti olóúnjẹ.
Modified Sentence: Irawo Still Game dabi eniti oti setan fun ise-ise tuntun ni ile ise eka ti olounje.

Original Sentence: Ìràwọ Still Game Ford Kieran dábì ẹnitó ṣetán láti lọ sínú ilé iṣẹ́ ti ẹka olóúnjẹ lẹ́yìn tíwọ́n ṣàwárí wipe wọ́n ti dárúkọ rẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́bí olùdarí ile iṣẹ́ tóní àwọn ile ìsoúnjẹta oníìwé-àṣẹ kan.
Modified Sentence: Irawo Still Game Ford Kieran dabi enito setan lati lo sinu ile ise ti eka olounje leyin tiwon sawari wipe won ti daruko re gegebi oludari ile ise toni awon ile isounjeta oniiwe-ase kan.

Original Sentence: Ẹni ọdún mẹ́rìndínlọ́gọ́ta náà ló ńkópa bíi Jack Jarvis lórí ètò BBC tó gbajúmọ̀ náà, níbití ó ti ńkọ̀wé tó sì ńdìjọ ṣeré pẹ̀lú akẹgbẹ́ aláàwàdà ọlọ́jọ́-pípẹ́ Greg Hemphill.
Modified Sentence: Eni odun merindinlogota naa lo nkopa bii Jack Jarvis lori eto BBC to gbajumo naa, nibiti o ti nkowe to si ndijo sere pelu akegbe alaawada olojo-pipe Greg Hemphill.

Original Sentence: Àwọn méjèèjì ti kédé wipe oníṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé ìkẹẹ̀sán tó ńbọ náà yóò jẹ́ ìkẹyìn ninu eré ti ètò náà, tí o sì dàbí wípé Kiernan ńṣètò fún ìgbésí-ayé lẹ́yìn Craiglang.
Modified Sentence: Awon mejeeji ti kede wipe onisise-n-tele ikeesan to nbo naa yoo je ikeyin ninu ere ti eto naa, ti o si dabi wipe Kiernan nseto fun igbesi-aye leyin Craiglang.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn àtòkọ àkọsìlẹ́ ilé iṣẹ́, òun ni olùdarí Adriftmorn Limited.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi awon atoko akosile ile ise, oun ni oludari Adriftmorn Limited.

Original Sentence: Òṣèré náà kọ láti sọ̀rọ̀ ìtàn náà, botilẹjẹpe orísun ìwé ìròyìn Scottish Sun yọ́ ọ sọpé Kiernan tí ńfojú wá ọ̀nà láti dásí ''oko-òwò ilé iṣẹ́ olóúnjẹ tó ńgbèrú'' ti Glasgow.
Modified Sentence: Osere naa ko lati soro itan naa, botilejepe orisun iwe iroyin Scottish Sun yo o sope Kiernan ti nfoju wa ona lati dasi ''oko-owo ile ise olounje to ngberu'' ti Glasgow.

Original Sentence: 'Òkun náà jẹ́ tiwa': Orilẹ-ede Bolifia tí ilẹ̀ gbígbẹ yípo pátápátá ńretí wipe ilé ẹjọ́ yóò tún sí ọ̀nà sínú òkun Pàsífíìkì
Modified Sentence: 'Okun naa je tiwa': Orile-ede Bolifia ti ile gbigbe yipo patapata nreti wipe ile ejo yoo tun si ona sinu okun Pasifiiki

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi ńlọ káàkiri yíka àwọn olú ilé iṣẹ àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi tíwọn wọ̀ lásọ ní ìlú La Paz.
Modified Sentence: Awon omo ogun ori-omi nlo kaakiri yika awon olu ile ise awon omo ogun ori-omi tiwon wo laso ni ilu La Paz.

Original Sentence: Awọn ilé ìjọba ńgbé àsìá aláwọ omi òkun sókê.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile ijoba ngbe asia alawo omi okun soke.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ibùdó àwọn ọmọ ogun orí-omi láti adágún Titicaca sí Amazon náà ni wọ́n lẹ àkọmọ̀nà náà mọ́pé: ''Òkun náà jẹ́ tiwa nípa ẹ̀tọ́.
Modified Sentence: Awon ibudo awon omo ogun ori-omi lati adagun Titicaca si Amazon naa ni won le akomona naa mope: ''Okun naa je tiwa nipa eto.

Original Sentence: Láti gbà á padà jẹ́ ojúṣe kan.''
Modified Sentence: Lati gba a pada je ojuse kan.''

Original Sentence: Jákè-jádò orilẹ-ede Bolifia tí ilẹ̀ gbígbẹ yí káàkiri, ìrántí ti bèbè òkun tíwọ́n pàdánù sọ́wọ́ orilẹ-ede Ṣílè nínú aáwọ̀ ohun àmúṣọrọ̀ ti ọgọ́ọ̀rún ọdún ìkọkàndínlógún ninu eyiti ẹ̀jẹ̀ ti sàn sì hàn kedere - gẹ́gẹ́bí ìpòǹgbẹ láti tún tukọ̀ lórí òkun Pasífíìkì lẹ́ẹ̀kan síi.
Modified Sentence: Jake-jado orile-ede Bolifia ti ile gbigbe yi kaakiri, iranti ti bebe okun tiwon padanu sowo orile-ede Sile ninu aawo ohun amusoro ti ogoorun odun ikokandinlogun ninu eyiti eje ti san si han kedere - gegebi ipongbe lati tun tuko lori okun Pasifiiki leekan sii.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìrètí wọ̀nyẹn ní wọ́n wà ní bóyá nípò tóga jùlọ ninu àwọn ọdún, bí orilẹ-ede Bolifia ti ńdúró dé ìdájọ́ ilé ẹjọ́ àgbáyé lọ́jọ́ ìkínní oṣù Ọ̀wàrà lẹ́yìn àwọn ìfikùnlukùn ọdún máàrún.
Modified Sentence: Awon ireti wonyen ni won wa ni boya nipo toga julo ninu awon odun, bi orile-ede Bolifia ti nduro de idajo ile ejo agbaye lojo ikinni osu Owara leyin awon ifikunlukun odun maarun.

Original Sentence: ''Bolifia ni ipá náà tó ńti, ẹ̀mí ìṣọ̀kan àti ìbàlẹ̀-ọkàn, tí ó sì ńretí àbájáde náà pẹ̀lú ojú-ìwòye rere,'' gẹgẹ bíi Roberto Calzadilla, aṣojú orilẹ-ede Bolifia kan ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Bolifia ni ipa naa to nti, emi isokan ati ibale-okan, ti o si nreti abajade naa pelu oju-iwoye rere,'' gege bii Roberto Calzadilla, asoju orile-ede Bolifia kan se so.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn ọmọ orilẹ-ede Bolifia yóô ìdájọ́ ICJ náà lórí àwọn ojú-ìwòran ńlá jáke-jádò orilẹ-ede náà, pẹ̀lú ìrètí wipe ìgbìmọ ìdájọ́ náà ní The Hague yóò fi ojú rere wo àwíjàre Bolifia wipe - lẹ́yìn àwọn ọdún ti àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí kò yọrísí rere - orilẹ-ede Ṣílè wà lábẹ́ ojúṣe tójẹ́ danfan eyiti ó ńfún Bolifia ní ẹ̀tọ́ sí ọ̀nà láti jade sí òkun náà.
Modified Sentence: Opo awon omo orile-ede Bolifia yoo idajo ICJ naa lori awon oju-iworan nla jake-jado orile-ede naa, pelu ireti wipe igbimo idajo naa ni The Hague yoo fi oju rere wo awijare Bolifia wipe - leyin awon odun ti awon oro ti ko yorisi rere - orile-ede Sile wa labe ojuse toje danfan eyiti o nfun Bolifia ni eto si ona lati jade si okun naa.

Original Sentence: Evo Morales, ààrẹ orilẹ-ede Bolifia tójẹ́ ojúlówó ọmọ ìlú táyé ńfẹ́ - ẹniti on ja ìjà aláàríyànjiyàn atún dìbò yàn lọ́dún tó ńbọ̀ - tí ó sì̀ ní igùn púpọ̀ láti ṣe bákannáa lórí ìdájọ́ ti ọjọ́ Aje ́.
Modified Sentence: Evo Morales, aare orile-ede Bolifia toje ojulowo omo ilu taye nfe - eniti on ja ija alaariyanjiyan atun dibo yan lodun to nbo - ti o si ni igun pupo lati se bakannaa lori idajo ti ojo Aje .

Original Sentence: ó ṣèlérí ní òpin oṣù Ògún pe ''A ti súnmọ pípadà sí Òkun Pàsif́ìkì gidi gáàn''.
Modified Sentence: o seleri ni opin osu Ogun pe ''A ti sunmo pipada si Okun Pasifiki gidi gaan''.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ọ̀mọràn kan gbàgbọ́ wipe kòṣeé ṣe kí ilé ẹjọ́ pinnu lọ́nà ti yóò ṣe orilẹ-ede Bolifia ní rere - àtipé nǹkan kékeré ni yóò yípadà bí ó bá ṣée.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon awon omoran kan gbagbo wipe kosee se ki ile ejo pinnu lona ti yoo se orile-ede Bolifia ni rere - atipe nnkan kekere ni yoo yipada bi o ba see.

Original Sentence: Àjọ UN náà tófìdí kalẹ̀ sí orilẹ-ede Nẹdáláǹdi kòní agbára láti fi ilẹ̀ Ṣílì dánilọ́lá, àtipé ó ti sọ wipe òun kòni pinnu àbájáde àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ tí ó ṣeé ṣe.
Modified Sentence: Ajo UN naa tofidi kale si orile-ede Nedalandi koni agbara lati fi ile Sili danilola, atipe o ti so wipe oun koni pinnu abajade awon oro ti o see se.

Original Sentence: Wipe ìdájọ́ ICJ náà ńwáyé ní oṣù mẹ́fà péré lẹ́yìn tíwọ́n gbọ́ àwọn àwíjàre ìgbẹ̀yìn tọ́kasíi pé ẹjọ́ náà ''kò ta kókó’,-  gẹgẹ bíi Paz Zárate, ọmọ orilẹ-ede Ṣílè kan tójẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ninu òfin àgbáyé ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: Wipe idajo ICJ naa nwaye ni osu mefa pere leyin tiwon gbo awon awijare igbeyin tokasii pe ejo naa ''ko ta koko’,-  gege bii Paz Zarate, omo orile-ede Sile kan toje akosemose ninu ofin agbaye se so.

Original Sentence: Àtipé ní jíjìnnà sí mímú ìtẹ̵̀síwájú bá ìlépa orilẹ-ede Bolifia, àwọn ọdún mẹ́rin náà tókọjá leè ti fà á sẹ́yìn.
Modified Sentence: Atipe ni jijinna si mimu itesiwaju ba ilepa orile-ede Bolifia, awon odun merin naa tokoja lee ti fa a seyin.

Original Sentence: “Ọ̀rọ̀ nípa àtirọ́nàde òkun náà ni ìṣàkóso orilẹ-ede Bolifia tówà lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ náà ti já gbà,'' gẹgẹ bíi Zárate ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: “Oro nipa atironade okun naa ni isakoso orile-ede Bolifia towa lowolowo naa ti ja gba,'' gege bii Zarate se so.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀rọ̀ oníjà dúndùn ti Morales ti fa ìfẹ́ inú rere tóṣékù ti orilẹ-ede Bolifia mu tán, ni ó dá láàbá.
Modified Sentence: Oro onija dundun ti Morales ti fa ife inu rere toseku ti orile-ede Bolifia mu tan, ni o da laaba.

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede Bolifia àti Ṣílì̀ yóò tẹ̀síwajú láti máa sọ̀rọ̀ ni àwọn ibi kan, ṣùgbọ́n yóò ṣòro gidigidi láti ní àwọn ìjíròrò lẹ́yìn èyí.
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede Bolifia ati Sili yoo tesiwaju lati maa soro ni awon ibi kan, sugbon yoo soro gidigidi lati ni awon ijiroro leyin eyi.

Original Sentence: Àwọn orilẹ-ede méjì náà kò tíì ṣe pàsípààrọ̀ àwọn aṣoju láti ọdún 1962.
Modified Sentence: Awon orile-ede meji naa ko tii se pasipaaro awon asoju lati odun 1962.

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ tẹ́lẹ̀rí Eduardo Rodriguez Veltzé, aṣojú orilẹ-ede Bolifia ní The Hague, kọ èròǹgbà náà wipe ìpinnu-ṣíṣe ti ilé-ẹjọ́ náà tiyá kíakía ju bótiyẹ lọ.
Modified Sentence: Aare teleri Eduardo Rodriguez Veltze, asoju orile-ede Bolifia ni The Hague, ko erongba naa wipe ipinnu-sise ti ile-ejo naa tiya kiakia ju botiye lo.

Original Sentence: O sowipe Ọjọ́ Ajé yóò mu orilẹ-ede Bolifia wọnú ''ànfààní tóṣe àrà-ọ̀tọ̀ kan láti sí ìgbà ọ̀tun ti àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú orilẹ-ede Ṣílì̀'' àti ààyè kan láti ''fi òpin sí àwọn ọdún mọ́kàndínlógóje ti àwọn èdé-àìyedè pẹ̀lú àwọn àǹfààní aláàjùmọ̀je”̣̣.
Modified Sentence: O sowipe Ojo Aje yoo mu orile-ede Bolifia wonu ''anfaani tose ara-oto kan lati si igba otun ti awon ibasepo pelu orile-ede Sili'' ati aaye kan lati ''fi opin si awon odun mokandinlogoje ti awon ede-aiyede pelu awon anfaani alaajumoje”.

Original Sentence: Bákannáà Calzadilla tún ṣẹ́ wipe Morales - tó sí jẹ ọ̀kan ninu àwọn ààrẹ̀ ilẹ Latinni Amẹ́ríkà tó gbajúmọ̀ jùlọ - ńlo ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbòke-gbodò lórí omi òkun bí ọ̀pákùtẹ̀lẹ̀ òṣèlú kan.
Modified Sentence: Bakannaa Calzadilla tun se wipe Morales - to si je okan ninu awon aare ile Latinni Amerika to gbajumo julo - nlo oro igboke-gbodo lori omi okun bi opakutele oselu kan.

Original Sentence: ó tun fi kún un pe Bolifia kòní fi ẹ̀tọ́ rẹ̀ sí Òkun Pàsífíìkì náà sílẹ̀ láíláí’.
Modified Sentence: o tun fi kun un pe Bolifia koni fi eto re si Okun Pasifiiki naa sile lailai’.

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà sọpé kíkó àwọn àdó olóro dánù kòní ṣẹlẹ́ àyàfi tí òun bá leè gba orilẹ-ede US gbọ́
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede Ariwa Koria sope kiko awon ado oloro danu koni sele ayafi ti oun ba lee gba orile-ede US gbo

Original Sentence: Aláàkóso Ọ̀rọ̀ Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè ti orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà Ri Yong sọpé orilẹ-ede òun kòni kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro rẹ̀ dánù láilái bí kòbá leè gba orilẹ-ede Washingtọn gbọ́.
Modified Sentence: Alaakoso Oro Ile Okeere ti orile-ede Ariwa Koria Ri Yong sope orile-ede oun koni ko awon ohun ija ado oloro re danu lailai bi koba lee gba orile-ede Washington gbo.

Original Sentence: Ri ńsọ̀rọ̀ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta níbi Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò ti Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé náà.
Modified Sentence: Ri nsoro lojo Abameta nibi Ipejopo Gbogbogboo ti Ajo Isokan Agbaye naa.

Original Sentence: Ó pe orilẹ-ede Àmẹ́ríkà láti tẹ̀lé àwọn ìlérí tí ó ṣe nígbà ìpàdé kan ní orilẹ-ede Singapore láàrin àwọn adarí tí ńbá ara wọn ṣe orogún náà.
Modified Sentence: O pe orile-ede Amerika lati tele awon ileri ti o se nigba ipade kan ni orile-ede Singapore laarin awon adari ti nba ara won se orogun naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ wá bí US. Akọwe ti Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè Mike Pompeo ti ńṣe bí ẹnití ó wà ní bèbe àtítúnbẹ̀rẹ̀ ìjíròrò lórí ọ̀rọ̀ àdó olóró tóti dúró sójú kan ju oṣù mẹ́ta lẹ́yìn ti Singapore náà pẹ̀lú Kim Jong Un ti Àríwá Kòríà.
Modified Sentence: Awon oro re wa bi US. Akowe ti Ile Okeere Mike Pompeo ti nse bi eniti o wa ni bebe atitunbere ijiroro lori oro ado oloro toti duro soju kan ju osu meta leyin ti Singapore naa pelu Kim Jong Un ti Ariwa Koria.

Original Sentence: Ri sọpé ó jẹ́ ''àlá tí kò leè ṣẹ'' kan wipe àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̀síwájú àti àtakò ti U.S. sí ìkéde kan tó ńparí Ogun Kòríà yóò mú Àríwá náà wá sórí àwọn orúnkún rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ri sope o je ''ala ti ko lee se'' kan wipe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju ati atako ti U.S. si ikede kan to npari Ogun Koria yoo mu Ariwa naa wa sori awon orunkun re.

Original Sentence: Washington ńsọ́raṣè láti faramọ́ ìkéde náà láijẹ́ wipe Pyongyang kọ́kọ́ gbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ pàtàkì láti kó àwọn nǹkan ogun dánù.
Modified Sentence: Washington nsorase lati faramo ikede naa laije wipe Pyongyang koko gbe awon igbese pataki lati ko awon nnkan ogun danu.

Modified Sentence: Sugbon isiyemeji totan kaakiri wa wipe Pyongyang  kofi oro sere nipa kiko awon nnkan ogun ti orile-ede naa ri bi ona kan soso lati jeki aabo re daju sile.

Original Sentence: Pompeo ńṣètò láti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Pyongyang lóṣù tó ńbọ láti gbaradì fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì Kim-Trump kan.
Modified Sentence: Pompeo nseto lati sabewo si Pyongyang losu to nbo lati gbaradi fun ipade eleekeji Kim-Trump kan.

Original Sentence: Àfihàn aṣọ wíwọ̀ ti ìlú Paris fi ìlà àṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀jáde tuntun ninu nǹkan àwọ̀sóri tópọlọ́kan lójú ọ̀nà rẹ̀ sí Òpópónà High nítòsí rẹ.
Modified Sentence: Afihan aso wiwo ti ilu Paris fi ila asesejade tuntun ninu nnkan awosori topolokan loju ona re si Opopona High nitosi re.

Original Sentence: Bí o báfẹ́ mú ìgbéga bá àkójọpọ̀ ate-orí rẹ tàbí kí o dínàmọ́ òòrùn náà pátápátá máṣe wá a lọ síwájú mọ́.
Modified Sentence: Bi o bafe mu igbega ba akojopo ate-ori re tabi ki o dinamo oorun naa patapata mase wa a lo siwaju mo.

Original Sentence: Àwọn aránsọ Valentino àti Thom Browne sị́́ óju àkójọpọ àwọn asọ wíwọ̀ orí wọn eyiti o bùyààri fún àkójọpọ̀ SS19 wọn lójú ọ̀nà-eré náà eyiti o ta àkojọpọ̀ irúfẹ́ wọn yọ níbi Ọ̀sẹ̀ Àfihàn Asọ ní Ìlú Paris.
Modified Sentence: Awon aranso Valentino ati Thom Browne si oju akojopo awon aso wiwo ori won eyiti o buyaari fun akojopo SS19 won loju ona-ere naa eyiti o ta akojopo irufe won yo nibi Ose Afihan Aso ni Ilu Paris.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ate-ori tí kòṣeé lò lọ́nà tóga ti gba Instagram pátá nígbà ooru yìí ti àwọn aránsọ wọ̀nyí sì ti fi àwọn ìṣẹ̀dá wọn tó ńṣẹ́jú síni ránṣẹ́ sí ìsàlẹ̀ àwọn ọ̀nà tóóró náa.
Modified Sentence: Awon ate-ori ti kosee lo lona toga ti gba Instagram pata nigba ooru yii ti awon aranso wonyi si ti fi awon iseda won to nseju sini ranse si isale awon ona tooro naa.

Original Sentence: Iṣẹ́ ara-ọ̀tọ̀ kan tótayọ láti ọwọ́ Valentino ni ate aláwọ̀ búráùn tó-ń-fòlókè eyiti wọ́n fi àṣomọ́ tódàbí ìyẹ́ sí etí-òkè rẹ̀ tókún gbogbo orí àwọn àwòṣe náà.
Modified Sentence: Ise ara-oto kan totayo lati owo Valentino ni ate alawo buraun to-n-foloke eyiti won fi asomo todabi iye si eti-oke re tokun gbogbo ori awon awose naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn àṣomọ tí ìwọ̀n wọn pọ̀ lápọ̀jù ní àwọn ẹ̀gúsí-olómi tíwọ́n ṣe lọ́ọ̀ṣọ́, ate-orí oṣó kan àti ọ̀pọ̀n-òyìnbó kan - ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò rán wọn láti jẹ́kí ori rẹ móooru.
Modified Sentence: Awon asomo ti iwon won po lapoju ni awon egusi-olomi tiwon se looso, ate-ori oso kan ati opon-oyinbo kan - sugbon won ko ran won lati jeki ori re moooru.

Original Sentence: Thom Browne tún ṣàfihàn àṣàyan ti àwọn ìbòjú tókọyìnsáyé - tíwọn sí dé láàkókò tóyẹ fún àjọdún Halloween.
Modified Sentence: Thom Browne tun safihan asayan ti awon iboju tokoyinsaye - tiwon si de laakoko toye fun ajodun Halloween.

Original Sentence: Púpọ̀ ninu àwọn ìbòjú náà niwọ́n rán àwọn ètè wọn pa ti wọ́n sì jọ Olóri-ogun Hannibal Lecter ju àwọn asọ tó ńgbayì lóde ìwòyí lọ.
Modified Sentence: Pupo ninu awon iboju naa niwon ran awon ete won pa ti won si jo Olori-ogun Hannibal Lecter ju awon aso to ngbayi lode iwoyi lo.

Original Sentence: Ìṣẹdá kan jọ àwọn asọ ẹ̀rọ ìbẹ́lumi tí ó pé pẹ̀lu ẹ̀rọ amúnimílábẹ-omi àti àwọn awò ojú, nigbati òmíràn wò bíi òkòtó ohun mímu aládùn dídì bíi yìnyín tóti yo.
Modified Sentence: Iseda kan jo awon aso ero ibelumi ti o pe pelu ero amunimilabe-omi ati awon awo oju, nigbati omiran wo bii okoto ohun mimu aladun didi bii yinyin toti yo.

Original Sentence: Àtipé bí ó bá tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lú gbólóhùn asọ ìgbàlódé tó gbòòrò náà- ó ṣe oríire.
Modified Sentence: Atipe bi o ba tesiwaju pelu gbolohun aso igbalode to gbooro naa- o se oriire.

Original Sentence: Àwọn olùwòran àrà sọtẹ́lẹ̀ wipe àwọn ate-ori títóbi tíwọn ńsomó àgbọ̀n náà leè máa wá ọ̀nà wọn dé àwọn òpópónà ńlá nítòsí rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Awon oluworan ara sotele wipe awon ate-ori titobi tiwon nsomo agbon naa lee maa wa ona won de awon opopona nla nitosi re.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ate-ori oníwọn-ńlá náà dé ní yàjóyàjó lẹ́yìn gìgìrísẹ̀ ti 'La Bomba', ate-ori tíwọn fi ìko hun pẹ̀lú etí oníwọn ẹsẹ̀ bàtà méjì ní fífẹ̀ eyiti wọ́n ńrí lórí gbogbo eniyan láti orí Rihanna dé Emily Ratajkowski.
Modified Sentence: Awon ate-ori oniwon-nla naa de ni yajoyajo leyin gigirise ti 'La Bomba', ate-ori tiwon fi iko hun pelu eti oniwon ese bata meji ni fife eyiti won nri lori gbogbo eniyan lati ori Rihanna de Emily Ratajkowski.

Original Sentence: Àlẹ̀mọ́ ẹ̀ṣìn náà tówà lẹ́yìn ate-ori tóṣòro láti lò  tíwọ́n fọ́n káàkiri ojú-òpò ìbáṣepọ̀ ayelujara fi ìṣẹ̀dá ńlá miran rańṣẹ́ sísàlẹ̀ ojú ìrìn náá - àpò etíkun tíwọ́n fi ìko hun tí ó fẹ́rẹ̀ tóbi tó asọ ìwẹ̀lódò àwòṣe náà tí ó kó o jọ papọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Alemo esin naa towa leyin ate-ori tosoro lati lo  tiwon fon kaakiri oju-opo ibasepo ayelujara fi iseda nla miran ranse sisale oju irin naa - apo etikun tiwon fi iko hun ti o fere tobi to aso iwelodo awose naa ti o ko o jo papo.

Original Sentence: Àpọ raffia aláwọ̀ omi-ọsàn tóti jóna náà, tíwọn fi raffia gbá létí tíwọ́n sì fi awọ funfun kan ṣe ìfàlọ́wọ́ rẹ̀, ni ó dádúró yàtọ̀ níbi àkójọpọ̀ ti Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 ní Ọ̀sẹ̀ Àfihàn Asọ ní Ìlu Paris.
Modified Sentence: Apo raffia alawo omi-osan toti jona naa, tiwon fi raffia gba leti tiwon si fi awo funfun kan se ifalowo re, ni o daduro yato nibi akojopo ti Jacquemus' La Riviera SS19 ni Ose Afihan Aso ni Ilu Paris.

Original Sentence: Ìlúmọ̀ọ́ká gbajúmọ̀ afasọdárà Luke Armitage sọ fún FEMAIL: ''Mo ńretí láti rí àwọn ate-ori ńlá àti awọn àpò ìfàlọ́wọ́ etíkun ní òpópónà ńlá fún ìgba ooru tókàn - bí aránsọ náà ti ṣèdá irú ipa títóbi yóò ṣòro láti fóju fo àwọn ìbéèrè fún àwọn àṣomọ́ oníwọ̀n-tópọ̀lápọ̀jù náà.
Modified Sentence: Ilumooka gbajumo afasodara Luke Armitage so fun FEMAIL: ''Mo nreti lati ri awon ate-ori nla ati awon apo ifalowo etikun ni opopona nla fun igba ooru tokan - bi aranso naa ti seda iru ipa titobi yoo soro lati foju fo awon ibeere fun awon asomo oniwon-topolapoju naa.

Original Sentence: John Edward: Àwọn ìmọ̀ èdè jẹ kòṣeémáàní fún àwọn ọmọ ìlú àgbáyé
Modified Sentence: John Edward: Awon imo ede je koseemaani fun awon omo ilu agbaye

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ti ilẹ̀ Sikọtiland ńsì ríipé àkọsílẹ̀ eyiti o lààmì-laaka wọn ninu ẹ̀kọ́ tótayọ sì wà síbẹ̀, tí èyí sì ńtẹ̀síwájú lọ́dún 2018 pẹ̀lú àkójọpọ̀ àwọn èsì ìdánwò miran, eyiti wọ́n fún lágbára nípa àṣeyọrí ẹnìkọ̀òkan àti alápapọ̀ ninu eré ìdárayá, iṣẹ́-ọwọ́, orin àti àwọn ìdáwọlé àwùjọ.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile iwe olominira ti ile Sikotiland nsi riipe akosile eyiti o laami-laaka won ninu eko totayo si wa sibe, ti eyi si ntesiwaju lodun 2018 pelu akojopo awon esi idanwo miran, eyiti won fun lagbara nipa aseyori enikookan ati alapapo ninu ere idaraya, ise-owo, orin ati awon idawole awujo.

Original Sentence: Pẹ̀lu àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tíwọ́n tó ẹgbẹ̀rún lọ́nà ọgbọ̀n jákè-jádò Sikọtiland, àwọn ilé ìwé wọ̀nyí, ti igbìmọ̀ ti àwọn Ilé ìwé olómìnira Ilẹ Sikotiland ńṣojú fún. ńgbìyaǹjú láti máa pèsè iṣẹ́ onípele tódára jùlọ fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti àwọn òbí wọn.
Modified Sentence: Pelu awon akekoo tiwon to egberun lona ogbon jake-jado Sikotiland, awon ile iwe wonyi, ti igbimo ti awon Ile iwe olominira Ile Sikotiland nsoju fun. ngbiyanju lati maa pese ise onipele todara julo fun awon akekoo ati awon obi won.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ńlépa láti gba àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ wọn lárádi fún ẹ̀kọ́ tójinlẹ̀ tí o síga síi, iṣẹ́-ìṣe tíwọ́n yàn láàyò àti ipò wọn gẹ̵́gẹ́bí ọmọ ìlú àgbáyé.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile iwe olominira nlepa lati gba awon akekoo won laradi fun eko tojinle ti o siga sii, ise-ise tiwon yan laayo ati ipo won gegebi omo ilu agbaye.

Original Sentence: Bí ẹ̀ka ètò ẹ̀kọ́ kan eyiti ó leè ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ètò tí ó sì leè ṣàmúlò ètò ìkẹkọ̀ọ́ ti ilé ìwé àṣetẹ́ra-ẹnilọ́rùn kan, a ńrí àwọn èdè ọ̀làjù tó ńtẹ̀síwájú bí iṣẹ́ kan tógbajúmọ̀ táyé-ńfẹ́ láàrin àwọn ilé ìwé.
Modified Sentence: Bi eka eto eko kan eyiti o lee sagbekale eto ti o si lee samulo eto ikekoo ti ile iwe asetera-enilorun kan, a nri awon ede olaju to ntesiwaju bi ise kan togbajumo taye-nfe laarin awon ile iwe.

Original Sentence: Nelson Mandela sọpé: ''Bí o bá sọ̀rọ̀ sí ọkùnrin kan ní èdè tí ó yé e, ìyẹn yóò wọ inú orí rẹ lọ.
Modified Sentence: Nelson Mandela sope: ''Bi o ba soro si okunrin kan ni ede ti o ye e, iyen yoo wo inu ori re lo.

Original Sentence: Bí o bá sọ̀rọ̀ sí i ní èdè tiẹ gan-aṇ̀ ìyẹn yóò wọ inú ọkàn rẹ lọ.''
Modified Sentence: Bi o ba soro si i ni ede tie gan-an iyen yoo wo inu okan re lo.''

Original Sentence: Èyí jẹ́ ìránnilétí tólágbára kan wipe a kò kàn leè gbáralé èdé Gẹ́ẹ̀si nigbati a báfẹ ṣàgbéró àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ pẹ̀lú àwọn eniyan latí àwọn orilẹ-ede miran.
Modified Sentence: Eyi je irannileti tolagbara kan wipe a ko kan lee gbarale ede Geesi nigbati a bafe sagbero awon ibasepo pelu awon eniyan lati awon orile-ede miran.

Original Sentence: Láti àwọn èsì ìdánwò àìpẹ́ ti ọdún yìí, a leè ríi pé àwọn èdè ló ńwà lókè àwọn tábìlì líìgí náà  pẹ̀lú àwọn òdiwọn ìṣọwọ́yege láàrin àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira.
Modified Sentence: Lati awon esi idanwo aipe ti odun yii, a lee rii pe awon ede lo nwa loke awon tabili liigi naa  pelu awon odiwon isowoyege laarin awon ile iwe olominira.

Original Sentence: Àpapọ ìdá méjìdínláàdọrin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tí wọ́n kọ́ èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè lógba giredi Giga A.
Modified Sentence: Apapo ida mejidinlaadorin ninu ida ogoorun awon akekoo ti won ko ede ile okeere logba giredi Giga A.

Original Sentence: Àkọsilẹ̀ dátà náà, tíwọ́n gbà láti ọwọ́ àwọn ilé ìwé mẹ́rìnléláàádọ́rin tójẹ́ ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ SCIS fihàn pé ìdá méjìléláàádọ́rin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gba giredi A Giga ninu èdè Mandarin, nigbati ìdá méjìléláàádọ́rin ninu ìdá ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Jamani, ìdá mọ́kàndínláàádọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Faranṣe, àti ìdá mẹ́tàdínláàádọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ti àwọn tó ńkọ́ èdè Sipeeni bákannáà gba giredi A.
Modified Sentence: Akosile data naa, tiwon gba lati owo awon ile iwe merinlelaaadorin toje omo egbe SCIS fihan pe ida mejilelaaadorin ninu ida ogoorun awon akekoo gba giredi A Giga ninu ede Mandarin, nigbati ida mejilelaaadorin ninu ida ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Jamani, ida mokandinlaaadorin ninu ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Faranse, ati ida metadinlaaadorin ninu ogoorun ti awon to nko ede Sipeeni bakannaa gba giredi A.

Original Sentence: Èyì ńfihàn wipe àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ní ilẹ Sikọtilandi ńṣàtílẹ́yìn fún àwọn èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn ìmọ̀ tóṣe pàtàkì èyìtí àwọn ọmọdé àti àwọn ọ̀dọ́ yóò nílò láisì àní-àní lọ́jọ́ iwájú.
Modified Sentence: Eyi nfihan wipe awon ile iwe olominira ni ile Sikotilandi nsatileyin fun awon ede ile okeere gegebi awon imo tose pataki eyiti awon omode ati awon odo yoo nilo laisi ani-ani lojo iwaju.

Original Sentence: Àwọn èdè nísinsìnyí, bí i̇ṣẹ́ yíyàn, niwọ́n ńmú pẹ̀lú ọwọ́ àpọ́nlẹ́ kaǹ gẹ́gẹ́bí àwọn iṣẹ́ STEM (sáyẹ́ńsì, tẹkinọlọji, ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àti ẹ̀kọ́ ìsiró tójinlẹ̀) ninu àwọn ìlànà ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira àti níbiimíràn.
Modified Sentence: Awon ede nisinsinyi, bi ise yiyan, niwon nmu pelu owo aponle kan gegebi awon ise STEM (sayensi, tekinoloji, imo-ero ati eko isiro tojinle) ninu awon ilana ikekoo ti awon ile iwe olominira ati nibiimiran.

Original Sentence: Ìwáàdí nípa èrò-ọkàn àwọn ènìyàn láti ọwọ Ìgbìmọ̀ Amúṣẹ́ṣe fún Ìgbaniṣíṣẹ́ àti Àwọn Ìmọ̀ lọ́dún 2014 ṣàwárí pé ninu àwọn ìdí tí àwọn agbaniṣ̵íṣẹ́ sọ fún lílàkàkà wọn láti di àwọn ààyè òṣìṣẹ́ tó ṣófo, ìdá mẹ́tàdínlógún ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún wọn ni wọ́n sọpé ó jẹ́ nitori àìni ìmọ̀ ède miraǹ.
Modified Sentence: Iwaadi nipa ero-okan awon eniyan lati owo Igbimo Amusese fun Igbanisise ati Awon Imo lodun 2014 sawari pe ninu awon idi ti awon agbanisise so fun lilakaka won lati di awon aaye osise to sofo, ida metadinlogun ninu ogoorun won ni won sope o je nitori aini imo ede miran.

Original Sentence: Nítorínáà púpọ̀̀ àwọn ìmọ̀ èdè níwọ́n ńdi ohun tó ńfẹ̀ àmójútó láti leè gba àwọn ọ̀dọ́ láradì fún àwọn iṣẹ́-ìṣe ọjọ́ iwájú wọn.
Modified Sentence: Nitorinaa pupo awon imo ede niwon ndi ohun to nfe amojuto lati lee gba awon odo laradi fun awon ise-ise ojo iwaju won.

Original Sentence: Pẹ̀lú ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn àǹfààni iṣẹ̵́ tówà lọ́jọ́ iwájú eyiti wọ́n nílò àwọn èdè, àwọn ìmọ̀ wọ̀nyí jẹ́ kòṣeémáàní ninu ayé tí ìkáwọ́ rẹ̀ ti dọ̀kan yìí.
Modified Sentence: Pelu opo awon anfaani ise towa lojo iwaju eyiti won nilo awon ede, awon imo wonyi je koseemaani ninu aye ti ikawo re ti dokan yii.

Original Sentence: Láìnífiṣe irú iṣẹ́-ìṣe ti ẹnìkan yàn, bí wọ́n báti kọ́ èdè keji, wọn yóò ní àǹfààní gidi kan ní ọjọ́ iwájú náà pẹ̀lú níní ìmọ̀́ irú èyí.
Modified Sentence: Lainifise iru ise-ise ti enikan yan, bi won bati ko ede keji, won yoo ni anfaani gidi kan ni ojo iwaju naa pelu nini imo iru eyi.

Original Sentence: Láti leè bá àwọn èèyàn láti àwọn ilẹ̀ òkèèrè sọrọ tààra yóò fi ẹnití ó gbọ́ ọ̀pọ̀ èdè kan síwájú láìsí tàbí-ṣùgbọ́n ninu ìfagagbága náà.
Modified Sentence: Lati lee ba awon eeyan lati awon ile okeere soro taara yoo fi eniti o gbo opo ede kan siwaju laisi tabi-sugbon ninu ifagagbaga naa.

Original Sentence: Gẹ́gẹ́bi ìdìbò YouGov eyiti ẹgbẹ̀rún mẹ́rin àwọn àgbà ní orile-ede UK kópa lọ́dún 2013, ìdá márùndínlọ́gọ́rin ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ni kò leè sọ èdè ilẹ̀ òkèèrè kan eyiti kódára tó láti fiṣe ibánisọ̀rọ̀ atí bii èdè Faranṣe sè jẹ́ èdè kan ṣoṣo tí ìdá oní-díjíìtì méjì, ìdá márùndínlógún ninu ọgọ́ọ̀rún ńsọ.
Modified Sentence: Gegebi idibo YouGov eyiti egberun merin awon agba ni orile-ede UK kopa lodun 2013, ida marundinlogorin ninu ogoorun ni ko lee so ede ile okeere kan eyiti kodara to lati fise ibanisoro ati bii ede Faranse se je ede kan soso ti ida oni-dijiiti meji, ida marundinlogun ninu ogoorun nso.

Original Sentence: Èyí ní ìdí tí fífi ìdókòòwò sínú ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ èdè nísinsìnyí ṣeṣe pàtàkì fún àwọn ọmọdé òde-òní.
Modified Sentence: Eyi ni idi ti fifi idokoowo sinu ikekoo ede nisinsinyi sese pataki fun awon omode ode-oni.

Original Sentence: Níní àwọn ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ èdè, paàpá ti àwọn ọ̀rọ̀-ajé tó ńdàgbàsóke, yóò fún àǹfààní tódára ju fún rírí iṣẹ́ eyiti ó nítumọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Nini awon opolopo ede, paapa ti awon oro-aje to ndagbasoke, yoo fun anfaani todara ju fun riri ise eyiti o nitumo.

Original Sentence: Láàrin ilẹ̀ Sikọtiland, ilé ìwé kọ̀ọ̀kan yóò yàtọ̀ ninu àwọn èdè náà tíwọn ńkọ́.
Modified Sentence: Laarin ile Sikotiland, ile iwe kookan yoo yato ninu awon ede naa tiwon nko.

Original Sentence: Iye òǹkà àwọn ilé ìwé kan yóò gbájúmọ́ lórí àwọn èdè ọ̀làjú tójẹ́ ti ìgbàlódé díẹ̀ síi, nigbati àwọn miran yóò máa kọ́ni ní àwọn êdè tí wọ́n kàsí pàtàkì jùlọ fún orilẹ-ede UK nigbati a bá ńfojú ṣọ́nà fún ọdún 2020, bíi èdè Mandarin tabi èdè Japaanu.
Modified Sentence: Iye onka awon ile iwe kan yoo gbajumo lori awon ede olaju toje ti igbalode die sii, nigbati awon miran yoo maa koni ni awon ede ti won kasi pataki julo fun orile-ede UK nigbati a ba nfoju sona fun odun 2020, bii ede Mandarin tabi ede Japaanu.

Original Sentence: Ohunkóhun tóbájẹ́ ìfẹ́ ọmọ rẹ, iye òǹkà àwọn èdè kan yóò máa wà nigba gbogbo láti yàn ninu wọn láàrim àwọn ilé-iwé olómìnira, pẹ̀lú àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ ìkọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tíwọ́n jẹ́ akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ ninu ipele ẹ̀kọ́ yìí.
Modified Sentence: Ohunkohun tobaje ife omo re, iye onka awon ede kan yoo maa wa nigba gbogbo lati yan ninu won laarim awon ile-iwe olominira, pelu awon osise ikonilekoo tiwon je akosemose ninu ipele eko yii.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira ti ilẹ̀ Sikotilandi ní a fijìn fún pípèsè àyíká ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan eyiti yóò gba àwọn ọmọdé laradì tí yóò sì rówọn lágbara pẹ̀lú ìmọ̀ tíwọ́n nílò láti ṣàṣeyọrí, ohunkóhùn tí ọjọ́ ọ̀la bámú dáni.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile iwe olominira ti ile Sikotilandi ni a fijin fun pipese ayika ikekoo kan eyiti yoo gba awon omode laradi ti yoo si rowon lagbara pelu imo tiwon nilo lati saseyori, ohunkohun ti ojo ola bamu dani.

Original Sentence: Kò ṣ̵eé ṣẹ́ ní àkókò yìí, ninu àyíká oko-òwò àgbáyé kan, wipe àwọn èdè ńtẹ̀síwájú láti máa jẹ́ kòṣeémáàní pàtàkí fún ọjọ́ iwájú orilẹ-ede náà, nítorínáà èyí ní a gbọ̀dọ̀ jẹ́kí ó hàn ninu ètò ẹ̀kọ́.
Modified Sentence: Ko see se ni akoko yii, ninu ayika oko-owo agbaye kan, wipe awon ede ntesiwaju lati maa je koseemaani pataki fun ojo iwaju orile-ede naa, nitorinaa eyi ni a gbodo jeki o han ninu eto eko.

Original Sentence: Lóòtítọ́, àwọn èdè ọ̀làjú ni a nílatí kàsí gidigidi bíi ''àwọn ìmọ̀ ìbáraẹnisọ̀rọ̀ ti àgbáyé''.
Modified Sentence: Lootito, awon ede olaju ni a nilati kasi gidigidi bii ''awon imo ibaraenisoro ti agbaye''.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ilé ìwé olómìnira yóò tẹ̀síwájú láti máa fúnni ní àṣàyàn yìí, ọ̀pọ̀ lóríṣiríṣi àti ìtayọ fún àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ilẹ̀ Sikotilandi.
Modified Sentence: Awon ile iwe olominira yoo tesiwaju lati maa funni ni asayan yii, opo lorisirisi ati itayo fun awon odo ile Sikotilandi.

Original Sentence: Ó ṣe pàtàkì.
Modified Sentence: O se pataki.

Original Sentence: John Edward ni Olùdarí ti Ìgbìmọ̀ ti Àwọn Ilé ìwé Olómìnira Ilẹ Sikotilandi
Modified Sentence: John Edward ni Oludari ti Igbimo ti Awon Ile iwe Olominira Ile Sikotilandi

Original Sentence: LeBron yóò gba ayò àkọ́kọ́ ninu ìdíje ti Lakers lọ́jọ́ Àìkú ni ìlú San Diego.
Modified Sentence: LeBron yoo gba ayo akoko ninu idije ti Lakers lojo Aiku ni ilu San Diego.

Original Sentence: Ìdúró náà ti fẹ́rẹ̀ tán fún àwọn olólùfẹ́ tíwọ́n ti ńfojú ṣọ́nà láti ríi kí LeBron James gba ayò àkọ́kọ́ fún Los Angeles Lakers.
Modified Sentence: Iduro naa ti fere tan fun awon ololufe tiwon ti nfoju sona lati rii ki LeBron James gba ayo akoko fun Los Angeles Lakers.

Original Sentence: Olùkọ́ni Lakers Luke Walton ti kéde wipe James yóò gba ayò ninu ìdíje ìsíde tósáájú ìbẹ̀rẹ̀ sáà níbití wọn yóò ti dojúkọ Denvers Nuggets ní San Diego.
Modified Sentence: Olukoni Lakers Luke Walton ti kede wipe James yoo gba ayo ninu idije iside tosaaju ibere saa nibiti won yoo ti dojuko Denvers Nuggets ni San Diego.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n fún bí àwọn ìṣẹ́jú tí yóò fi gbá ayò níwọn kò tíì pinnu rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon fun bi awon iseju ti yoo fi gba ayo niwon ko tii pinnu re.

Original Sentence: ''Yóò ju ọ̀kan lọ àtipé yóò dín ní méjìdínláàdọ́ta,'' ni Walton sọ lórí ojú-òpó ayelujara ti ilé iṣẹ́ Lakers.
Modified Sentence: ''Yoo ju okan lo atipe yoo din ni mejidinlaadota,'' ni Walton so lori oju-opo ayelujara ti ile ise Lakers.

Original Sentence: Oníròyìn Lakers Mike Trudell kọ àkọránṣẹ́ túwìtì wipe ó ṣeé ṣe kí James gbá ayò fún àwọn ìṣẹ́jú tó lódiwọ̀n.
Modified Sentence: Oniroyin Lakers Mike Trudell ko akoranse tuwiti wipe o see se ki James gba ayo fun awon iseju to lodiwon.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn ìgbaradì níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí, wọ́n bí James léèrè nípa àwọn ètò rẹ̀ fún àkọsílẹ̀ ìlànà ìdíje fún ìdíje mẹ́fà tósíwájú sáà ti Lakers.
Modified Sentence: Leyin igbaradi nibere ose yii, won bi James leere nipa awon eto re fun akosile ilana idije fun idije mefa tosiwaju saa ti Lakers.

Original Sentence: ''̀̀Èmi kò nílò àwọn ìdíje tósíwáju sáà ní ipele iṣẹ́ mi láti leè ṣetán,'' gẹgẹ bi otí wí.
Modified Sentence: ''Emi ko nilo awon idije tosiwaju saa ni ipele ise mi lati lee setan,'' gege bi oti wi.

Original Sentence: Àkókò Ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia ti Trump, Ìkànnì YouTube
Modified Sentence: Akoko Ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia ti Trump, Ikanni YouTube

Original Sentence: Ààrẹ̵ Donald Trump ńbẹ̀rẹ̀ àkọlùkọgbà àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ fún ìpolongo kan lálẹ́ òní ní ilù Wheeling, Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia.
Modified Sentence: Aare Donald Trump nbere akolukogba awon ipejopo fun ipolongo kan lale oni ni ilu Wheeling, Iwo-oorun Virginia.

Original Sentence: Ó jẹ́ ti aláàkọ́kọ́ ti Trump ninu àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ máàrún tíwọ́n ti ṣàkọsílẹ̀ rẹ̀ pé yóò wáyé ninu ọ̀sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀ náà, pẹ̀lú àwọn ìdúró ni àwọn ibití wọn ti jẹ́ ọ̀rẹ́ rẹ́ pẹ̀lú Tennessee àti Mississippi.
Modified Sentence: O je ti alaakoko ti Trump ninu awon ipejopo maarun tiwon ti sakosile re pe yoo waye ninu ose to nbo naa, pelu awon iduro ni awon ibiti won ti je ore re pelu Tennessee ati Mississippi.

Original Sentence: Pẹ̀lú ìdìbò ìfìdíọ̀rọ̀múlẹ̀ tó sì ńdúró fún ẹnití ó mu láti wànípò tó ṣófo nílé Ejọ́ Tógajùlọ náà, Trump ńlépa láti gbé àtìlẹ́yìn dìde fún àwọn ìdìbò ààrin-sáà tó ńbọ níwọ̀n igbati àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ̵́ òṣèlú Republican wà ninu ewu àtipàdánù ìsàkóso ilé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin kékeré nigbati wọ́n bá dìbò lóṣù Bélú.
Modified Sentence: Pelu idibo ifidioromule to si nduro fun eniti o mu lati wanipo to sofo nile Ejo Togajulo naa, Trump nlepa lati gbe atileyin dide fun awon idibo aarin-saa to nbo niwon igbati awon omo egbe oselu Republican wa ninu ewu atipadanu isakoso ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin kekere nigbati won ba dibo losu Belu.

Original Sentence: Kínni àkókò ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia lálẹ́ òní àtipé báwo ni o ṣe leè wò ó lójú-òpó ayelujara?
Modified Sentence: Kinni akoko ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia lale oni atipe bawo ni o se lee wo o loju-opo ayelujara?

Original Sentence: Ìpéjọpọ̀ Trump ti Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia, ní ìlú Wheeling níwọn ṣàkọsílẹ̀ wíwáyé rẹ̀ fún aago méjé alẹ́. Àkókò l̀là-oòrùn lálẹ́ òní, Àbámẹ́ta, ọjọ́ kọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù Owewe, ọdún 2018.
Modified Sentence: Ipejopo Trump ti Iwo-oorun Virginia, ni ilu Wheeling niwon sakosile wiwaye re fun aago meje ale. Akoko lla-oorun lale oni, Abameta, ojo kokandinlogbon osu Owewe, odun 2018.

Original Sentence: Ó leè wo ìpéjọpọ̀ Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia lójú-òpó ayelujara nísàlẹ̀ nípaṣẹ̀ ìsànwọlé bótíńṣẹlẹ̀ lọ́wọ́lọ́wọ́ lórí YouTube.
Modified Sentence: O lee wo ipejopo Iwo-oorun Virginia loju-opo ayelujara nisale nipase isanwole botinsele lowolowo lori YouTube.

Original Sentence: Trump ni ó ṣeé ṣ̵e kí ó sọ̀rọ̀ lórí àwọn ìgbẹ́jọ́ ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí fún ẹni-a-fàkalẹ̀-fúnṣẹ́ Ilé Ẹjọ́ Tógajùlọ Brett Kavanaugh, eyiti o dariwo lórí àwọn ẹ̀sùn ìsìwàhu nípa ìbánilòpọ̀ pẹ̀lú ìdìbò ìfìdíọ̀rọ̀múlẹ̀ tíwọn ńretí tó sì ńdúró fún bí ọ̀sẹ̀ kan nigbati àjọ FBI náà sì ńṣe ìwáàdí.
Modified Sentence: Trump ni o see se ki o soro lori awon igbejo ose yii fun eni-a-fakale-funse Ile Ejo Togajulo Brett Kavanaugh, eyiti o dariwo lori awon esun isiwahu nipa ibanilopo pelu idibo ifidioromule tiwon nreti to si nduro fun bi ose kan nigbati ajo FBI naa si nse iwaadi.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n ìlépa àkọ́kọ́ ti àkọlùkọgbà àwọn ìpéjọpò yìí ní láti ràn àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ Republicans tó ńdojúkọ àwọn ìdìbò oṣù Bélú tóle lọ́wọ́ láti jèrè àwọn agbara fún ìlọsíwájú kan.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon ilepa akoko ti akolukogba awon ipejopo yii ni lati ran awon omo egbe Republicans to ndojuko awon idibo osu Belu tole lowo lati jere awon agbara fun ilosiwaju kan.

Original Sentence: Nítorínáa, ìpolongo ti Ààrẹ Trump sọpé àwọn ìpéjọpọ̀ máàrún lọ́sẹ̀ tó ńbọ̀ ńlépa fún ''fífi agbára fún àwọn tóyọ̀ǹda ara wọn àti àwọn alátìlẹ́yìn bí àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ òṣelú Rebulicans ṣe ńgbìyànjú láti dáàbò àti láti ṣàmúgbòòrò àwọn ọmọ ẹgbẹ́ tópọ̀ju tíwọ́n nílé Ìgbìmọ̀ Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà ati ti Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà kékeré,'' gẹ́gẹ̵̵́bí Reuters ti sọ.
Modified Sentence: Nitorinaa, ipolongo ti Aare Trump sope awon ipejopo maarun lose to nbo nlepa fun ''fifi agbara fun awon toyonda ara won ati awon alatileyin bi awon omo egbe oselu Rebulicans se ngbiyanju lati daabo ati lati samugbooro awon omo egbe topoju tiwon nile Igbimo Asoju-sofin Agba ati ti Asoju-sofin Agba kekere,'' gegebi Reuters ti so.

Original Sentence: ''Ìṣàkóso ilé Ìgbìmọ Aṣojú-ṣòfin kékeré ṣe pàtàkí gidigidi fún ètò rẹ̀ eyiti yóò jẹ́kí ààrẹ rin ìrìn-àjò lọsí bíi àwọn ìpínlẹ̀ púpọ̀ tóbá ṣeé ṣe bí a tí ńkorí wọ inú sáà ìpolongo ìbò tókún fọ́fọ́ fún iṣẹ́ kan,'' ni agbẹnusọ ìpolongo ìbô Trump kan ẹnití ó kọ̀ wipe kí a dárúkọ òun sọ fùn Reuters.
Modified Sentence: ''Isakoso ile Igbimo Asoju-sofin kekere se pataki gidigidi fun eto re eyiti yoo jeki aare rin irin-ajo losi bii awon ipinle pupo toba see se bi a ti nkori wo inu saa ipolongo ibo tokun fofo fun ise kan,'' ni agbenuso ipolongo ibo Trump kan eniti o ko wipe ki a daruko oun so fun Reuters.

Original Sentence: Bí wọń ti ṣ̀akọsílẹ̀ rẹ̀ láti wáyé fún Gbàgede Wesbanco ní ìlú Wheeling, ìpéjọpọ̀ alẹ́ òni leè mú àwọn alátìlẹ̵̵yìn wá láti ''Ohio àti Pennysylvania kí ó sì fa ìgbésíta fáyé rí láti ọwọ́ àwọn oníròyìn Pittsburgh,'' gẹ́gẹ̵́bí Ìròyìn Ìwọ̀-oòrùn Virginia Metro tisọ.
Modified Sentence: Bi won ti sakosile re lati waye fun Gbagede Wesbanco ni ilu Wheeling, ipejopo ale oni lee mu awon alatileyin wa lati ''Ohio ati Pennysylvania ki o si fa igbesita faye ri lati owo awon oniroyin Pittsburgh,'' gegebi Iroyin Iwo-oorun Virginia Metro tiso.

Original Sentence: Ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta ni yóò jẹ́ ìgbà kejì ninu oṣù tókọjá eyiti Trump ti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia, ìpínlẹ̀ náà tó borì rẹ̀ nípaṣẹ̀ àwọn kókó tóju ìdá ogójì nínú ọgọ́ọ̀rún lọ ninu ọdún 2016.
Modified Sentence: Ojo Abameta ni yoo je igba keji ninu osu tokoja eyiti Trump ti sabewo si Iwo-oorun Virginia, ipinle naa to bori re nipase awon koko toju ida ogoji ninu ogoorun lo ninu odun 2016.

Original Sentence: Trump ńgbìyànjú láti ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún olùdíje fún ipò Aṣojú-ṣòfin Àgbà ninu ẹgbẹ́ Republican fún Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia Patrick Morrisey ẹniti ó ńwà lẹ́yìn ninu àwọn ìdìbò láti mọ èrò-ọkàn àwọn ara ìlú.
Modified Sentence: Trump ngbiyanju lati se iranwo fun oludije fun ipo Asoju-sofin Agba ninu egbe Republican fun Iwo-oorun Virginia Patrick Morrisey eniti o nwa leyin ninu awon idibo lati mo ero-okan awon ara ilu.

Original Sentence: ''Kìí ṣe àmì rere kan fún Morrisey wipe àarẹ̵ níláti wá láti gbìyànjú láti fún un ní ìgbésókè ninu àwọn ìdìbò náà,'' ni Simon Haeder, onímọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì ti òṣèlú kan ní ilé ìwé Yunifasiti Ìwọ-oòrùn Virginia sọ gẹ́gẹ́bí Reuters ti wí.
Modified Sentence: ''Kii se ami rere kan fun Morrisey wipe aare nilati wa lati gbiyanju lati fun un ni igbesoke ninu awon idibo naa,'' ni Simon Haeder, onimo sayensi ti oselu kan ni ile iwe Yunifasiti Iwo-oorun Virginia so gegebi Reuters ti wi.

Original Sentence: Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder tí ọdún 2018 Ikọ̀ orilẹ-ede USA fi ikùn tíwọ́n ní hàn fún ìjà láti jẹ́kí àwọn ìrètí wà láàyè bí wọ́n ti ńgbórí wọnú àwọn ayò ẹlẹ́yọ-kọ̀ọ̀kan ti ọjọ́ Àìkú
Modified Sentence: Ife-eye Ryder ti odun 2018 Iko orile-ede USA fi ikun tiwon ni han fun ija lati jeki awon ireti wa laaye bi won ti ngbori wonu awon ayo eleyo-kookan ti ojo Aiku

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn àwọn sáà mẹ́ta eyiti ó fì sẹ́ẹ̀gbẹ́ kan, àwọn onímẹ́rin ti ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta kàn leè jẹ́ ohun tí Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder yìí nílò.
Modified Sentence: Leyin awon saa meta eyiti o fi seegbe kan, awon onimerin ti osan ojo Abameta kan lee je ohun ti Ife-eye Ryder yii nilo.

Original Sentence: Dùgbẹ̀-dùgbẹ̀ ti ipá-atini tó ńfì náà jẹ ọ̀rọ̀ eré ìdíje tíwọ́n gbélẹ̀rọ pátápátá kan ṣùgbọ́n ọ̀kan tí àwọn olùdíje gbàgbọ́ ninu rẹ̀ nítòótọ̀, tí kòrí jù bẹ́ẹ̀ lọ rí ní irú àwọn ìdíje bíi ìwọ́nyí.
Modified Sentence: Dugbe-dugbe ti ipa-atini to nfi naa je oro ere idije tiwon gbelero patapata kan sugbon okan ti awon oludije gbagbo ninu re nitooto, ti kori ju bee lo ri ni iru awon idije bii iwonyi.

Original Sentence: Nítorínáâ níbo ni wọn yóò sọpé ipá-atini náà wà báyìí?
Modified Sentence: Nitorinaa nibo ni won yoo sope ipa-atini naa wa bayii?
