Original Sentence: ''Wọ́n ti ní ìléwájú oníkókó-mẹ́fà àtipé nísinsìnyí ó jẹ́ mẹ́rin, nítorínáà a ńgbé ìyẹn bíi kékeré díẹ̀ ninu ipá-atini kan ní Èmi rò,'' ni Jordan Spieth sọ bí ó tì rìn jáde lọ fún ọjọ́ náà.
Modified Sentence: ''Won ti ni ilewaju onikoko-mefa atipe nisinsinyi o je merin, nitorinaa a ngbe iyen bii kekere die ninu ipa-atini kan ni Emi ro,'' ni Jordan Spieth so bi o ti rin jade lo fun ojo naa.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu ní àǹfààní náà, àní bí a ti ńretí, àwọn kókó mẹ́rin níwájú pẹ̀lú méjìlà díẹ̀ síi ninu ayò náà.
Modified Sentence: Ile Yuroopu ni anfaani naa, ani bi a ti nreti, awon koko merin niwaju pelu mejila die sii ninu ayo naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika, gẹ́gẹ́bí Spieth ti ńsọ, ròpé wọ́n ní afẹ́fẹ̵́ kékeré kan ninu àwọn ìtukọ wọn botilẹjẹ tí wọ́n sì ní ọ̀pọ̀ láti mú kí orí wọn yá nípa rẹ̀, tíkìí ṣe kékeré jùlọ bí irúfẹ́ ti Spieth àti Justin Thomas tí wọ́n gbá ayò papọ̀ ní gbogbo ọjọ́ tí ìkọ̀ọ̀kan wọn sì leè fi àwọn kókó mẹ́ta láti inú mẹ́rin.
Modified Sentence: Awon omo ile Amerika, gegebi Spieth ti nso, rope won ni afefe kekere kan ninu awon ituko won botileje ti won si ni opo lati mu ki ori won ya nipa re, tikii se kekere julo bi irufe ti Spieth ati Justin Thomas ti won gba ayo papo ni gbogbo ojo ti ikookan won si lee fi awon koko meta lati inu merin.

Original Sentence: Spieth ti ńjẹ́ olóró láti ìhà tójìnnà sí afẹ́fẹ́ síbi ewéko tútù tí o sì ńsíwájú nípa àpẹẹrẹ.
Modified Sentence: Spieth ti nje oloro lati iha tojinna si afefe sibi eweko tutu ti o si nsiwaju nipa apeere.

Original Sentence: Àwọn igbe ìkọ̀ǹkọ̀ ti àjọyọ̀ di aláriwo púpọ̀ síi bí ìpín àkókò tirẹ̀ ti ńlọ, tí ó sì gbá ayò tóṣe pàtàkì kan sínú ihò láti gba ìdíje ìkẹrin ní gbogbo igun mẹ́rẹ̀ẹ̀rin nigbati òun àti Thomas ti fi méjì wà nílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn méjì.
Modified Sentence: Awon igbe ikonko ti ajoyo di alariwo pupo sii bi ipin akoko tire ti nlo, ti o si gba ayo tose pataki kan sinu iho lati gba idije ikerin ni gbogbo igun mereerin nigbati oun ati Thomas ti fi meji wa nile leyin meji.

Original Sentence: Ayó rẹ̀ tógbá láti orí koríko eyiti ó borí ìdíje náà fún wọn níwọn pàdé pẹ̀lú igbe tójọra kan náà, irú eyiti ó nsọ fún ọ pé ó gbàgbọ́ wipe ikọ̀ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika kò tíì jáde kúró ninu èyí.
Modified Sentence: Ayo re togba lati ori koriko eyiti o bori idije naa fun won niwon pade pelu igbe tojora kan naa, iru eyiti o nso fun o pe o gbagbo wipe iko ile Amerika ko tii jade kuro ninu eyi.

Original Sentence: Spieth sọpe ''O níláti gbẹ́ ilẹ̀ jìn gidigidi nítòótọ́ kí ò maá ṣàníyàn nípa ìdíje tìrẹ̀''.
Modified Sentence: Spieth sope ''O nilati gbe ile jin gidigidi nitooto ki o maa saniyan nipa idije tire''.

Original Sentence: Ohun ni gbogbo ìkọ̀ọ̀kan nínú àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù  gọ́ọ̀fù wọ̀nyẹn ti fi sílẹ̀ báyìí.
Modified Sentence: Ohun ni gbogbo ikookan ninu awon agbaboolu  goofu wonyen ti fi sile bayii.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ihò méjìdínlógun láti ṣẹ̀dá máàkì kan.
Modified Sentence: Awon iho mejidinlogun lati seda maaki kan.

Original Sentence: ̀Àwọn agbá̀ gọ́ọ̀fù kan ṣoṣo tóní àwọn kókó púpọ̀ ju Spieth àti Thomas lọ láàrin àwọn ọjọ́ méjì tókọjá ni Francesco Molinari à̵ti Tommy Fleetwood, ìtàn aláìṣeéjàníyàn ti Ìfe-ẹ̀yẹ́ Ryder náà.
Modified Sentence: Awon agba goofu kan soso toni awon koko pupo ju Spieth ati Thomas lo laarin awon ojo meji tokoja ni Francesco Molinari ati Tommy Fleetwood, itan alaiseejaniyan ti Ife-eye Ryder naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ìbejì aláìṣeéṣàlàyé ṣùgbọ́n táyé ńfẹ́ ti ilẹ̀ Yuroopu jẹ́ mẹ́rin láti inú mẹ́rin tí wọn kòsí leè ṣe ohun tí kòtọ́ kankan.
Modified Sentence: Awon ibeji alaiseesalaye sugbon taye nfe ti ile Yuroopu je merin lati inu merin ti won kosi lee se ohun ti koto kankan.

Original Sentence: "Moliwood'' nìkan ni àwọn méjì tíwọn kògbá ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan lórí àkójọpọ̀ àwọn ayò fún ihò lọ́ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n yàgò fún àwọn ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan bẹ́ẹ̀ ní òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, ọ̀sán ọjọ́ Ẹtì àti lẹ́yìn aago mẹ́ẹ̀sán òwúrọ̀ ọjọ́ Ẹtì.
Modified Sentence: "Moliwood'' nikan ni awon meji tiwon kogba ayo olowokan lori akojopo awon ayo fun iho loosan ojo Abameta, sugbon won yago fun awon ayo olowokan bee ni owuro ojo Abameta, osan ojo Eti ati leyin aago meesan owuro ojo Eti.

Original Sentence: Aré sísá yẹn, àti ọ̀nà náà tódàbí pé agbára wọn  ńsàn lọ́sì àti láti ọ̀dọ̀ àwọn èrò aláriwo tíwọn kòsì kórawọn níìjánu yìí ńmú àyà àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù gọ́ọ̀fù náà le wipe àwọn ni aláyò láti lù lọ́jọ́ Àìkú, àtipé kòní sí agbábọ́ọ̀lù gọ́ọ̀fù tó gbajúmọ kankan mọ́ láti fi èdìdì kan di ìsẹ́gun ti ilẹ Yuroopu kan tóṣeé ṣe náà bí òòrùn ti ńwọ̀ lórí Le Golf National ju Fleetwood tàbí Molinari lọ.
Modified Sentence: Are sisa yen, ati ona naa todabi pe agbara won  nsan losi ati lati odo awon ero alariwo tiwon kosi korawon niijanu yii nmu aya awon agbaboolu goofu naa le wipe awon ni alayo lati lu lojo Aiku, atipe koni si agbaboolu goofu to gbajumo kankan mo lati fi edidi kan di isegun ti ile Yuroopu kan tosee se naa bi oorun ti nwo lori Le Golf National ju Fleetwood tabi Molinari lo.

Original Sentence: Àní pẹ̀lú ìfẹ́ àtọkànwá àwọn méjèèjì lórí àwọn ihò tóyàtọ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ani pelu ife atokanwa awon mejeeji lori awon iho toyato.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀rọ̀ nípa ti ògo ilẹ̀ Yuroopù sì jẹ́ eyiti kòtìí dàgbà tó síbẹ̀síbẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Oro nipa ti ogo ile Yuroopu si je eyiti kotii dagba to sibesibe.

Original Sentence: Bubba Watson àti Webb Simson ṣe iṣẹ́ kúkúrú nípa ti Sergio Garcia, akọni oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin náà, nigbati wọn fí i ṣe ẹnìkeji pẹ̀lú Alex Noren.
Modified Sentence: Bubba Watson ati Webb Simson se ise kukuru nipa ti Sergio Garcia, akoni oniboolu-merin naa, nigbati won fi i se enikeji pelu Alex Noren.

Original Sentence: Ayò ọlọ́wọ́kan lórí àkójọpọ̀ àwọn ayò fún ihò kan ati awọn oníbejì méji lóju mẹ́ẹ̀sán iwáju gbẹ́ ọmọ ilẹ̀ Sipeeni náà àti ọmọ ilẹ̀ Siwidin náà sínú ihò kan tí wọn kò fígbà kankan súnmọ́ rí láti leè jadé kuro ninu rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ayo olowokan lori akojopo awon ayo fun iho kan ati awon onibeji meji loju meesan iwaju gbe omo ile Sipeeni naa ati omo ile Siwidin naa sinu iho kan ti won ko figba kankan sunmo ri lati lee jade kuro ninu re.

Original Sentence: Lọ́jọ́ Àìku, botiwukori, kòsí ẹnikan láti ràn ọ́ lọ́wọ́ jáde kúrò ninu ihò rẹ.
Modified Sentence: Lojo Aiku, botiwukori, kosi enikan lati ran o lowo jade kuro ninu iho re.

Original Sentence: Àwọn bọ́ọ̀lu-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹ́rin kan niwọ́n ńwúni lórí gidi láti súnmọ́ fún wíwò nitori àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ tówà láàrin àwọn oníbejì, ìmọ̀ràn tíwọn fúnni, ìmọ̀ràn tíwọn kò fúnni àti ọ̀nà náà tí ọgbọ́n-àtiṣeǹkan fi leè yípadà lójú-ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ kan.
Modified Sentence: Awon boolu-merin ati awon onimerin kan niwon nwuni lori gidi lati sunmo fun wiwo nitori awon ibasepo towa laarin awon onibeji, imoran tiwon funni, imoran tiwon ko funni ati ona naa ti ogbon-atisenkan fi lee yipada loju-ese kan.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ Yuroopu ti gbá ayò tódàra ju gẹ́gẹ́bí ikọ̀ kan títí dé ìhín tí wọn sì tígba ìléwájú pàtàkí wọnú ọjọ́ tógbẹ̀yìn náà ṣùgbọn sáà onímẹ́rin yìí pẹ̀lú fihàn wipe Ìkọ Orilẹ-ede USA ní ikùn fún ìjà náà tí àwọn kan, papàá jùlọ Apá-ti-Orilẹ-ede náà, ti ńsiyèméjì.
Modified Sentence: Ile Yuroopu ti gba ayo todara ju gegebi iko kan titi de ihin ti won si tigba ilewaju pataki wonu ojo togbeyin naa sugbon saa onimerin yii pelu fihan wipe Iko Orile-ede USA ni ikun fun ija naa ti awon kan, papaa julo Apa-ti-Orile-ede naa, ti nsiyemeji.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu gba ìléwájú 10-6 wọnú ọjọ́ àṣèkágbá Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder.
Modified Sentence: Ile Yuroopu gba ilewaju 10-6 wonu ojo asekagba Ife-eye Ryder.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu yóò mú ànfààni alálàáfíà kan wọnú ọjọ́ àṣèkágbá ti Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder náà lẹ́yìn tí yọrí jàde kúrò ninu àwọn ìdíje oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹrin ti ọjọ Àbámẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ìléwájú 10-6 lórí orilẹ-ede United States náà.
Modified Sentence: Ile Yuroopu yoo mu anfaani alalaafia kan wonu ojo asekagba ti Ife-eye Ryder naa leyin ti yori jade kuro ninu awon idije oniboolu-merin ati awon onimerin ti ojo Abameta pelu ilewaju 10-6 lori orile-ede United States naa.

Original Sentence: Àwọn oní-ìmísí méjì Tommy Fleetwood àti Francesco Molinari ni o darí ìdojúkọ náà pẹ̀lú àwọn ìṣẹ́gun méji lórí Tiger Woods tó ńlàkàkà kan láti mú iye ayò tíwọn jẹ́ jìnnà ní Le Golf National dé àwọn kókó mẹ̵́rin.
Modified Sentence: Awon oni-imisi meji Tommy Fleetwood ati Francesco Molinari ni o dari idojuko naa pelu awon isegun meji lori Tiger Woods to nlakaka kan lati mu iye ayo tiwon je jinna ni Le Golf National de awon koko merin.

Original Sentence: Ikọ̀ ilẹ̀ Yuroopu ti Thomas Bjorn, tó ńlépa láti tún di ife-ẹyẹ̀ tí wọ́n pàdánù ní Hazeltine lọ́dún méjì tókọjá náà mu, jẹ́ gàba lé ikọ̀ ti ilẹ̀ Amẹrika kan eyiti ó ńsì ìbọn yìn ní oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin ti òwúrọ̀, tó sì gba ṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé náà ni 3-1.
Modified Sentence: Iko ile Yuroopu ti Thomas Bjorn, to nlepa lati tun di ife-eye ti won padanu ni Hazeltine lodun meji tokoja naa mu, je gaba le iko ti ile Amerika kan eyiti o nsi ibon yin ni oniboolu-merin ti owuro, to si gba sise-n-tele naa ni 3-1.

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede U.S. náà fún wọn látakò díẹ̀ síi ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin náà, tíwọ́n sì borí ninu àwọn ìdíje méjì, ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò leè jẹun wọnú gbèsè náà.
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede U.S. naa fun won latako die sii ninu awon onimerin naa, tiwon si bori ninu awon idije meji, sugbon won ko lee jeun wonu gbese naa.

Original Sentence: Ikọ̀ ti Jim Furyk nílò àwọn kókó mẹ́jọ láti inú àwọn ìdíje ẹlẹ́ẹyọkan méjìla ti ọjọ́ Àìkú láti leè tún gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ náà.
Modified Sentence: Iko ti Jim Furyk nilo awon koko mejo lati inu awon idije eleeyokan mejila ti ojo Aiku lati lee tun gba ife-eye naa.

Original Sentence: Fleetwood ni ọmọ ilẹ̀ Yuroopu àkọ́kọ́ náà tójẹ́ ọ̀dọ́ tíkòní ìrírí láti gba àwọn kókó mẹ́rin léra-léra láìdúró nigbati òun ati Molinari tíwọ́n sọ lórúkọ ''Molliwood'' lẹ́yìn òpin-ọ̀sẹ̀ tópè fún àkíyèsí kan jẹ́ oníbejì ìkejì náà láti gba àwọn kókó mẹ́rin láti inú àwọn ìdíje àfisíde mẹ́rin ninu ìtan Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder.
Modified Sentence: Fleetwood ni omo ile Yuroopu akoko naa toje odo tikoni iriri lati gba awon koko merin lera-lera laiduro nigbati oun ati Molinari tiwon so loruko ''Molliwood'' leyin opin-ose tope fun akiyesi kan je onibeji ikeji naa lati gba awon koko merin lati inu awon idije afiside merin ninu itan Ife-eye Ryder.

Original Sentence: Léyìn tíwọ́n ti tẹ Woods àti Patrick Reed lórí mọ́lẹ̀ ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin wọn búgbàmu  pẹ̀lú agbára láti borí Woods tí táyà ẹsẹ̀ rẹ̀ tijò àti ọ̀dọ́ ilẹ̀ Amẹrika tíkòni ìrírí Bryson Dechambeau nípaṣẹ̀ 5 àti 4 tórinlẹ̀ díẹ̀ síi.
Modified Sentence: Leyin tiwon ti te Woods ati Patrick Reed lori mole ninu awon oniboolu-merin won bugbamu  pelu agbara lati bori Woods ti taya ese re tijo ati odo ile Amerika tikoni iriri Bryson Dechambeau nipase 5 ati 4 torinle die sii.

Original Sentence: Woods, ẹnití ó wọ́ ara rẹ̀ kọjà ninu gbogbo àwọn ìdíje méji lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta, fi àwọn ìbújade iṣẹ́ ọpọlọ hàn lẹ́ẹ̀kọ̀kan ṣùgbọ́n nísinsìnyí ó ti pàdánù mọ́kàndínlógún ninu àwọn ìdíje mọ́kàndínlọ́gbọ̀n rẹ̀ ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin àti àwọn onímẹ́rin àti méje láìdúró.
Modified Sentence: Woods, eniti o wo ara re koja ninu gbogbo awon idije meji lojo Abameta, fi awon ibujade ise opolo han leekokan sugbon nisinsinyi o ti padanu mokandinlogun ninu awon idije mokandinlogbon re ninu awon oniboolu-merin ati awon onimerin ati meje laiduro.

Original Sentence: Justin Rose, sinmi fún àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin òwúrọ̀ náà, ó padà sọ́dọ̀ akẹgbẹ́ Henrik Stenson ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin náà sí ìjákulẹ̀ 2 àti 1 ti Dustin Johnson àti Brooks Koepka - àwọn tówànípò ìkínni àti ìkẹta ni àgbáyé.
Modified Sentence: Justin Rose, sinmi fun awon oniboolu-merin owuro naa, o pada sodo akegbe Henrik Stenson ninu awon onimerin naa si ijakule 2 ati 1 ti Dustin Johnson ati Brooks Koepka - awon towanipo ikinni ati iketa ni agbaye.

Original Sentence: Ilẹ̀ Yuroopu kòrí gbogbo rẹ̀ gbà ní ọ̀nà wọn bottiwukori lọ̀jọ̀ dídún, alátẹ́gùn kan ní ìwọ-oòrùn gúúsù ti ìlú Paris.
Modified Sentence: Ile Yuroopu kori gbogbo re gba ni ona won bottiwukori lojo didun, alategun kan ni iwo-oorun guusu ti ilu Paris.

Original Sentence: Akọni gbòógì ẹlẹ́ẹ̀mẹ́ta ọ̀tọ̀tọ̀ Jordan Spieth àti JustinnThomas ṣàgbékalẹ̀ gbèdéke máàki fún àwọn ọmọ ilẹ̀ Amẹ́ríkà pẹ̀lú kókó méjì lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ́ta.
Modified Sentence: Akoni gboogi eleemeta ototo Jordan Spieth ati JustinnThomas sagbekale gbedeke maaki fun awon omo ile Amerika pelu koko meji lojo Abameta.

Original Sentence: Wọ́n gba ìborí 2 àti 1 tíkòkúnná kan lóri Jon Rahm ọmọ ilẹ̀ Sipeeni àtinIan Poulter ninu àwọn oníbọ́ọ̀lù-mẹ́rin tíwọ́n sì padà lẹ́yìn nàà láti lu Poulter àti RoryMcllroy ní 4 àti 3 ninu àwọn onímẹ́rin lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n pàdánù àwọn ihò àfisíde méjì náà.
Modified Sentence: Won gba ibori 2 ati 1 tikokunna kan lori Jon Rahm omo ile Sipeeni atinIan Poulter ninu awon oniboolu-merin tiwon si pada leyin naa lati lu Poulter ati RoryMcllroy ni 4 ati 3 ninu awon onimerin leyin ti won padanu awon iho afiside meji naa.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́ẹ̀mejì nìkan ninu ìtàn Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Ryder ni ikọ̀ kan ti padà wá láti inu gbèsè oníkókó-mẹ́rin tó ńwọnú àwọn ẹlẹ́ẹyọ̀kan, botilẹjẹpe àwọn tómú ife-ẹ̀yẹ dáni nílò láti ta ọ̀mì láti tún di ife-ẹyẹ̀ náà mú.
Modified Sentence: Leemeji nikan ninu itan Ife-eye Ryder ni iko kan ti pada wa lati inu gbese onikoko-merin to nwonu awon eleeyokan, botilejepe awon tomu ife-eye dani nilo lati ta omi lati tun di ife-eye naa mu.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn jíjẹ́ ẹnití ó dára júlọ kejì fún àwọn ọjọ́ méjì, botiwukori, ìdáhùnsí-ikọlù kan tí ọjọ́ Àìkú dàbí wipe yóò fẹ́rẹ̀ tayọ wọn.
Modified Sentence: Leyin jije eniti o dara julo keji fun awon ojo meji, botiwukori, idahunsi-ikolu kan ti ojo Aiku dabi wipe yoo fere tayo won.

Original Sentence: Àríwá Kòríà sọpé 'kòsí ọ̀nà' ti òun yóò fi kó ohun ìjà ogun dánù ní àdánìkànṣe láìsí ìgbẹkẹlé
Modified Sentence: Ariwa Koria sope 'kosi ona' ti oun yoo fi ko ohun ija ogun danu ni adanikanse laisi igbekele

Original Sentence: Aláàkóso ọ̀rọ̀ ilẹ̀ òkèèrè ti orilẹ-ede Àrìwá Kòríà Ri Yong sọ lọ́jọ́ Àbámẹ̵́ta fún Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé pé àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̵̀síwájú ńmú àìní-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé ninu orilẹ-ede United States jinlẹ̀ síi àtipé kòsí ọ̀nà tí orilẹ-ede náà yóò fi kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro rẹ̀ dánù ní àdánìkànṣe lábẹ́ irú àwọn ohun tóyí ọ̀rọ̀ náà ká bẹ́ẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Alaakoso oro ile okeere ti orile-ede Ariwa Koria Ri Yong so lojo Abameta fun Ajo Isokan Agbaye pe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju nmu aini-igbekele ninu orile-ede United States jinle sii atipe kosi ona ti orile-ede naa yoo fi ko awon ohun ija ado oloro re danu ni adanikanse labe iru awon ohun toyi oro naa ka bee.

Original Sentence: Ri Yong Ho sọ fún àjọ àgbáyé níbi Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò ti Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àgbáyé náà wipe Àríwá Kòríà ti gbé ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìfẹ́ inú rere tóṣe pàtàkì'' ní ọdún tókọjá, bíi dídá àwọn ìdánwò àdó olóró àti àwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè dúró, ṣíṣe àtúpalẹ̀ ibi ìdánwò àdó olóró, àti jíjẹ́ ẹjẹ́ láti máṣe ṣọ àwọn àdó olóró àti ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ àdó olóró di púpọ̀ yanturu.
Modified Sentence: Ri Yong Ho so fun ajo agbaye nibi Ipejopo Gbogbogboo ti Ajo Isokan Agbaye naa wipe Ariwa Koria ti gbe ''awon igbese ife inu rere tose pataki'' ni odun tokoja, bii dida awon idanwo ado oloro ati awon ado abugbamu tonfoloke duro, sise atupale ibi idanwo ado oloro, ati jije eje lati mase so awon ado oloro ati imo-ero ado oloro di pupo yanturu.

Original Sentence: O ni ''Botiwukori, a kòrí ìdáhùn tóbáramu èyíkeyìí láti ọ̀dọ̀ orilẹ-ede U.S.,'' .
Modified Sentence: O ni ''Botiwukori, a kori idahun tobaramu eyikeyii lati odo orile-ede U.S.,'' .

Original Sentence: ''Láìsí ìgbẹkẹ̀lé èyíkéyìí ninu orilẹ-ede U.S. kòní sí ìgbọkànlé ninu ààbò orilẹ-ede wa àtipé lábẹ́ irú àwọn àyíká bẹ́ẹ̀ kòsí ọ̀nà  tí a ó fi kọ́kọ́ kó ohun ìjà ogun ara wa dánù ní àdánìkànṣe.''
Modified Sentence: ''Laisi igbekele eyikeyii ninu orile-ede U.S. koni si igbokanle ninu aabo orile-ede wa atipe labe iru awon ayika bee kosi ona  ti a o fi koko ko ohun ija ogun ara wa danu ni adanikanse.''

Original Sentence: Nigbati Ri tún tẹnumọ́ àwọn ẹ̀dùn ọkàn ti Àríwa Kòríà eyiti gbogbo ayé mọ̀ nípa àtakò Washington sí ìgbéṣẹ̀ ''onípele'' sí kíkó àwọn àdò olóró dànù lábẹ́ eyiti wọn ti fún Àríwá Kòríà lérè bí ó báti ńgbé àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ onípẹ̀lẹ̀pẹlẹ̀, gbólóhùn rẹ̀ farahàn bí eyito ṣe pàtàkì nitoripe kò kọ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóro dànù ní àdánìkànṣe kuro ní ọwọ́ bí Pyongyang tiṣe se nígbà kan sẹyìn.
Modified Sentence: Nigbati Ri tun tenumo awon edun okan ti Ariwa Koria eyiti gbogbo aye mo nipa atako Washington si igbese ''onipele'' si kiko awon ado oloro danu labe eyiti won ti fun Ariwa Koria lere bi o bati ngbe awon igbese onipelepele, gbolohun re farahan bi eyito se pataki nitoripe ko ko kiko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu ni adanikanse kuro ni owo bi Pyongyang tise se nigba kan seyin.

Original Sentence: Ri tọ́kasí gbólóhùn alájọṣe kan ti Kim Jong Un àti Donald Trump jọ gbéjáde níbi ìpàdé àkọ́kọ́ láàrin ààrẹ orilẹ-ede U.S. tówànípò kan àti olórí Àríwá Kòríà kan ní Singapore lọ́jọ́ kejìlá oṣù Òkúdu, nigbati Kim ṣe ìlérí láti ṣiṣẹ́ fún ''kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró kuro ni erékùsù Kòríà'' nigbati ṣe ìlérí àwọn ìdánilójú fún ààbò Àríwá Kòríà.
Modified Sentence: Ri tokasi gbolohun alajose kan ti Kim Jong Un ati Donald Trump jo gbejade nibi ipade akoko laarin aare orile-ede U.S. towanipo kan ati olori Ariwa Koria kan ni Singapore lojo kejila osu Okudu, nigbati Kim se ileri lati sise fun ''kiko awon ohun ija oloro kuro ni erekusu Koria'' nigbati se ileri awon idaniloju fun aabo Ariwa Koria.

Original Sentence: Àríwá Kòríà ti ńwá òpin alákọsílẹ̀ kan sí Ogun Kòríà tọdún 1950-53, ṣùgbọn orilẹ-ede United Ststes ti sọpé Pyongyang gbọ́dọ̀ kọ́kọ́ ju àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró rẹ̀ sílẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ariwa Koria ti nwa opin alakosile kan si Ogun Koria todun 1950-53, sugbon orile-ede United Ststes ti sope Pyongyang gbodo koko ju awon ohun ija ado oloro re sile.

Original Sentence: Washington tún ti tako àwọn ìpè láti dẹ̀ ẹ́ díẹ̀ nípa àwọn ìfìyàjẹni tàgbáyé líle lórí Àríwa Kòríà.
Modified Sentence: Washington tun ti tako awon ipe lati de e die nipa awon ifiyajeni tagbaye lile lori Ariwa Koria.

Original Sentence: ''Orilẹ-ede U.S. ńtakú lórí ''kíkọ́kọ́ kó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró dànù'' náà tí ó sì ńmu ipele ìninilára nípa àwọn ìfìyàjẹni náà pọ̀síi láti leè gba èrèdí wọn ní ọ̀nà ìfipámúni kan, tósì ńtako ''ìkede ti òpin ogun náà,'''' bii Ri ṣe sọ.
Modified Sentence: ''Orile-ede U.S. ntaku lori ''kikoko ko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu'' naa ti o si nmu ipele ininilara nipa awon ifiyajeni naa posii lati lee gba eredi won ni ona ifipamuni kan, tosi ntako ''ikede ti opin ogun naa,'''' bii Ri se so.

Original Sentence: ''Ojú-ìwòye náà wipe àwọn ìjẹniníyà leè mú wa wá sórí àwọn orúnkún wa jẹ́ àlá kan tí kò leè ṣẹ ti àwọn eniyan tíwọ́n jẹ́ aláìmọ̀kan nípa wa.
Modified Sentence: ''Oju-iwoye naa wipe awon ijeniniya lee mu wa wa sori awon orunkun wa je ala kan ti ko lee se ti awon eniyan tiwon je alaimokan nipa wa.

Original Sentence: ''Ṣùgbọn ìṣòro náà nipé àwọn ìjẹniníyà tó ńtẹ̵̀síwájú ńmú àìní-ìgbẹkẹ̀lé wa jinlẹ̀.''
Modified Sentence: ''Sugbon isoro naa nipe awon ijeniniya to ntesiwaju nmu aini-igbekele wa jinle.''

Original Sentence: Ri kò sọ ohun kankan nípa àwọn ètò fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀keji kan láàrin Kim àti Trump eyiti olórí orilẹ-ede U.S. tẹnumọ́ níbi Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Àgbáyé níbẹ̀rẹ̀ ọ̀sẹ̀ náà.
Modified Sentence: Ri ko so ohun kankan nipa awon eto fun ipade eleekeji kan laarin Kim ati Trump eyiti olori orile-ede U.S. tenumo nibi Ajo Isokan Awon Orile-ede Agbaye nibere ose naa.

Original Sentence: Aláàkóso náà dípò tẹnumọ́ àwọn ìpàdé mẹ́ta láàrin Kim àti olóri Gúúsù Kòríà Moon Jae-in láàrin oṣù máàrún tókọjá tí ó sì fi kún uń pé: Bí ẹniti ọ̀rọ̀ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù yìí kàn bájẹ̵́ Gúúsù Kòríà tí kìí ṣe orilẹ-ede U.S., ọ̀rọ̀ kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù náà kì bátí dúró sójú kan.
Modified Sentence: Alaakoso naa dipo tenumo awon ipade meta laarin Kim ati olori Guusu Koria Moon Jae-in laarin osu maarun tokoja ti o si fi kun un pe: Bi eniti oro kiko awon ohun ija oloro danu yii kan baje Guusu Koria ti kii se orile-ede U.S., oro kiko awon ohun ija oloro danu naa ki bati duro soju kan.

Original Sentence: Àní bẹ́ẹ̀, ohun ti ọ̀rọ̀ Ri náà yàtọ̀ lọ́nà tóyanilẹ́nu sí ti ọdún tókọjá, nigbati o sọ fún U.N. Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbòò wipe ṣíṣe àfojúsùn ori-ilẹ̀ ti orilẹ-ede U.S gan-an pẹ̀lú ẹ̀rọ̀-bí-ọfà abúgbàmù jẹ́ nǹkan tí kòṣeé yàgò fún lẹ́yìn tí ''Ọ̀gbẹ́ni Ààrẹ Búburú'' Trump pe Kim ni ''ọkùnrin ẹlẹ́ẹ̀rọ̀-bí-ọfà abúgbàmù'' tó ńlépa láti pa ara rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ani bee, ohun ti oro Ri naa yato lona toyanilenu si ti odun tokoja, nigbati o so fun U.N. Ipejopo Gbogbogboo wipe sise afojusun ori-ile ti orile-ede U.S gan-an pelu ero-bi-ofa abugbamu je nnkan ti kosee yago fun leyin ti ''Ogbeni Aare Buburu'' Trump pe Kim ni ''okunrin eleero-bi-ofa abugbamu'' to nlepa lati pa ara re.

Original Sentence: Lọ́dún yìí ní Àjọ Ìṣọ̀kan Àwọn Orilẹ-ede Àgbáyé náà, Trump, ẹnití ó dúnkòokó lọ́dún tókọjá láti ''pa  Àríwá Kòríà run pátápátá'', rọ òjò oríyìn sórí Kim fún ìgboyà rẹ̀ ninu gbìgbé àwọn ìgbẹ́sẹ̀ láti kó ohun ìjà dànù, ṣùgbọ́n ó sọpé ọ̀pọ̀ iṣẹ́ sí wà láti ṣe àtipé àwọn ìfìyàjẹni gbọ̀dọ̀ wànípò wọn títí ti Àríwá Kòríà yóò fi kó àwọn ohun ìjà olóró dànù.
Modified Sentence: Lodun yii ni Ajo Isokan Awon Orile-ede Agbaye naa, Trump, eniti o dunkooko lodun tokoja lati ''pa  Ariwa Koria run patapata'', ro ojo oriyin sori Kim fun igboya re ninu gbigbe awon igbese lati ko ohun ija danu, sugbon o sope opo ise si wa lati se atipe awon ifiyajeni gbodo wanipo won titi ti Ariwa Koria yoo fi ko awon ohun ija oloro danu.

Original Sentence: Lọ́jọ́ 'Ru, Trump sọpé òun kòní férémú àkókò fún èyí, tó sì ńsọpé ''bí ó bá gba àwọn ọdún méjì, ọdún mẹ́ta tabi oṣù máàrún - kòṣe nǹkan kan.''
Modified Sentence: Lojo 'Ru, Trump sope oun koni feremu akoko fun eyi, to si nsope ''bi o ba gba awon odun meji, odun meta tabi osu maarun - kose nnkan kan.''

Original Sentence: Orilẹ-ede Ṣáínà àti Rọsia wí àwíjàre wipe àjọ U.N. Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo níláti fún Pyongyang léré àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ tóti gbé.
Modified Sentence: Orile-ede Saina ati Rosia wi awijare wipe ajo U.N. Igbimo lori Eto Aabo nilati fun Pyongyang lere awon igbese toti gbe.

Original Sentence: Àmọ́sá, orilẹ-ede U.S Akọ̀wé ti Ọ̀rọ̀ Ilẹ̀ Òkèèrè Mike Pompeo sọ fún àjọ UN wipe Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo lọ́jọ́ 'Bọ̀ wipe: ''Fífi ipá mú àwọn ìfìyàjẹni ti Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo ṣẹ gbọdọ̀ tẹ̀síwájú pẹ̀lu agbára àti láìkùnà títí a ó fi dé lẹ́ẹ̀kúnrẹ́rẹ́, òpin, kíkó àwọn ohun ìjà àdó olóró dànù.
Modified Sentence: Amosa, orile-ede U.S Akowe ti Oro Ile Okeere Mike Pompeo so fun ajo UN wipe Igbimo lori Eto Aabo lojo 'Bo wipe: ''Fifi ipa mu awon ifiyajeni ti Igbimo lori Eto Aabo se gbodo tesiwaju pelu agbara ati laikuna titi a o fi de leekunrere, opin, kiko awon ohun ija ado oloro danu.

Original Sentence: Ìgbìmọ lórí Ètò Ààbo náà ti fi kún àwọn ìfìyàjẹni lórí Àríwá Kòríà pẹ̀lú ìfohùnṣọ̀kan pátápátá láti ọdún 2016 ninu ìlépa láti di ọ̀fun rírí owó ná fún àwọn ètò àdó olóró àti àwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè ti Pyongyang.
Modified Sentence: Igbimo lori Eto Aabo naa ti fi kun awon ifiyajeni lori Ariwa Koria pelu ifohunsokan patapata lati odun 2016 ninu ilepa lati di ofun riri owo na fun awon eto ado oloro ati awon ado abugbamu tonfoloke ti Pyongyang.

Original Sentence: Pompeo pàdé Ri ní àwọn ìgbá tọ́wọ́dilẹ̀ ni àjọ U.N. Ìpéjọpọ̀ Gbogbogbò tí ó sọ lẹ́yìn náà wipe òun yóò ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Pyongyang lẹ́ẹ̀kan sii lóṣù tó ńbọ láti gbaradì fún ìpàdé ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì kan.
Modified Sentence: Pompeo pade Ri ni awon igba towodile ni ajo U.N. Ipejopo Gbogbogbo ti o so leyin naa wipe oun yoo sabewo si Pyongyang leekan sii losu to nbo lati gbaradi fun ipade eleekeji kan.

Original Sentence: Pompeo ti ṣàbẹ̀wò sí Àríwá Kòríà lẹ́ẹ̀mẹta tẹ́lẹ̀tẹ́lẹ̀ lọ́dún yìí, ṣùgbọ́n ìrìn-àjò rẹ̵̵̀ tógbẹ̀yìn kò lọ dáradára.
Modified Sentence: Pompeo ti sabewo si Ariwa Koria leemeta teletele lodun yii, sugbon irin-ajo re togbeyin ko lo daradara.

Original Sentence: Ó kúró ní Pyongyang lóṣ̵ù Agẹmọ wipe ìtẹ̀síwájú tíwáyé, ó kù níkan fún Àríwá Kòríà láàrin àwọn wákàtí láti kọ 'àwọn ìbéèrè bíiti-ọ̀daràn'' sílẹ̀.''
Modified Sentence: O kuro ni Pyongyang losu Agemo wipe itesiwaju tiwaye, o ku nikan fun Ariwa Koria laarin awon wakati lati ko 'awon ibeere biiti-odaran'' sile.''

Original Sentence: Àríwá Kòríà ṣe ìlérí ninu ìpàdé kan pẹ̀lú Moon lóṣù yìí láti ṣàtúpalẹ̀ ibi ìdánwòàwọn àdó abúgbàmu tóńfòlókè kan àti ilé ńlá fún iṣẹ́ àdó olóró kan bí orilẹ-èdè United States náà bá gbé ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìdáhùn tóbáramu.''
Modified Sentence: Ariwa Koria se ileri ninu ipade kan pelu Moon losu yii lati satupale ibi idanwoawon ado abugbamu tonfoloke kan ati ile nla fun ise ado oloro kan bi orile-ede United States naa ba gbe ''awon igbese idahun tobaramu.''

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé Kim sọ fún òun wipe ''àwọn ìgbésẹ̀ ìdáhùn tóbáramu'' náà tí Kim ńwá jẹ́ àwọn ìdánilójú ààbò tí Trump ṣe ìlérì ní Singapore àti àwọn ìgbésẹ sójú àwọn ìbáṣepọ̀ bótiyẹ pẹ̀lú Washinhton.
Modified Sentence: O sope Kim so fun oun wipe ''awon igbese idahun tobaramu'' naa ti Kim nwa je awon idaniloju aabo ti Trump se ileri ni Singapore ati awon igbese soju awon ibasepo botiye pelu Washinhton.

Original Sentence: Àwọn ọmọ ilé ìwé Havard kọ ẹ̀kọ́ ninu níní ìsinmi tópeye
Modified Sentence: Awon omo ile iwe Havard ko eko ninu nini isinmi topeye

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀kọ́ tuntun kan ní ilé ìwé Yunifasiti Havard lọ́dún yìí ti gba gbogbo àwọn àkẹ́kọ̀ọ́-gboyè àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ láti máa rí oorun sùn síi ninu ìlépa láti gbógun ti àṣà ìṣebí-ọkùnrin ti kíkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ nípaṣẹ̵̀ òògùn-bí-epo-ọkọ́ 'amunimásùn-nigbogbo-oru'.
Modified Sentence: Eko tuntun kan ni ile iwe Yunifasiti Havard lodun yii ti gba gbogbo awon akekoo-gboye akoko re lati maa ri oorun sun sii ninu ilepa lati gbogun ti asa isebi-okunrin ti kikekoo nipase oogun-bi-epo-oko 'amunimasun-nigbogbo-oru'.

Original Sentence: Olùkọ́-àgbà kan ṣàwárí wipe àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ní yunifasiti onípò ìkínní láàgbáyé náà lọ́pọ̀ ìgbà níwọn kìí mọ ohun tóyẹ láti ṣe nigbati ó bá kan àwọn ohun ìpìlẹ̀ nípa bí wọn tiṣe leè mójútó ara wọn.
Modified Sentence: Oluko-agba kan sawari wipe awon akekoo ni yunifasiti onipo ikinni laagbaye naa lopo igba niwon kii mo ohun toye lati se nigbati o ba kan awon ohun ipile nipa bi won tise lee mojuto ara won.

Original Sentence: Charles Czeisler, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n ninu ìṣègùn oorun ní Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ nípa Ìṣègùn ti Yunifasiti Havard àti akọ́ṣẹ́mọṣẹ́ kan ní Ilé Ìwòsàn Brigham àti àwọn obìnrin, ló ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà, eyiti o gbàgbọ́ wipe ó jẹ́ àkọ́kọ́ irú rẹ̀ ní orilẹ-ede US.
Modified Sentence: Charles Czeisler, ojogbon ninu isegun oorun ni Ile Eko nipa Isegun ti Yunifasiti Havard ati akosemose kan ni Ile Iwosan Brigham ati awon obinrin, lo sagbekale eko naa, eyiti o gbagbo wipe o je akoko iru re ni orile-ede US.

Original Sentence: Ó ní ìmísí láti bẹ̀rẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn tí ó fún wọn ní ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lórí ipa tí àìfójúlóoorun ńkó lórí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́.
Modified Sentence: O ni imisi lati bere eko naa leyin ti o fun won ni idanilekoo lori ipa ti aifojulooorun nko lori ikekoo.

Original Sentence: <seg id="6">'Lópin rẹ̀ ọmọbìnrin kan dìde tọ̀ mi wá tí ó sì sọpé: 'Kínni ìdí tójẹ́pé nísinsìnyí ni ẹ ńsọ èyí fún mi, nígbà tí mó ti wà ilé ẹ́kọ̀o àgbạ̀́?'
Modified Sentence: <seg id="6">'Lopin re omobinrin kan dide to mi wa ti o si sope: 'Kinni idi tojepe nisinsinyi ni e nso eyi fun mi, nigba ti mo ti wa ile ekoo agba?'

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé ẹnikéni kò fìgbà kankan sọ fún ohun rí nípa pàtàki oorun sísùn - eyiti ó yàmí lẹ́nu,' ó sọ fún ìwé ìròyìn The Telegraph.
Modified Sentence: O sope enikeni ko figba kankan so fun ohun ri nipa pataki oorun sisun - eyiti o yami lenu,' o so fun iwe iroyin The Telegraph.

Original Sentence: Ẹ̀kọ́ náà, tíwọ́n gbé jáde fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún yìí, ńṣàlàyé fún àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àwọn ohun kòṣeémáàní bí àwọn ìwà oorun sísùn tódára ṣe ńran ìṣeṣí ìkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àti aré ìdárayá lọ́wọ́, àtipé ó ńjẹ́kí ìmúdárasíi bá ìgbáyé-gbádùn wọn lọ́nà gbogbo.
Modified Sentence: Eko naa, tiwon gbe jade fun igba akoko lodun yii, nsalaye fun awon akekoo awon ohun koseemaani bi awon iwa oorun sisun todara se nran isesi ikekoo ati are idaraya lowo, atipe o njeki imudarasii ba igbaye-gbadun won lona gbogbo.

Original Sentence: Paul Barreira, ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n nípa àisán ọpọlọ ní Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ Ìṣègùn ti Havard àti olùdarí ti àwọn iṣẹ́ ètò ìlera ti yunifasiti náà sọpé yunifasiti náà pinnu lati ṣàfilọ́lẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn ìṣàwárí wipe àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ jẹ́ àwọn ti oorun ńjẹníyà láàrin ọ̀sẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Paul Barreira, ojogbon nipa aisan opolo ni Ile Eko Isegun ti Havard ati oludari ti awon ise eto ilera ti yunifasiti naa sope yunifasiti naa pinnu lati safilole eko naa leyin isawari wipe awon akekoo je awon ti oorun njeniya laarin ose.

Original Sentence: ẹ̀kọ oni wákàtí gígùn ́náà ní oni àwọn ìmùṣẹ́ṣe oníṣíṣẹ̀-n-tẹ̀lé kan ninu.
Modified Sentence: eko oni wakati gigun naa ni oni awon imusese onisise-n-tele kan ninu.

Original Sentence: Ninu abala kan ni àwòrán tí yàrá kan ninu ibùgbé àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan wa, níbití àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ti ńfọwọ́ ta àwọn ife kọfí, àwọn asọ ìbòju fèrèsé, àwọn akọ́nilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àwọn sọ fún wọn nípa àwọn ipa ti kafínìnnì àti ìmọ́lẹ̀ àti bí àìsí oorun tiṣe nla ipa lórí ìṣeṣí eré ìdárayá, àti pàtàkì níní àkókó ibùsùn tómọ́nilára.
Modified Sentence: Ninu abala kan ni aworan ti yara kan ninu ibugbe awon akekoo kan wa, nibiti awon akekoo ti nfowo ta awon ife kofi, awon aso iboju ferese, awon akonilekoo awon so fun won nipa awon ipa ti kafininni ati imole ati bi aisi oorun tise nla ipa lori isesi ere idaraya, ati pataki nini akoko ibusun tomonilara.

Original Sentence: Ninu abala miran, àwọn akópa níwọ́n sọ fún nípa bí àìsí oorun onígbàtógùn ti leè mú àwọn ewu ti àwọn ìkọlù ọkàn, arọmọlápá-rọlẹ́sẹ̀, ìrẹ̀wẹ̀sí àti àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ pọ̀síi.
Modified Sentence: Ninu abala miran, awon akopa niwon so fun nipa bi aisi oorun onigbatogun ti lee mu awon ewu ti awon ikolu okan, aromolapa-rolese, irewesi ati aisan jejere posii.

Original Sentence: Àwòrán ọgbà ilé ìwé náà, pẹ̀lú àwọn àmi ìṣàmì ìbáraẹniṣepọ̀, lẹ́yìn náà ńṣekóríyá fún àwọn ìṣe ojoójúmọ tótidibárakú fún wọn.
Modified Sentence: Aworan ogba ile iwe naa, pelu awon ami isami ibaraenisepo, leyin naa nsekoriya fun awon ise ojoojumo totidibaraku fun won.

Original Sentence: 'A mọ̀pé kòní yí àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ padà' ninu ìwà wọn lójú-ẹṣẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: 'A mope koni yi awon akekoo pada' ninu iwa won loju-ese.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n a gbàgbó wípé wọ́n ní ẹ̀tọ́ láti mọ̀ - gẹ́gẹ́bí ìwọ náà ti ní ẹ̀tọ́ láti mọ̀ àwọn ipa ti ìlera ti yíyàn láti máa mu àwọn sìgá,' ni Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler fi kún un.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon a gbagbo wipe won ni eto lati mo - gegebi iwo naa ti ni eto lati mo awon ipa ti ilera ti yiyan lati maa mu awon siga,' ni Ojogbon Czeisler fi kun un.

Original Sentence: Àṣà ti ìgbéraga ninu 'fífa gbogbo-olóru kan' sì wà síbẹ̀, ni ó sọ, tó sì ńfi kún un pé ìmọ̀-ẹ̀rọ tìgbàlódé àti ìnira tó ńpọ̀síi láìdúró lórí àwọn akẹ̵́kọ̀ọ́ túmọ̀ síipé ìfoorundunara-ẹni jẹ́ ìṣòro kan tó ńdàgbàsókè.
Modified Sentence: Asa ti igberaga ninu 'fifa gbogbo-oloru kan' si wa sibe, ni o so, to si nfi kun un pe imo-ero tigbalode ati inira to nposii laiduro lori awon akekoo tumo siipe ifoorundunara-eni je isoro kan to ndagbasoke.

Original Sentence: Ríríi dájú wípé ó rí oorun tópéye sùn, tósì dára kan, yẹ kí ó jẹ́ 'ohun ìjà ogun àṣírí' ti akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ kan láti gbógun ti ìnira-ọkàn, àárẹ̀, àti ìpayà, ni ó sọ - àni láti yàgò fún fífi ìwọn kún ìwọn títóbi ara-ẹni, nitoripe àìfójúlóoorun ńfi ọpọlọ náà sí ipò ebi, tósì ńjẹ́kí ebi máa pa wọ́n nígbà gbogbo.
Modified Sentence: Ririi daju wipe o ri oorun topeye sun, tosi dara kan, ye ki o je 'ohun ija ogun asiri' ti akekoo kan lati gbogun ti inira-okan, aare, ati ipaya, ni o so - ani lati yago fun fifi iwon kun iwon titobi ara-eni, nitoripe aifojulooorun nfi opolo naa si ipo ebi, tosi njeki ebi maa pa won nigba gbogbo.

Original Sentence: Raymond So, ẹni ọdún mọ́kàndínlógún ara California kan tó ńkẹ̀kọ̀ọ́ nípa ìmọ̀ bàọ́lọ́jì tí èròjà kẹ́míkà àti nǹkan àfojúri, ràn Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler lọ́wọ́ láti ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀kọ́ náà lẹ́yìn tí o ti kẹ́kọ̀ọ́ ninu àwọn kíláàsì rẹ̀ ni ọdún àkọ́kọ́ rẹ̀ ní Havard.
Modified Sentence: Raymond So, eni odun mokandinlogun ara California kan to nkekoo nipa imo baoloji ti eroja kemika ati nnkan afojuri, ran Ojogbon Czeisler lowo lati sagbekale eko naa leyin ti o ti kekoo ninu awon kilaasi re ni odun akoko re ni Havard.

Original Sentence: Ó sọpé ẹ̀kọ́ náà ti sí ojú òun tí ó sì ti fún òun ní ìmísí láti taari rẹ̀ fún ẹ̀kọ́ gbogbòò kan ninu ọgbà náà.
Modified Sentence: O sope eko naa ti si oju oun ti o si ti fun oun ni imisi lati taari re fun eko gbogboo kan ninu ogba naa.

Original Sentence: Ìgbésẹ̀ tókàn náà, tó ńretí, ni láti bèèrè lọ́wọ́́ gbogbo àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ tó ńkẹ́kọ̀ọ́ gboye ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì láti parí ètò ẹ̀kọ́ tófarajọ́ ọ saáju kí wọ́n to ́darapọ̀ mọ́ ilé ìwé onífiga-gbága náà.
Modified Sentence: Igbese tokan naa, to nreti, ni lati beere lowo gbogbo awon akekoo to nkekoo gboye eleekeji lati pari eto eko tofarajo o saaju ki won to darapo mo ile iwe onifiga-gbaga naa.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Czeisler gba àwọn akẹ́kọ̀ọ́ lámọ̀ràn wipe ki wọ́n ronú nipa ṣíṣètò aago ìtanijí kan láti sọ àkókò láti lọ sórí ibùsùn, àti ìgbà tóyẹ láti jí, àti kí wọn sì sọ́ra fun àwọn ipa tóléwuto 'ìtànsán ìmọlẹ̀ aláwọ̀ aró' tí àwọn ìbòjù ìwòran ńtú síta àti ìmọ́lẹ̀ LED, eyiti o leè da òbìrí iṣẹ́ àti oorun sísùn ojoójúmọ ẹni ru, tí yóò sì yọrídí àwọn ìṣòro àìrí-oorun sùn.
Modified Sentence: Ojogbon Czeisler gba awon akekoo lamoran wipe ki won ronu nipa siseto aago itaniji kan lati so akoko lati lo sori ibusun, ati igba toye lati ji, ati ki won si sora fun awon ipa tolewuto 'itansan imole alawo aro' ti awon iboju iworan ntu sita ati imole LED, eyiti o lee da obiri ise ati oorun sisun ojoojumo eni ru, ti yoo si yoridi awon isoro airi-oorun sun.

Original Sentence: Livingston 1 - 0 Rangers: Bọ́ọ̀lù ti Menga gbá wọlé tẹ àwọn ọkùnrin Gerrard lọsílẹ̀
Modified Sentence: Livingston 1 - 0 Rangers: Boolu ti Menga gba wole te awon okunrin Gerrard losile

Original Sentence: Rangers jẹ ìyà àwọn ìkorò ti ọjọ-ìwàlájò miran bí ìkọlù-àìtàṣé ti Dolly Menga ti kó ikọ̀ ti Steven Gerrard aláìsínísọ̀kan sínú ìyà 1-0 kan ní Livingston.
Modified Sentence: Rangers je iya awon ikoro ti ojo-iwalajo miran bi ikolu-aitase ti Dolly Menga ti ko iko ti Steven Gerrard alaisinisokan sinu iya 1-0 kan ni Livingston.

Original Sentence: Ikọ̀ ti Ibrox náà ńwá láti ṣàkọsílẹ̀ ìborí àkọ́kọ́ wọn lójú ọ̀nà láti ìgbà ìborí 4-1 tíwọ́n ní ni St Johnstone ninu oṣù Ẹrẹ́ná, ṣùgbọ́n ikọ̀ ti Gary Holt ṣe wọ́nní ìpalára ìjìyà ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì tí Gerrard yóò ní ninu àwọn ìdíje méjìdínlógún gẹ́gẹ́bí olùṣàkóso láti fi àwọn kókó mẹ́jọ ti ikọ̀ rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ láìní àfojúsùn Hearts ikọ̀ Ladbrokes tíwọ́n jẹ́ adarí Líìgí Àkọ́kọ́.
Modified Sentence: Iko ti Ibrox naa nwa lati sakosile ibori akoko won loju ona lati igba ibori 4-1 tiwon ni ni St Johnstone ninu osu Erena, sugbon iko ti Gary Holt se wonni ipalara ijiya eleekeji ti Gerrard yoo ni ninu awon idije mejidinlogun gegebi olusakoso lati fi awon koko mejo ti iko re sile laini afojusun Hearts iko Ladbrokes tiwon je adari Liigi Akoko.

Original Sentence: Menga ṣe ọṣẹ́ àìtàṣe ní ìṣẹ́jú méje saájú ìdajì-àkókò tí ikọ̀ Rangers eyiti ó ṣe aláìní ìnísí kòfi ìgbà kankan wò rárá bí ẹnipé wọ́n fẹ́ báwọn dọ́gba.
Modified Sentence: Menga se ose aitase ni iseju meje saaju idaji-akoko ti iko Rangers eyiti o se alaini inisi kofi igba kankan wo rara bi enipe won fe bawon dogba.

Original Sentence: Nigbati Rangers jáwálẹ̀ báyìí sí ipò ìkẹfà, Livinston fò sí ipò ìkẹta tí wọn sìwà lẹ́yìn Hibernia nìkan lórí ìyàtọ̀ iye ayò gbígbá wọlé.
Modified Sentence: Nigbati Rangers jawale bayii si ipo ikefa, Livinston fo si ipo iketa ti won siwa leyin Hibernia nikan lori iyato iye ayo gbigba wole.

Original Sentence: Àtipé ìṣòro púpọ̀ síi sì leè wà ní ìpamọ́ fún Rangers lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n níláti tójú ọkùnrin tó ńkíyèsí ìlà orí-pápá Calum Spence fún ìpalára orí kan lẹ́yìn tí ó hàn wipe wọn ju ohun kan láti ìhà ibiti àwọn àlejò náà wà.
Modified Sentence: Atipe isoro pupo sii si lee wa ni ipamo fun Rangers leyin ti won nilati toju okunrin to nkiyesi ila ori-papa Calum Spence fun ipalara ori kan leyin ti o han wipe won ju ohun kan lati iha ibiti awon alejo naa wa.

Original Sentence: Gerrard ṣe àwọn ìyípadà mẹ́jọ sí ikọ̀ náà eyiti ó gbá rekọjá Ayr wọnú ìdíje tó kángun sí àṣèkágbá Ife-ẹ̀yẹ Betfred náà.
Modified Sentence: Gerrard se awon iyipada mejo si iko naa eyiti o gba rekoja Ayr wonu idije to kangun si asekagba Ife-eye Betfred naa.

Original Sentence: Holt, ní apá miran, lọ pẹ̀lú Livi mọ́kànlá kannáà tí ó mú kókó kan kúró lára Hearts lọ́sẹ̀ tókọjá tí inú rẹ̀ kì bá sì dùn pẹ̀lú ọ̀nà tí àwọn ikọ̀ tótikọ́ dáradára rẹ̀ fi fún àwọn alátakò wọn lọ́rùn ní gbogbo ibiti wọ́n bá kọjú sí.
Modified Sentence: Holt, ni apa miran, lo pelu Livi mokanla kannaa ti o mu koko kan kuro lara Hearts lose tokoja ti inu re ki ba si dun pelu ona ti awon iko totiko daradara re fi fun awon alatako won lorun ni gbogbo ibiti won ba koju si.

Original Sentence: Rangers leè ti ní àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù pípẹ́lẹ́sẹ̀ tópọ̀jùlọ̀ ṣùgbọ́n Livingston ṣe púpọ̀ pẹ̀lú bọ́ọ̀lù náà tíwọ́n ní.
Modified Sentence: Rangers lee ti ni awon boolu pipelese topojulo sugbon Livingston se pupo pelu boolu naa tiwon ni.

Original Sentence: Ó yẹ kíwọ́n ti gbá ayò wọlé ní ìṣẹ́jú méji nigbati  bọ́ọ̀lù aláàtẹ́sílẹ̀ àkọ́kọ́ ti Menga rán Scott níṣẹ́ wọ ojú ile Allan McGregor ṣùgbọ́n tí onípò-ààrin náà gbá àǹfààní ńlá rẹ̀ dànù sígbó.
Modified Sentence: O ye kiwon ti gba ayo wole ni iseju meji nigbati  boolu alaatesile akoko ti Menga ran Scott nise wo oju ile Allan McGregor sugbon ti onipo-aarin naa gba anfaani nla re danu sigbo.

Original Sentence: Ìgbásójú-ilé aláìsí-àtakò tójinlẹ̀ ti Keaghan Jacobs lẹ́yìn náà rí asíwáju Craig Halkett ṣùgbọ́n akẹgbẹ́ aláàbò rẹ̀ Alan Lithgow kàn leè  gúnbẹ dànù ní ẹ̀yìn ojú-ilé náà.
Modified Sentence: Igbasoju-ile alaisi-atako tojinle ti Keaghan Jacobs leyin naa ri asiwaju Craig Halkett sugbon akegbe alaabo re Alan Lithgow kan lee  gunbe danu ni eyin oju-ile naa.

Original Sentence: Rangers kúkú já ìṣàkóso gbà ṣùgbọ́n ó dàbí ẹnipé ìrètí púpọ̀ wà ju ìgbàgbọ́ nípa ayò gbígbá wọn ninu ìparí ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kẹta náà.
Modified Sentence: Rangers kuku ja isakoso gba sugbon o dabi enipe ireti pupo wa ju igbagbo nipa ayo gbigba won ninu ipari eleeketa naa.

Original Sentence: Alfredo Morelos rò pẹ̀lú ìdánilójú wipe ó yẹ́ki òun gba pẹnariti gbígbá kan lójú àmì ìdá kan nínú ìdá mẹ́rin wákàtí bí òun àti Steven Lawless tíkọlu ara wọn ṣùgbọ́n rẹfirí Steven Thomson juwọ́ dànù sí àwọn ẹ̀bẹ̀ ọmọ ilẹ Colombia náà.
Modified Sentence: Alfredo Morelos ro pelu idaniloju wipe o yeki oun gba penariti gbigba kan loju ami ida kan ninu ida merin wakati bi oun ati Steven Lawless tikolu ara won sugbon refiri Steven Thomson juwo danu si awon ebe omo ile Colombia naa.

Original Sentence: Rangers rí ọgbọ́n dá láti gba àwọn bọ́ọ̀lù gbígbóná méjì tólọ sójú ilé ni ìdajì ìdíje àkọ́kọ́ ṣùgbọ́n aṣọ́lé Ibrox Liam Kelly kòfi bẹ́ẹ̀ rí ìsọro rárá nípaṣẹ̀ bọ́ọ̀lù aforígbá ti Lassana Coulibaly àti ìkọlù Ovie Ejaria tíwọn mú ṣo.
Modified Sentence: Rangers ri ogbon da lati gba awon boolu gbigbona meji tolo soju ile ni idaji idije akoko sugbon asole Ibrox Liam Kelly kofi bee ri isoro rara nipase boolu aforigba ti Lassana Coulibaly ati ikolu Ovie Ejaria tiwon mu so.

Original Sentence: Nigbati bọ́ọ̀lù àfisíde tówọlé ti Livi leè jẹ́ eyiti tólòdì sí bí ìdíje tí ńlọ, kòsí ẹnití o leè ṣẹ́ wipe wọn yẹ fún un nitori ohun tíwọ́n gbà nìkan.
Modified Sentence: Nigbati boolu afiside towole ti Livi lee je eyiti tolodi si bi idije ti nlo, kosi eniti o lee se wipe won ye fun un nitori ohun tiwon gba nikan.

Original Sentence: Lẹ́ẹ̀kan sii Rangers kùná láti yanjú ọ̀rọ̀ pẹ̀lú àtòpapọ̀-ẹlẹ́yọ tójinlẹ̀ kan.
Modified Sentence: Leekan sii Rangers kuna lati yanju oro pelu atopapo-eleyo tojinle kan.

Original Sentence: Scott Arfield kò dáhùn bí Declan Gallagher ti taari bọ́ọ̀lù sí Scott Robinson ẹnití ó farabalẹ̀  láti yọ Menga jáde fún ìparí tó rọrùn kan.
Modified Sentence: Scott Arfield ko dahun bi Declan Gallagher ti taari boolu si Scott Robinson eniti o farabale  lati yo Menga jade fun ipari to rorun kan.

Original Sentence: Gerrard ṣe nǹkan ninu ìsinmi náà bí ó ti pààrọ̀ Coulibaly fún Ryan Kent ti ìyípadà náà sì fẹ́rẹ̀ pèsè ipa kan lójú-ẹṣẹ̀ bí onípò-igun náà ti gbá bọ́ọ̀lù sínú fún Morelos ṣùgbọn Kelly tó móríẹni wú sáré kuro lójú ìlà rẹ̀ láti dènà.
Modified Sentence: Gerrard se nnkan ninu isinmi naa bi o ti paaro Coulibaly fun Ryan Kent ti iyipada naa si fere pese ipa kan loju-ese bi onipo-igun naa ti gba boolu sinu fun Morelos sugbon Kelly to morieni wu sare kuro loju ila re lati dena.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọn Livinston tẹ̀síwájú láti fa àwọn àlejò náà sí gbígbá ayò lọ́nà ìdíje náà tíwọ́n gbádùn, pẹ̀lú Lithgow àti Halkett tíwọ́n ńgbá bọ́ọ̀lù gígùn lẹ́yìn bọ́ọ̀lù gígùn.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon Livinston tesiwaju lati fa awon alejo naa si gbigba ayo lona idije naa tiwon gbadun, pelu Lithgow ati Halkett tiwon ngba boolu gigun leyin boolu gigun.

Original Sentence: Ikọ̀ Holt kòbá ti fa ìléwájú wọn wọnú àwọn ipele ìparí ṣùgbọn McGregor duro dìde bótiyẹ láti fí ayò dun Jacobs kí Lithgow tó fi orí gbá a dànù láti igun náà.
Modified Sentence: Iko Holt koba ti fa ilewaju won wonu awon ipele ipari sugbon McGregor duro dide botiye lati fi ayo dun Jacobs ki Lithgow to fi ori gba a danu lati igun naa.

Original Sentence: Àfirọ́pò Rangers Glenn Middleton ni àwíjàre ìgbẹ̀yìn miran fún pẹnariti gbígbá bí o ti lọ́ mọ́ Jacobs ṣùgbọ́n lẹ́èkan síi Thomsom wo ibòmíràn.
Modified Sentence: Afiropo Rangers Glenn Middleton ni awijare igbeyin miran fun penariti gbigba bi o ti lo mo Jacobs sugbon leekan sii Thomsom wo ibomiran.

Original Sentence: Álimánáàkì Aṣàgbélẹ̀rọ́ ti Olóǹka Geiger náà
Modified Sentence: Alimanaaki Asagbelero ti Olonka Geiger naa

Original Sentence: Àtipé nísinsìnyí ojú-ewé kan kúrò sí Álimánáàkì ''Sunday Morning'' wa: Ní Ọgbọ̀nọjọ́ oṣù Owewe, lọ́dún 1882, lọ́dún mẹ̵́rìndínlógóje lóòní, tósì tún ŃKA... ọjọ́ náà ni wọ́n bí onímọ̀ ìjìnlẹ ohun àfojúrí ọjọ́ iwájú Johannes Wilhelm ''Hans'' Geiger ní orilẹ-ede Jamani.
Modified Sentence: Atipe nisinsinyi oju-ewe kan kuro si Alimanaaki ''Sunday Morning'' wa: Ni Ogbonojo osu Owewe, lodun 1882, lodun merindinlogoje looni, tosi tun NKA... ojo naa ni won bi onimo ijinle ohun afojuri ojo iwaju Johannes Wilhelm ''Hans'' Geiger ni orile-ede Jamani.

Original Sentence: Geiger ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ọgbọ́n-àtiṣenǹkan fún dídámọ̀ àti ṣíṣe òdiwọ̀n àwọn ìtújáde tíwọn pè ni oníṣẹ́rédíò, àgbélẹ̀rọ eyiti o pàpà yọrísì ẹ̀rọ náà tíwọ́n mọ̀ sí Geiger Counter.
Modified Sentence: Geiger sagbekale ogbon-atisennkan fun didamo ati sise odiwon awon itujade tiwon pe ni oniseredio, agbelero eyiti o papa yorisi ero naa tiwon mo si Geiger Counter.

Original Sentence: Òpómúléró kan ti ìmọ̀ sáyẹ́ǹsì láti ìgbà náà, Olóǹkà Geiger di òpó fún àṣà pop bákannáà, bótirí ninu àwòrán sinnimá ọdún 1950 ''Àwọn Agogo ti Colorado,'' eyiti àwọn onímọ̀ sáyẹ́nsì tíwọn fúnníṣe àgbàṣe wọ̀nyẹn tí a kò lérò ROY Rogers àti Dale Evans ti kópa:
Modified Sentence: Opomulero kan ti imo sayensi lati igba naa, Olonka Geiger di opo fun asa pop bakannaa, botiri ninu aworan sinnima odun 1950 ''Awon Agogo ti Colorado,'' eyiti awon onimo sayensi tiwon funnise agbase wonyen ti a ko lero ROY Rogers ati Dale Evans ti kopa:

Original Sentence: Ọkùnrin: ''Kínni ǹkan náà?''
Modified Sentence: Okunrin: ''Kinni nkan naa?''

Original Sentence: Rogers: ''Olóǹkà Geiger kan ni, tíwọn ńlò latí mọ ibi ti àwọn èròja àlùmọ́ọ̀nì oníṣẹ́rédíò, bíi yureniọmu wà.
Modified Sentence: Rogers: ''Olonka Geiger kan ni, tiwon nlo lati mo ibi ti awon eroja alumooni oniseredio, bii yureniomu wa.

Original Sentence: Nigbati o báfi àwọn fóònù ètí wọ̀nyí sétí, o leè gbọ́ àwọn ipa ti àwọn átọ́ọ́mù tíwọ́n tú jáde nípaṣẹ̀ iṣẹ́ rédíò nínú àwọn àlùmọ́ọ̀nì náà.''
Modified Sentence: Nigbati o bafi awon foonu eti wonyi seti, o lee gbo awon ipa ti awon atoomu tiwon tu jade nipase ise redio ninu awon alumooni naa.''

Original Sentence: Evans: ''Sọpé, ó ńtú jáde nítòótọ́ nísinsìnyí!''
Modified Sentence: Evans: ''Sope, o ntu jade nitooto nisinsinyi!''

Original Sentence: ''Hans'' Gieger kú lọ́dún 1945, ni ó kù àwọn ọjọ́ díẹ̀ sí àjọ̀dún ojọ́-ìbí ìkẹtàlélọ́gọ́ta rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: ''Hans'' Gieger ku lodun 1945, ni o ku awon ojo die si ajodun ojo-ibi iketalelogota re.

Original Sentence: Ṣùgbọ́n iṣẹ́ àgbélẹ̀rọ náà eyiti ó ńjẹ́ orúkọ rẹ̀ sí wà láàyé títí lái.
Modified Sentence: Sugbon ise agbelero naa eyiti o nje oruko re si wa laaye titi lai.

Original Sentence: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára fún àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ tuntun leè kọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti 'ri' àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè.
Modified Sentence: Abere ajesara fun aisan jejere tuntun lee ko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati 'ri' awon seeli ole.

Original Sentence: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára fún àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ tuntun leè kọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti 'ri' àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè kí ó sì pa wọn
Modified Sentence: Abere ajesara fun aisan jejere tuntun lee ko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati 'ri' awon seeli ole ki o si pa won

Original Sentence: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára ńkọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti dá àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè mọ̀ gẹ́gẹ́bí ara ìtọ̀jú
Modified Sentence: Abere ajesara nko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati da awon seeli ole mo gegebi ara itoju

Original Sentence: Ọ̀nà àtiṣiṣẹ́ ní wíwa àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara ìdáààbòbò jáde kúrò lára aláìsàn kan nínú, kí á sì yíwọn padà nínú yàrá iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀
Modified Sentence: Ona atisise ni wiwa awon seeli eto ilana ago-ara idaaabobo jade kuro lara alaisan kan ninu, ki a si yiwon pada ninu yara ise imo ijinle

Original Sentence: Lẹ́yìn náà wọ́n leè 'ri' èròja puroteeni tówọ́pọ̀ sí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn jẹjẹrẹ tíwọn yóò sì túnwọn gbé mì
Modified Sentence: Leyin naa won lee 'ri' eroja puroteeni towopo si opo awon jejere tiwon yoo si tunwon gbe mi

Original Sentence: Abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára kan tí a ńdánwò lọ́wọ́ ńfi àwọn èsì oníìlérí hàn ninu àwọn aláìsàn tíwọ́n ní onírú-irú àwọn àìsàn jẹjẹrẹ.
Modified Sentence: Abere ajesara kan ti a ndanwo lowo nfi awon esi oniileri han ninu awon alaisan tiwon ni oniru-iru awon aisan jejere.

Original Sentence: Obìnrin kan tíwọ́n tọ́jú pẹ̀lú abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára náà, eyiti ó ńkọ́ àwọn ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò láti ri àwọn ṣẹ̵́ẹ̀lì olè, ríi ti jẹjẹrẹ ti ẹ̀yà-ara fún ẹyin ìbímọ rẹ̀ pòórá fún àwọn oṣù tóju méjìdínlógún lọ.
Modified Sentence: Obinrin kan tiwon toju pelu abere ajesara naa, eyiti o nko awon eto ilana ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo lati ri awon seeli ole, rii ti jejere ti eya-ara fun eyin ibimo re poora fun awon osu toju mejidinlogun lo.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀nà àtiṣiṣẹ́ náà ní wíwa àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò ìlànà àgọ́-ara ìdáààbòbò jáde kúrò lára aláìsàn kan nínú, kí á sì yíwọn padà nínú yàrá iṣẹ́ ìmọ̀ ìjìnlẹ̀ kan kí wọ́n leè 'ri' èròja puroteeni tówọ́pọ̀ sí ọ̀pọ̀ àwọn jẹjẹrẹ tíwọ́n ńpe ni HER2, àtipé lẹ́yìn náà kí wọ́n sì tún àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì náà gbé mi.
Modified Sentence: Ona atisise naa ni wiwa awon seeli eto ilana ago-ara idaaabobo jade kuro lara alaisan kan ninu, ki a si yiwon pada ninu yara ise imo ijinle kan ki won lee 'ri' eroja puroteeni towopo si opo awon jejere tiwon npe ni HER2, atipe leyin naa ki won si tun awon seeli naa gbe mi.

Original Sentence: Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Jay Berzofsky, ti Ilé Ẹ̀kọ́ Àìsàn Jẹjẹrẹ ti Orilẹ-ede Amẹrika ní Bethesda, Maryland, sọpé: ''Àwọn èsì wa ńsọ fún wa wipe a ní abẹ́rẹ́ àjẹsára oníìlérí gidigidi kan.
Modified Sentence: Ojogbon Jay Berzofsky, ti Ile Eko Aisan Jejere ti Orile-ede Amerika ni Bethesda, Maryland, sope: ''Awon esi wa nso fun wa wipe a ni abere ajesara oniileri gidigidi kan.

Original Sentence: HER2 ''ńwakọ̀ ìdàgbàsókè ti ọ̀pọ̀lọpọ̀ onírúurú jẹjẹrẹ,'' ninu eyiti ti àwọn ọyàn, tí àgọ́-ara ẹyin ìbímọ, fùùkû ati tí ìfun ìsàlẹ̀ wà, ni Ọ̀jọ̀gbọ́n Berzofsky ṣe àlàyé rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: HER2 ''nwako idagbasoke ti opolopo oniruuru jejere,'' ninu eyiti ti awon oyan, ti ago-ara eyin ibimo, fuuku ati ti ifun isale wa, ni Ojogbon Berzofsky se alaye re.

Original Sentence: Ọ́ná tó farajọ ọ́ kan ni mímú àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì ètò àgọ́-ara tówà fún ìdáààbòbò kùrò lára aláìsàn náà àti ''kíkọ́'' wọn bí wọn yóò ti máa ṣàfojúsùn àwọn ṣẹ́ẹ̀lì jẹjẹrẹ ti ṣiṣẹ́ ninu títọ́jú irú áìsàn jẹjẹrẹ ti ẹlẹ́ẹ̀jẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Ona to farajo o kan ni mimu awon seeli eto ago-ara towa fun idaaabobo kuro lara alaisan naa ati ''kiko'' won bi won yoo ti maa safojusun awon seeli jejere ti sise ninu titoju iru aisan jejere ti eleeje.

Original Sentence: Kanye West Bẹ̀rẹ̀ Ìkọluni Ọlọ́rọ̀ Èébú fún Àtilẹ́yìn-Trump kan, tó ńdé Ate-ori MAGA, Lẹ́yìn Ìfarahàn SNL rẹ̀.
Modified Sentence: Kanye West Bere Ikoluni Oloro Eebu fun Atileyin-Trump kan, to nde Ate-ori MAGA, Leyin Ifarahan SNL re.
